original: don ni rig pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir yod pa tsam yang rang las mi 'grub na khyad par ltar 'grub par gal 'gyur /
analyzed: don ni rig pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir yod pa tsam yang rang las mi 'grub na khyad par ltar 'grub par gal 'gyur /
translated: Because the object is not the nature of consciousness, mere existence is not established from itself, so how could a specific property be established?

original: de'i phyir bdag gis shes pa gang yin pa de'i yod pa dang khyad par dag gis yod pa dang khyad par dag 'grub kyi rang dbang du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir bdag gis shes pa gang yin pa de'i yod pa dang khyad par dag gis yod pa dang khyad par dag 'grub kyi rang dbang du ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the existence and specific properties of whatever is known by the self are established by the existence and specific properties of that, not independently.

original: de bzhin du myong ba'i yod pa dang khyad par dag gis myong ba gzhan gyi yod pa dang khyad par dag las nges pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du myong ba'i yod pa dang khyad par dag gis myong ba gzhan gyi yod pa dang khyad par dag las nges pa ma yin te /
translated: Similarly, the existence and specific properties of experience are not ascertained from the existence and specific properties of another experience.

original: shes pa dang shes bya thams cad mi rtogs par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes pa dang shes bya thams cad mi rtogs par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it follows that all consciousnesses and objects of consciousness would not be cognized.

original: gang gi phyir med par nges pa'i rgyu ni shes pa gzhan nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: gang gi phyir med par nges pa'i rgyu ni shes pa gzhan nyid yin gyi /
translated: Because the cause of ascertaining nonexistence is another consciousness.

original: shes pa med pa tsam ni ma yin pa de'i phyir snang du rung ba'i dmigs pa med par nges pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir bshad ma thag pa shes pa gcig la 'dre ba'i rang bzhin khyad par can myong pa las shes pa gcig la 'dre ba gzhan bsal
analyzed: shes pa med pa tsam ni ma yin pa de'i phyir snang du rung ba'i dmigs pa med par nges pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir bshad ma thag pa shes pa gcig la 'dre ba'i rang bzhin khyad par can myong pa las shes pa gcig la 'dre ba gzhan bsal
translated: Since it is not merely the absence of consciousness, it is the cause of ascertaining the nonexistence of an object that is suitable to appear. Therefore, the special nature of mixing into a single cognition is ascertained from the experience of one, and the other is eliminated from mixing into a single cognition.

original: ba ni gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: ba ni gzhan ma yin te /
translated: Because it is not merely the absence of consciousness, it is the cause for ascertaining the nonexistence of an object that is suitable to appear. Therefore, the experience of a special nature that is mixed with a single consciousness is not eliminated by another that is mixed with a single consciousness.

original: des na ma yin par 'jug pas myong ba de nyid dngos po med pa yin te /
analyzed: des na ma yin par 'jug pas myong ba de nyid dngos po med pa yin te /
translated: Hence, because it engages in what is not, that experience itself is a nonentity.

original: snang ba mi dmigs pa nges ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snang ba mi dmigs pa nges ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the cause for ascertaining the nonobservation of appearance.

original: dngos po med pa yin pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi bum pa de mi dmigs pa yang bum pa de las tha dad pa'i shes pa gcig la 'dre ba dmigs pa nyid yin na /
analyzed: dngos po med pa yin pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi bum pa de mi dmigs pa yang bum pa de las tha dad pa'i shes pa gcig la 'dre ba dmigs pa nyid yin na /
translated: Not only is it a nonentity, but if the nonobservation of a pot is the observation of something that is mixed with a single consciousness that is different from the pot,

original: de 'dra ba'i mi dmigs pa ni mngon sum nyid kyis grub pa yin no //
analyzed: de 'dra ba'i mi dmigs pa ni mngon sum nyid kyis grub pa yin no //
translated: such a nonobservation is established by direct perception.

original: des na don 'di brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: des na don 'di brjod pa yin te /
translated: Therefore this is what is being said.

original: gang gi phyir shes pa gzhan @89a * //
analyzed: gang gi phyir shes pa gzhan @89a * //
translated: Because a consciousness that is different from the pot is not established by direct perception,

original: las snang ba dmigs pa med par nges pa de'i phyir khyad par can gyi shes pa de nyid de med pa dang ma dmigs pa yang yin la /
analyzed: las snang ba dmigs pa med par nges pa de'i phyir khyad par can gyi shes pa de nyid de med pa dang ma dmigs pa yang yin la /
translated: Because the appearance of an object is ascertained to be non-existent, that very special consciousness is non-existent and not observed.

original: de yang mngon sum gyis grub pa yin pa dang / snang ba mi dmigs pa med par nges pa'i rgyur yang 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: de yang mngon sum gyis grub pa yin pa dang / snang ba mi dmigs pa med par nges pa'i rgyur yang 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: Moreover, it is established by direct perception, and it is the cause of ascertaining the non-existence of the non-observation of appearance.

original: dngos po nyid kyi phyir ro//
analyzed: dngos po nyid kyi phyir ro//
translated: Because it is an entity.🔽How is it that non-entity and non-observation are that very thing?

original: dngos po med pa dang mi dmigs pa ni de nyid yin no zhes de ga las she na /
analyzed: dngos po med pa dang mi dmigs pa ni de nyid yin no zhes de ga las she na /
translated: It is explained:

original: bshad pa / gang gi phyir don ma 'brel ba nyams su myong ba ma 'brel ba'i yul can nyid kyis rnam pa gcig tu so sor nges pa gang yin pa de las don gzhan med pa ni gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: bshad pa / gang gi phyir don ma 'brel ba nyams su myong ba ma 'brel ba'i yul can nyid kyis rnam pa gcig tu so sor nges pa gang yin pa de las don gzhan med pa ni gzhan ma yin te /
translated: Because the object that is not related is experienced as having a domain that is not related, that which is ascertained individually in one aspect is not different from the object, it is not other.

original: 'on kyang de nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang de nyid yin no //
translated: However, it is that very thing.

original: nyams su myong ba de nyid ni rnam pa de nges pa yin pa'i dmigs pa'i sngon po de nyid yod ces nges par byed pa na gzhan nam gzhan myong ba med do zhes nges par byed pa de'i phyir de nyid dngos po med pa yin la /
analyzed: nyams su myong ba de nyid ni rnam pa de nges pa yin pa'i dmigs pa'i sngon po de nyid yod ces nges par byed pa na gzhan nam gzhan myong ba med do zhes nges par byed pa de'i phyir de nyid dngos po med pa yin la /
translated: When one ascertains that the very blue object that is the object of that experience exists, one ascertains that it is not experienced as other. Therefore it is not a nonexistent thing.🔽

original: de ni 'dir yang yod do //
analyzed: de ni 'dir yang yod do //
translated: That very experience is the ascertainment of the form of that object, and when it ascertains that the blue object exists, it ascertains that the other, the experience of the other, does not exist. Therefore, that very non-existence of the other exists here.

original: nam gyi tshe nges she na /
analyzed: nam gyi tshe nges she na /
translated: When is it ascertained?

original: gang gi tshe gzhan med par tha snyad byed pa'i tshe yin la /
analyzed: gang gi tshe gzhan med par tha snyad byed pa'i tshe yin la /
translated: When it is conventionally expressed as the non-existence of the other.

original: gzhan med pa'i tha snyad kyang snang ba mi dmigs pa las yin no //
analyzed: gzhan med pa'i tha snyad kyang snang ba mi dmigs pa las yin no //
translated: And the conventional expression of the non-existence of the other is from the non-apprehension of appearance.

original: de'i phyir 'di mngon sum gyi byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di mngon sum gyi byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, this is not the function of direct perception.

original: dmigs par bya ba de nyid ni yod pa la gzhan ni med do zhes bya ba 'di ni skabs kyi dbang gis yin par blta ste /
analyzed: dmigs par bya ba de nyid ni yod pa la gzhan ni med do zhes bya ba 'di ni skabs kyi dbang gis yin par blta ste /
translated: That very object of apprehension exists, and the other does not exist. This is seen by the power of the context.

original: mngon sum gyi bya ba rnal ma nyid ni 'di dmigs la 'di ni ma dmigs so zhes bya ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum gyi bya ba rnal ma nyid ni 'di dmigs la 'di ni ma dmigs so zhes bya ba nyid yin no //
translated: The natural function of direct perception is just to apprehend this and not to apprehend that.

original: de bzhin du khyad par can gyi rang bzhin nges pa nyid ni myong ba gzhan med par nges pa yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du khyad par can gyi rang bzhin nges pa nyid ni myong ba gzhan med par nges pa yin te /
translated: So too, the ascertainment of the specific nature of that is the ascertainment that there is no other experience.

original: de'i rang bzhin gyi khyad par ni rang las grub pa yin no zhes gang bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin gyi khyad par ni rang las grub pa yin no zhes gang bshad pa yin no //
translated: The specific nature of that is established from itself, as has been explained.

original: de'i phyir gzhan myong ba med do zhes nges par byed do zhes bya ba 'dir ni shugs kyis zhes bya bar mi bya ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir gzhan myong ba med do zhes nges par byed do zhes bya ba 'dir ni shugs kyis zhes bya bar mi bya ste /
translated: Therefore, the ascertainment that there is no other experience is not to be taken as indirectly in this context.

original: 'on kyang gzhan med do zhes bya ba 'dir yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang gzhan med do zhes bya ba 'dir yin no //
translated: But it is to be taken as directly.

original: mngon sum ni gzhan med par tha snyad byed pa ma yin na de ci ltar nges par byed ce na /
analyzed: mngon sum ni gzhan med par tha snyad byed pa ma yin na de ci ltar nges par byed ce na /
translated: If direct perception does not make the convention that there is no other, how does it ascertain it?

original: shugs kyis gal te de na snang du rung ba gzhan yod na ni sa phyogs 'ba' zhig dmigs par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: shugs kyis gal te de na snang du rung ba gzhan yod na ni sa phyogs 'ba' zhig dmigs par mi 'gyur te /
translated: If something else that is suitable to appear were to exist there, then the mere place would not be observed,

original: de yang dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because that would also be observed.

original: dmigs pa nges pa de nyid kyi shugs kyis bltar rung ba med par nges pa ma yin na de ni bltar mi rung ba dag la yang yod pa'i phyir snang ba mi dmigs pas tha snyad du bya ba yin no //
analyzed: dmigs pa nges pa de nyid kyi shugs kyis bltar rung ba med par nges pa ma yin na de ni bltar mi rung ba dag la yang yod pa'i phyir snang ba mi dmigs pas tha snyad du bya ba yin no //
translated: If the ascertainment of the object does not ascertain the absence of the possibility of perception by implication, then that object could exist even though it is not perceived. Therefore, the non-perception of an appearance is the reason for the conventional expression of non-existence.

original: @89b de'i phyir gzhan dmigs pa med par nges pa'i rgyu nyid shugs kyis gzhan med par nges pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir de nyid med pa yin no zhes brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: @89b de'i phyir gzhan dmigs pa med par nges pa'i rgyu nyid shugs kyis gzhan med par nges pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir de nyid med pa yin no zhes brjod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the very ascertainment of the non-perception of another object is the reason for the ascertainment of the absence of another object.

original: snang ba mi dmigs par nges pa'i shugs kyis byas pas de nyid las med par nges pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir de nyid de ma dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: snang ba mi dmigs par nges pa'i shugs kyis byas pas de nyid las med par nges pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir de nyid de ma dmigs pa yin no //
translated: The ascertainment of the non-perception of an appearance is the reason for the ascertainment of non-existence, because it is the cause of the ascertainment of non-existence. Therefore, that is the non-perception of that.

original: gang las gang med par nges pa de de'i mi dmigs par rigs kyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang las gang med par nges pa de de'i mi dmigs par rigs kyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: From the ascertainment of the non-existence of one thing, the ascertainment of the non-perception of that is reasonable, but not of another.

original: de ni snang du rung ba gzhan mi dmigs par nges pa'i rgyu yin pas med pa'i tha snyad 'grub pa'i rgyu yang yin no //
analyzed: de ni snang du rung ba gzhan mi dmigs par nges pa'i rgyu yin pas med pa'i tha snyad 'grub pa'i rgyu yang yin no //
translated: That is the reason for the ascertainment of the non-perception of another object that is suitable to appear, and it is also the reason for the conventional expression of non-existence.

original: gang las shes pa med par mi nges pa de ni tha snyad kyi rgyu nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: gang las shes pa med par mi nges pa de ni tha snyad kyi rgyu nyid ma yin te /
translated: That which is not ascertained without consciousness is not the cause of convention.

original: mi dmigs pa ma nges par ni tha snyad mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa ma nges par ni tha snyad mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because convention is not possible without the ascertainment of non-apprehension.

original: de yang rang rig pas grub pa'i phyir ma grub pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang rang rig pas grub pa'i phyir ma grub pa ma yin te /
translated: And that is not unestablished because it is established by reflexive awareness.

original: de'i phyir shes pa'i rgyu dang mngon sum gyis grub pa yang yin pas rtsod pa gnyi ga spangs pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir shes pa'i rgyu dang mngon sum gyis grub pa yang yin pas rtsod pa gnyi ga spangs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, since it is established by the cause of consciousness and by perception, both objections are avoided.

original: 'dir shes pa gcig la 'dre ba'i dngos po'i yul can gyi mngon sum ga las bltar rung ba gzhan med par nges pa de las bltar rung ba gzhan med pa'i tha snyad yin no zhes bya ba'i don rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dir shes pa gcig la 'dre ba'i dngos po'i yul can gyi mngon sum ga las bltar rung ba gzhan med par nges pa de las bltar rung ba gzhan med pa'i tha snyad yin no zhes bya ba'i don rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
translated: Here, the meaning of the statement “The convention ‘there is no other object of perception that is mixed with a single consciousness’ is from that [consciousness]” is posited as follows: There is no other object of perception that is mixed with a single consciousness.

original: don 'di'i 'khrul pa bstan pa'i phyir smras pa ni /
analyzed: don 'di'i 'khrul pa bstan pa'i phyir smras pa ni /
translated: In order to show the error in this meaning, it is said:

original: gal te rang las khyad par can shes pa gcig la 'dre ba shes pa med kyang la lar med pa'i tha snyad kyi blor 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te rang las khyad par can shes pa gcig la 'dre ba shes pa med kyang la lar med pa'i tha snyad kyi blor 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
translated: If there is no consciousness that is mixed with a single consciousness that is different from itself, is it not the case that the mind that makes the convention of non-existence would not occur in some cases?

original: dper na mun khung mun pa'i smag tu lag pa byugs pas bum pa la sogs pa med par rtogs pa yod pa bzhin no zhe na ma yin no //
analyzed: dper na mun khung mun pa'i smag tu lag pa byugs pas bum pa la sogs pa med par rtogs pa yod pa bzhin no zhe na ma yin no //
translated: For example, it is like the existence of the knowledge that there is no pot, etc. in the darkness of a cave, by the application of the hand.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is it not so?

original: 'di ltar mun khung der yang de ltar zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig med par rtogs pa ni byugs pa'i lag pa'i nang gi bdag nyid kyi khyad par can gyi reg pa dmigs pas yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar mun khung der yang de ltar zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig med par rtogs pa ni byugs pa'i lag pa'i nang gi bdag nyid kyi khyad par can gyi reg pa dmigs pas yin no //
translated: Because in that cave, the knowledge that there is no such thing as a pot, etc. is due to the perception of the special contact of the hand that is applied.

original: gzugs kyi bdag nyid kyis ni bum pa blta bar bya ba yin la /
analyzed: gzugs kyi bdag nyid kyis ni bum pa blta bar bya ba yin la /
translated: The pot is to be seen by means of the nature of form.

original: reg pa'i bdag nyid kyis ni reg par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: reg pa'i bdag nyid kyis ni reg par bya ba yin no //
translated: It is to be touched by means of the nature of contact.

original: reg par bya ba de shes pa gcig la 'dre ba'i nang gi reg pa dmigs pa las med par rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: reg par bya ba de shes pa gcig la 'dre ba'i nang gi reg pa dmigs pa las med par rtogs pa yin no //
translated: The knowledge that there is no pot, etc. is due to the perception of the special contact that is mixed in the one consciousness that touches it.

original: de'i tshe nang gi reg pa dmigs pa yod do zhes bya ba de yang ga las she na /
analyzed: de'i tshe nang gi reg pa dmigs pa yod do zhes bya ba de yang ga las she na /
translated: At that time, how can it be said that there is the perception of the special contact?

original: reg pa'i khyad par zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: reg pa'i khyad par zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: He says, “The special contact, etc.”

original: gal te lag pa byugs pa'i bya ba'i yul can blo la gnas pa'i rtsol ba las 'bras bur gyur pa'i lag pa byugs pa @90a * //
analyzed: gal te lag pa byugs pa'i bya ba'i yul can blo la gnas pa'i rtsol ba las 'bras bur gyur pa'i lag pa byugs pa @90a * //
translated: If you say that the cognition of the hand smeared with ointment is the result of the effort of the cognition that is the locus of the action of smearing the hand,

original: rtogs pa ma yin nam zhe na rtsol ba med kyang zhes smos so //
analyzed: rtogs pa ma yin nam zhe na rtsol ba med kyang zhes smos so //
translated: we reply: “Even without effort.”

original: re zhig 'bras bu ni nges par 'gyur ba ma yin la /
analyzed: re zhig 'bras bu ni nges par 'gyur ba ma yin la /
translated: The result is not necessarily produced from the effort.

original: byugs pa'i shes pa rjes su dpag pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: byugs pa'i shes pa rjes su dpag pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is the cognition of the smeared hand inferred from the effort.

original: de'i phyir reg pa'i khyad par mngon sum du gyur pa na yul nas yul du rgyu ba'i lag pa mngon sum du 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir reg pa'i khyad par mngon sum du gyur pa na yul nas yul du rgyu ba'i lag pa mngon sum du 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, when the special contact is directly perceived, the hand moving from place to place is directly perceived.

original: rtsol ba med kyang lag pa gyen du bsgreng ste mun khung du gnyid rtsol ba'i dus su lag pa 'og tu lhung ba dmigs pa yod pa yin no //
analyzed: rtsol ba med kyang lag pa gyen du bsgreng ste mun khung du gnyid rtsol ba'i dus su lag pa 'og tu lhung ba dmigs pa yod pa yin no //
translated: Even without effort, when one raises one’s hand and falls asleep in the dark, one perceives the hand falling down.

original: de'i phyir rtsol ba ni rtogs pa'i yan lag ma yin pa dang 'khrul pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rtsol ba ni rtogs pa'i yan lag ma yin pa dang 'khrul pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, effort is not a factor of understanding and is not a mistake.

original: reg pa'i khyad par de las shes pa gcig la 'dre ba med par rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: reg pa'i khyad par de las shes pa gcig la 'dre ba med par rtogs pa yin no //
translated: From that special contact, the cognition is understood without mixing.

original: shes pa gcig la 'dre ba'i dngos po'i rtogs pa de med na gnyid log pa la sogs pa'i tshe med par mi rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes pa gcig la 'dre ba'i dngos po'i rtogs pa de med na gnyid log pa la sogs pa'i tshe med par mi rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If there were no realization of mixed things in a single cognition, then one would not realize their absence when asleep and so on.

original: sgra la sogs pa med par rtogs pa ni phyis gtan la 'bebs bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgra la sogs pa med par rtogs pa ni phyis gtan la 'bebs bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The realization of the absence of sound and so on will be established later.

original: gal te dmigs pa'i rgyu rnams yod pa na dmigs su rung ba de mi dmigs pas med par rtogs so //
analyzed: gal te dmigs pa'i rgyu rnams yod pa na dmigs su rung ba de mi dmigs pas med par rtogs so //
translated: If the causes of perception exist, then the object is suitable to be perceived, and if it is not perceived, it is realized to be absent.

original: des cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: des cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What does that mean?

original: de'i gnyid log pa dang myos pa dang brgyal ba la sogs pa'i gnas skabs su 'ga' zhig med par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i gnyid log pa dang myos pa dang brgyal ba la sogs pa'i gnas skabs su 'ga' zhig med par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: It means that in the states of sleep, intoxication, fainting, and so on, some things are not absent.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: dmigs pa'i rkyen dbang po nus pa ma nyams pa 'bras bu byed par nus pa dang rung ba'i yid la byed pa de nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i rkyen dbang po nus pa ma nyams pa 'bras bu byed par nus pa dang rung ba'i yid la byed pa de nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the enabling condition of the sense faculty is unimpaired, and the mental activity that is capable of producing the effect is suitable.

original: des na khyad par can shes pa gcig la 'dre ba'i shes pa med pa'i phyir na gnyid log pa la sogs pa der 'ga' yang med par ma rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: des na khyad par can shes pa gcig la 'dre ba'i shes pa med pa'i phyir na gnyid log pa la sogs pa der 'ga' yang med par ma rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, since there is no consciousness that mixes with a single consciousness that has a specific object, it is not the case that one does not realize that nothing exists during sleep and so on.

original: 'o na de 'dra ba de ga las she na /
analyzed: 'o na de 'dra ba de ga las she na /
translated: Well then, how is that?

original: rgyu tshogs pa can gyi dmigs su rung ba ma dmigs pa nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu tshogs pa can gyi dmigs su rung ba ma dmigs pa nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is because the nonobservation of the object that is suitable to appear when its cause is complete is itself nonexistent.

original: de'i phyir gnyid log pa la sogs pa la med pa'i phyir khyad par can gyi shes pa las med par rtogs pa yin no zhes gang brjod pa de ni sgrub par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnyid log pa la sogs pa la med pa'i phyir khyad par can gyi shes pa las med par rtogs pa yin no zhes gang brjod pa de ni sgrub par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, since it does not exist during sleep and so on, it is not the case that one realizes that it does not exist due to a consciousness that has a specific object.

original: 'di ltar gnyis log pa la sogs pa med par ma rtogs pa ni mi dmigs pa nyid med pas yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di ltar gnyis log pa la sogs pa med par ma rtogs pa ni mi dmigs pa nyid med pas yin gyi /
translated: The response to that is that the nonrealization of the nonexistence of sleep and so on is due to the nonobservation of the nonexistence of the object.

original: khyad par can gyi shes pa med pas ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: khyad par can gyi shes pa med pas ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: It is not due to the nonexistence of a consciousness that has a specific object.

original: khyod kyis kyang khyad par can gyi shes pa nyid rnam pa gzhan gyi sgo nas brjod pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i don du bshad pa /
analyzed: khyod kyis kyang khyad par can gyi shes pa nyid rnam pa gzhan gyi sgo nas brjod pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i don du bshad pa /
translated: You also state that a consciousness that has a specific object is itself a consciousness that has another aspect.

original: mi dmigs @90b pa brjod par bya ba'i 'dir yang rgyu gzhan yod pa na zhes smra bas dbang po la sogs pa de dag nyid shes pa la ste /
analyzed: mi dmigs @90b pa brjod par bya ba'i 'dir yang rgyu gzhan yod pa na zhes smra bas dbang po la sogs pa de dag nyid shes pa la ste /
translated: In this context, when the cause exists, the opponent says that the sense faculties and so on are the cause of consciousness,

original: rang gi shes pa la nus pa nyams pa med pa'i rgyus dmigs pa skye bar ston par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: rang gi shes pa la nus pa nyams pa med pa'i rgyus dmigs pa skye bar ston par byed pa yin te /
translated: and they demonstrate that the object arises from the unimpaired power of consciousness itself.

original: 'di ltar gang gi tshe de dag 'bras bu rtsom pa de'i tshe dag nus pa ma nyams par 'gyur ba yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di ltar gang gi tshe de dag 'bras bu rtsom pa de'i tshe dag nus pa ma nyams par 'gyur ba yin gyi /
translated: Thus, when they commence the effect, at that time their power is unimpaired.

original: de lta ma yin na ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If that were not so, it would follow that they are not causes.

original: gang zhig snang ba na gang zhig yod na /
analyzed: gang zhig snang ba na gang zhig yod na /
translated: When something appears, if something exists,🔽then without doubt they are mixed in a single consciousness.

original: gdon mi za bar snang ba shes pa gcig la 'dre ba de'i nus pa ma mthong ba rgyu'i dngos por ni dmigs pas rjes su dpog par byed do //
analyzed: gdon mi za bar snang ba shes pa gcig la 'dre ba de'i nus pa ma mthong ba rgyu'i dngos por ni dmigs pas rjes su dpog par byed do //
translated: The unseen power is inferred to be the cause of the object.

original: de las ni 'bras bu 'dre ba'i shes pa yin no //
analyzed: de las ni 'bras bu 'dre ba'i shes pa yin no //
translated: From that, there is a consciousness that is mixed with the effect.

original: 'bras bu 'jug pa de yang dmigs pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu 'jug pa de yang dmigs pa nyid yin no //
translated: That engagement of the effect is the object.

original: khyod kyis dmigs su rung ba ma dmigs par brjod pas kyang dmigs pa de'i don gcig tu snang ba nges pa ston par byed do //
analyzed: khyod kyis dmigs su rung ba ma dmigs par brjod pas kyang dmigs pa de'i don gcig tu snang ba nges pa ston par byed do //
translated: You also indicate the ascertainment of the appearance of a single object of that observation by stating that you do not observe what can be observed.

original: 'di ltar dmigs pa yod pa na gal te de'i rnam pa don gcig tu nges pa yin na bum pa mi dmigs so zhes bya bar 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar dmigs pa yod pa na gal te de'i rnam pa don gcig tu nges pa yin na bum pa mi dmigs so zhes bya bar 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Thus, if the object of observation exists and its aspect is ascertained as a single object, then it would be as you say, “The pot is not observed.”

original: de'i phyir khyod kyis kyang khyad par can gyi shes pa nyid de mi dmigs par brjod pa yin no //🔽gzhan du zhes bya ba gal te mi dmigs par mi 'dod na de'i tshe don med pa ni mi dmigs pas yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir khyod kyis kyang khyad par can gyi shes pa nyid de mi dmigs par brjod pa yin no // gzhan du zhes bya ba gal te mi dmigs par mi 'dod na de'i tshe don med pa ni mi dmigs pas yin la /
translated: Therefore, you also state that the nonobservation of that is the nonobservation of the consciousness that has a specific object.

original: de med pa yang gzhan gyis yin pa'i phyir thug pa med par 'gyur ro //🔽'di nyid kyi ran par 'grel pa bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de med pa yang gzhan gyis yin pa'i phyir thug pa med par 'gyur ro // 'di nyid kyi ran par 'grel pa bshad pa ni /
translated: Otherwise, if you do not assert that it is nonobservation, then it would be pointless, because nonobservation would be established by another, and that would be established by another, and so on, ad infinitum.

original: de lta ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is the meaning of the passage from the Commentary that begins with the words “If that is not so.”

original: gal te rang gi yul can gyi shes pa med pas dngos po med pa grub na /
analyzed: gal te rang gi yul can gyi shes pa med pas dngos po med pa grub na /
translated: If nonexistence is established by the nonexistence of a consciousness that has an object,

original: de'i tshe sgrub par byed pa ni grub pa yin pa'i phyir shes pa med pa la yang mi dmigs pa gzhan gyis bsgrub dgos pa'i phyir thug pa med par 'gyur bgo bar byed pa ma grub pa'i phyir don gyi dngos po med pa mi rtogs pa nyid du
analyzed: de'i tshe sgrub par byed pa ni grub pa yin pa'i phyir shes pa med pa la yang mi dmigs pa gzhan gyis bsgrub dgos pa'i phyir thug pa med par 'gyur bgo bar byed pa ma grub pa'i phyir don gyi dngos po med pa mi rtogs pa nyid du
translated: Because the proof would not be established, the non-existence of the object would not be understood.

original: 'gyur ro // 'di snyam du shes pa bzhin du de med pa yang rang nyid 'grub pas de ci'i phyir thug pa med par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'gyur ro // 'di snyam du shes pa bzhin du de med pa yang rang nyid 'grub pas de ci'i phyir thug pa med par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If you think that, like consciousness, the non-existence of consciousness is established by itself, why would there be an infinite regress?

original: bshad pa / gang gi phyir myong ba med pa ni rang nyid nges pa ma yin te /
analyzed: bshad pa / gang gi phyir myong ba med pa ni rang nyid nges pa ma yin te /
translated: We respond: Because that which is not experienced is not ascertained by itself.

original: med pa'i ngo bor khyad par med pas yul yang rang nyid las med par rtogs par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med pa'i ngo bor khyad par med pas yul yang rang nyid las med par rtogs par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no difference in the nature of non-existence, it follows that the object would be understood to be non-existent by itself.

original: shes pa bzhin du shes pa med par yang rang nyid las yin no zhes gang @91a * //
analyzed: shes pa bzhin du shes pa med par yang rang nyid las yin no zhes gang @91a * //
translated: You say that, like consciousness, the non-existence of consciousness is from itself.

original: smras pa de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: smras pa de ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: gang gi phyir myong ba ni bdag nyid kyis khyad par te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir myong ba ni bdag nyid kyis khyad par te /
translated: Because experience is distinguished by itself.

original: rig pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir bdag nyid kho nas rig pa yin te /
analyzed: rig pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir bdag nyid kho nas rig pa yin te /
translated: It is self-cognizant because it is the nature of cognition.

original: sgrub par byed pa gzhan la ltos pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa gzhan la ltos pa med pa yin no //
translated: It does not depend on another establishing agent.

original: med pa ni de lta ma yin te /
analyzed: med pa ni de lta ma yin te /
translated: Nonexistence is not like that.

original: de ni ngo bo nyid med pas rig pa'i rang bzhin nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni ngo bo nyid med pas rig pa'i rang bzhin nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is devoid of intrinsic reality, it is not the nature of cognition.

original: kha cig na re gang las thug pa med pa'i skyon 'dir 'gyur ba bdag nyid 'dzin pa'i shes pa med pas dngos po med par nges pa ma yin la khyed kyi rang las gzhan pa'i shes pa yod ba las kyang ma yin no //
analyzed: kha cig na re gang las thug pa med pa'i skyon 'dir 'gyur ba bdag nyid 'dzin pa'i shes pa med pas dngos po med par nges pa ma yin la khyed kyi rang las gzhan pa'i shes pa yod ba las kyang ma yin no //
translated: Some say: Nonexistence is not ascertained as nonexistent because of the absence of a cognition that apprehends itself, since this would lead to the fault of an infinite regress. Nor is it ascertained as existent by a cognition that is different from itself.

original: 'o na ga las yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ga las yin zhe na /
translated: Well then, how is it ascertained?

original: dngos po med par rtogs pa bum pa med do zhes bya ba de lta bu'i rnam pa can med pa'i shes pa gang yin pa de las med pa'i tha snyad du 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: dngos po med par rtogs pa bum pa med do zhes bya ba de lta bu'i rnam pa can med pa'i shes pa gang yin pa de las med pa'i tha snyad du 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: The convention of nonexistence is from a cognition of nonexistence, such as the cognition that has the aspect “There is no vase.”

original: mngon sum ni yul can du 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon sum ni yul can du 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is contradictory for it to be the object of direct perception.

original: ma bzung ba 'dzin pa nyid kyis de ni rang rgyud pa yin gyi dran pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ma bzung ba 'dzin pa nyid kyis de ni rang rgyud pa yin gyi dran pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not memory, because it apprehends what has not been apprehended.

original: de'i phyir dngos po med pa zhes bya ba'i tshad ma yin no zhes zer ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir dngos po med pa zhes bya ba'i tshad ma yin no zhes zer ro //
translated: Therefore, it is a valid cognition called “nonexistent object.”

original: 'di la rang gi yul la chad mar 'gyur ba 'ga' zhig ni don las dngos su 'byung ba yin te /
analyzed: 'di la rang gi yul la chad mar 'gyur ba 'ga' zhig ni don las dngos su 'byung ba yin te /
translated: In this regard, some valid cognitions arise from an object through a direct process,

original: dper na mngon sum lta bu'am yang na brgyud pa ste /
analyzed: dper na mngon sum lta bu'am yang na brgyud pa ste /
translated: like perception, or through an indirect process,

original: dper na rjes su dpag pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na rjes su dpag pa lta bu'o //
translated: like inference.

original: dngos po med pa'i shes pa ni rjes su dpag pa ma yin te /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i shes pa ni rjes su dpag pa ma yin te /
translated: The cognition of nonexistence is not inference,

original: dngos po med pa la rtags mi 'grub pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: dngos po med pa la rtags mi 'grub pa'i phyir te /
translated: because a reason is not established in regard to nonexistence.

original: gtan tshigs thigs pa nas bshad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs thigs pa nas bshad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is explained in the Tattvaṭīkā.

original: de lta na 'o na gang zhig 'di'i yul du 'gyur ba dang / de la yang 'di tshad mar 'gyur ba'i dngos po med par rtogs pa de ga las 'gyur /
analyzed: de lta na 'o na gang zhig 'di'i yul du 'gyur ba dang / de la yang 'di tshad mar 'gyur ba'i dngos po med par rtogs pa de ga las 'gyur /
translated: If that is so, then what is its object, and how does one understand the nonexistence of that object, and how does it become a valid cognition in regard to that?

original: re zhig dngos po med pa las ma yin te /
analyzed: re zhig dngos po med pa las ma yin te /
translated: It is not from a nonexistent object.

original: gang gi phyir dngos po med pa ni dngos sam brgyud pas 'ga' yang rgyur 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir dngos po med pa ni dngos sam brgyud pas 'ga' yang rgyur 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: Because a non-entity is not a cause, either directly or indirectly.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: nus pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nus pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not possible.

original: de lta na ni 'o na nus pa yod par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: de lta na ni 'o na nus pa yod par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If that is so, then it would have the capacity.

original: 'o na ni dngos po nyid du 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'o na ni dngos po nyid du 'gyur te /
translated: Well then, it would be an entity,

original: nus pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nus pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it has the nature of capacity.

original: dang zhes mthar brjod pa ni rim pa gzhan yin no //
analyzed: dang zhes mthar brjod pa ni rim pa gzhan yin no //
translated: The word “also” at the end indicates another way of looking at this.

original: gzhan yang med pa de nyams pa med pas de'i 'bras bu rtag tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang med pa de nyams pa med pas de'i 'bras bu rtag tu 'gyur ro //
translated: Moreover, since that non-entity is not destroyed, its effect would be permanent.

original: rtag pa yang lhan cig byed pa'i dbang gis @91b res 'ga' byed pa yang ma yin te ltos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtag pa yang lhan cig byed pa'i dbang gis @91b res 'ga' byed pa yang ma yin te ltos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And a permanent entity cannot be a cause sometimes due to the influence of cooperating conditions, because it is not dependent on anything else.

original: ci ltar ltos pa med ce na /
analyzed: ci ltar ltos pa med ce na /
translated: How is it not dependent on anything else?

original: ltos pa ni khyad par thob pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ltos pa ni khyad par thob pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because dependence is characterized by the acquisition of a distinction.

original: de yang khyad par du 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: de yang khyad par du 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: And that would be a distinction.

original: 'gyur la rag la dngos po med par ni mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gyur la rag la dngos po med par ni mi 'gyur ro //
translated: It would be, but it would not be a non-entity.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: dngos po'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the characteristic of an entity.

original: rang bzhin snga ma 'dor ba dang rang bzhin dang 'brel pa ni dngos po'i ngo bo yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin snga ma 'dor ba dang rang bzhin dang 'brel pa ni dngos po'i ngo bo yin no //
translated: The essence of an entity is the connection with a prior nature and the abandonment of a prior nature.

original: gal te de dag dngos po med pa la yod na ni de'i dngos po nyid du 'gyur gyi dngos po med ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te de dag dngos po med pa la yod na ni de'i dngos po nyid du 'gyur gyi dngos po med ba ni ma yin no //
translated: If they exist in the absence of an entity, then they would be entities, and not the absence of an entity.

original: de'i phyir gang zhig yul du 'gyur ba dang de la 'di tshad mar 'gyur ba dngos po med pa las ni rtogs pa der 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir gang zhig yul du 'gyur ba dang de la 'di tshad mar 'gyur ba dngos po med pa las ni rtogs pa der 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the absence of an entity cannot be the object of a valid cognition, nor can it be the object of a cognition that arises from an entity.

original: dngos po med pa zhes bya ba yang zhes bya ba la yang na ni bsdu ba ste /
analyzed: dngos po med pa zhes bya ba yang zhes bya ba la yang na ni bsdu ba ste /
translated: The word “also” in the phrase “the absence of an entity also” indicates that the absence of an entity is included in the object of a valid cognition.

original: skyon 'dir yang 'gyur te dngos po yod pa ma yin no zhes dngos po bkag pa brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: skyon 'dir yang 'gyur te dngos po yod pa ma yin no zhes dngos po bkag pa brjod pa yin no //
translated: This error also arises: the expression “the absence of an entity” is a negation of an entity.

original: de lta yin dang shugs kyis na dngos po med pa las byung ba yin no zhes bya ba'i ngag gi don ni dngos po bkag pa las byung ba yin te /
analyzed: de lta yin dang shugs kyis na dngos po med pa las byung ba yin no zhes bya ba'i ngag gi don ni dngos po bkag pa las byung ba yin te /
translated: If that is so, then the meaning of the statement “arises from the absence of an entity” is that it arises from the negation of an entity.

original: dngos po las byung ba ma yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos po las byung ba ma yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: It would be as if one said, “It does not arise from an entity,”

original: dgag pa'i bsdu pa gzhi mthun pa'am gzhi tha dad ba gang dang 'brel pa'i don de las tshig gi don phyi ma de lta bu nyid zlog par byed de /
analyzed: dgag pa'i bsdu pa gzhi mthun pa'am gzhi tha dad ba gang dang 'brel pa'i don de las tshig gi don phyi ma de lta bu nyid zlog par byed de /
translated: In the case of a negative concord, the latter term of the expression is related to the basis of the concord, whether it is the same or different, and it is the meaning of the latter term that is negated.

original: dper na bram ze dngos po med do zhes bya bas dngos po ma yin no zhes rtogs pa dang / dngos po med pas byas pa ni dngos pos ma byas pa zhes bya ba yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na bram ze dngos po med do zhes bya bas dngos po ma yin no zhes rtogs pa dang / dngos po med pas byas pa ni dngos pos ma byas pa zhes bya ba yin pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, when one says, “The brahmin does not exist,” one understands that he is not non-existent, and when one says, “It is produced by non-entity,” one understands that it is not produced by an entity.

original: de bzhin du dngos po med pa las byung ba yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du dngos po med pa las byung ba yin no //
translated: In the same way, one says, “It arises from non-entity,”

original: dngos po las ni ma byung ngo zhes brjod pa nas shes pa 'di'i rgyu bkag par 'gyur te /
analyzed: dngos po las ni ma byung ngo zhes brjod pa nas shes pa 'di'i rgyu bkag par 'gyur te /
translated: and “It does not arise from an entity,” and so on, and thus the cause of this cognition is negated.

original: des na rgyu med pa nyid du brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: des na rgyu med pa nyid du brjod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is said to be without a cause.

original: 'on te dgag pa'i bsdu ba phyi ma'i tshig gi don med pas nye bar mtshon pa'i rdzas la 'jug pa de'i phyir dngos po nyid 'ga' zhig dngos po med pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te dgag pa'i bsdu ba phyi ma'i tshig gi don med pas nye bar mtshon pa'i rdzas la 'jug pa de'i phyir dngos po nyid 'ga' zhig dngos po med pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if the latter term of the negative concord is related to a substance that is indicated by the absence of the former term, then an entity is a certain kind of non-entity.

original: de lta na ni 'o na dngos po nyid ming gzhan gyis brjod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na ni 'o na dngos po nyid ming gzhan gyis brjod par 'gyur ro //
translated: If that were so, then the thing itself would be expressed by another name.

original: des na de dngos po'i shes pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ji ltar dngos po med pa'i yul can yin /
analyzed: des na de dngos po'i shes pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ji ltar dngos po med pa'i yul can yin /
translated: Therefore, since it is the cognition of a thing, how could it have a non-thing as its object?

original: 'dis ni sgra'i don yin yang 'dod pa'i rjes su 'gro ba ni ma yin pa bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dis ni sgra'i don yin yang 'dod pa'i rjes su 'gro ba ni ma yin pa bstan par 'gyur ro //
translated: This shows that even though it is the meaning of a word, it does not follow the desire.

original: de'i phyir yul med pas mi skye ba'i phyir rtogs pa @92a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir yul med pas mi skye ba'i phyir rtogs pa @92a * //
translated: Therefore, because there is no object, it is not possible that it arises.

original: de ni srid pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ni srid pa ma yin no //
translated: That is not possible.

original: gzhan yang mngon sum gyis gzung ba dang 'dzin pa ma yin pa'i phyir na mthong ba'i de ma thag pa rang rgyud yin no zhes bya bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang mngon sum gyis gzung ba dang 'dzin pa ma yin pa'i phyir na mthong ba'i de ma thag pa rang rgyud yin no zhes bya bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Moreover, because it is not the apprehended object and apprehending subject of direct perception, it is not tenable to say that the subsequent cognition is autonomous.

original: mngon sum gyi stobs las skyes pa yin na ni mthong ba de nyid med par shes par bya ba de la nus par khas blangs pa yin pa'i phyir de nyid tshad mar 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: mngon sum gyi stobs las skyes pa yin na ni mthong ba de nyid med par shes par bya ba de la nus par khas blangs pa yin pa'i phyir de nyid tshad mar 'gyur gyi /
translated: If it arises from the power of direct perception, then it is accepted that the cognition of that object that is to be known without seeing it has the capacity to do so, and therefore that direct perception itself would be valid knowledge.

original: med par shes pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: med par shes pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not the cognition of nonexistence.

original: gal te mngon sum ni med pa'i yul can ma yin la /
analyzed: gal te mngon sum ni med pa'i yul can ma yin la /
translated: If you think that direct perception does not have a nonexistent object,

original: yul ma yin pa la yang tshad ma ma yin pa ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: yul ma yin pa la yang tshad ma ma yin pa ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: and that it is not a valid cognition with respect to a nonexistent object,

original: bshad pa / mngon sum gyi rnam pa sngon po la sogs pa nges pa de'i shugs des don gzhan 'gog pa'i phyir mngon sum nyid tshad ma yin no //
analyzed: bshad pa / mngon sum gyi rnam pa sngon po la sogs pa nges pa de'i shugs des don gzhan 'gog pa'i phyir mngon sum nyid tshad ma yin no //
translated: we reply: The aspect of direct perception, such as the ascertainment of blue, is a valid cognition because it indirectly negates other objects.

original: gang gis der snang ba'i shes pa'i gzung bya yin pa'i phyir na mngon sum la de med pas yul ma yin par 'gyur ba dngos po med pa zhes bya ba rang bzhin dang ldan ba ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gang gis der snang ba'i shes pa'i gzung bya yin pa'i phyir na mngon sum la de med pas yul ma yin par 'gyur ba dngos po med pa zhes bya ba rang bzhin dang ldan ba ni ma yin gyi /
translated: That which is the object of the consciousness to which it appears is not a nonexistent thing that is said to be an object of direct perception, because it does not exist.

original: 'on kyang rnam par rtog pas tha snyad du bya ba 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
analyzed: 'on kyang rnam par rtog pas tha snyad du bya ba 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
translated: However, it is merely a convention designated by thought.

original: dper na mngon sum gyis gzung ba la mngon sum gyi stobs kyis tha snyad du byed pa ni mngon sum tshad ma yin pa de bzhin du dngos po med pa la mngon sum gyi rnam pa'i stobs kyis tha snyad du byed pa na mngon sum tshad ma yin
analyzed: dper na mngon sum gyis gzung ba la mngon sum gyi stobs kyis tha snyad du byed pa ni mngon sum tshad ma yin pa de bzhin du dngos po med pa la mngon sum gyi rnam pa'i stobs kyis tha snyad du byed pa na mngon sum tshad ma yin
translated: Similarly, when one conventionally designates a non-entity by the power of the aspect of direct perception, it is direct perception.

original: no // de'i rnam pa nges pa zhes bya ba ga las she na /
analyzed: no // de'i rnam pa nges pa zhes bya ba ga las she na /
translated: How is it ascertained as its aspect?

original: shes pa gcig la 'dre ba'i dngos po'i rnam pa nges pa gang gis 'dre ba gang zhig spong bar nus pa de la rnam pa gzhan dang 'dres na don de spong ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes pa gcig la 'dre ba'i dngos po'i rnam pa nges pa gang gis 'dre ba gang zhig spong bar nus pa de la rnam pa gzhan dang 'dres na don de spong ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because when the aspect of a mixed entity is ascertained in a single cognition, one is able to eliminate the mixture. If it were mixed with another aspect, that object would not be eliminated.

original: de'i rnam pa nges pas 'dres pa gzhan spong ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i rnam pa nges pas 'dres pa gzhan spong ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, by ascertaining its aspect, one eliminates the other mixture.

original: gang gi phyir mngon sum nyid med pa la tshad ma yin pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir mngon sum nyid med pa la tshad ma yin pa de'i phyir /
translated: Because it is a valid cognition with respect to non-existence,

original: rnam pa nges pa'i mthong ba'i stobs las skyes pa'i shes pa de ni tshad ma ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam pa nges pa'i mthong ba'i stobs las skyes pa'i shes pa de ni tshad ma ma yin te /
translated: the cognition that arises from the power of seeing the ascertained aspect is not a valid cognition.

original: rang rgyud pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang rgyud pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not autonomous.

original: 'di ltar dbang po la brten pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar dbang po la brten pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not based on a sense faculty,

original: dngos po med pa ni skyed byed ma yin pa'i phyir dang / mngon sum gyi tshad ma ni don gyi 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po med pa ni skyed byed ma yin pa'i phyir dang / mngon sum gyi tshad ma ni don gyi 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because a non-entity is not a producer and because a valid cognition of direct perception is the effect of an object.

original: rtags la brten pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: rtags la brten pa yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not based on a logical reason,

original: med pa la rtags med pa'i phyir dang / skyed par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang / rjes su dpag pa ni don las skye ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med pa la rtags med pa'i phyir dang / skyed par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang / rjes su dpag pa ni don las skye ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because a non-entity has no logical reason, because it is not a producer, and because inference is born from an object.

original: 'di na bum ba med do snyam pa'i rnam par @92b rtog pa 'di mngon sum gyi stobs las skyes so zhes ci ltar brjod de /
analyzed: 'di na bum ba med do snyam pa'i rnam par @92b rtog pa 'di mngon sum gyi stobs las skyes so zhes ci ltar brjod de /
translated: How can you say that the conceptual thought “The pot does not exist here” is born from the power of direct perception?

original: gang gi phyir rtogs pa 'di ni snang ba mi dmigs pa'i rtags las yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rtogs pa 'di ni snang ba mi dmigs pa'i rtags las yin no zhe na /
translated: Because this understanding is from the logical reason of the non-apprehension of the appearance.

original: bshad pa / nges pa gang gis mngon sum gyi de ma thag bar 'di ni dmigs so //
analyzed: bshad pa / nges pa gang gis mngon sum gyi de ma thag bar 'di ni dmigs so //
translated: We reply: What is the certainty that this is apprehended immediately after direct perception?

original: 'di ni mi dmigs so zhes sgrub pa dang dgag pa'i rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba de ltar zhes bya ba rnam pa nges par skyes pa de ni mngon sum nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni mi dmigs so zhes sgrub pa dang dgag pa'i rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba de ltar zhes bya ba rnam pa nges par skyes pa de ni mngon sum nyid yin no //
translated: This is direct perception, because it is the definite arising of the thought, “This is not non-apprehended,” which is a thought that affirms and a thought that denies.

original: dper na sngon po mthong ba las dmigs pa 'di ni sngon po yin gyi ser po ni ma yin no zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na sngon po mthong ba las dmigs pa 'di ni sngon po yin gyi ser po ni ma yin no zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, it is like the thought, “This object that is seen is blue, not yellow.”

original: des cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: des cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What is the point of this?

original: dmigs pa sgrub ba dang dgag pa'i rnam par rtog pa skyed pa gang yin ba ni mngon sum nyid yin la /
analyzed: dmigs pa sgrub ba dang dgag pa'i rnam par rtog pa skyed pa gang yin ba ni mngon sum nyid yin la /
translated: The arising of the thought that affirms and the thought that denies an object is direct perception.

original: de las kyang bltar rung ba'i dmigs pa dgag ba byed pa'i mngon sum gyis bum pa med do zhes bya ba'i yul med pa nges pa yin pa'i phyir bum pa la mngon sum nyid tshad ma yin no //
analyzed: de las kyang bltar rung ba'i dmigs pa dgag ba byed pa'i mngon sum gyis bum pa med do zhes bya ba'i yul med pa nges pa yin pa'i phyir bum pa la mngon sum nyid tshad ma yin no //
translated: Moreover, because the direct perception that denies an object that can be seen ascertains the nonexistence of an object, saying, “There is no pot,” the pot is directly perceived.

original: 'on kyang bltar mi rung ba dag kyang yod srid pas /
analyzed: 'on kyang bltar mi rung ba dag kyang yod srid pas /
translated: However, there are also things that cannot be seen.

original: ci mngon sum 'dis sa phyogs 'ba' zhig gzung ba'am bum pa dang bral ba ma gzung ngam zhes mngon sum gyis nges kyang med pa'i tha snyad la the tshom za ba na snang ba mi dmigs pas mngon sum gyis nges pa'i bum ba med pa'i tha snyad du🔽byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: ci mngon sum 'dis sa phyogs 'ba' zhig gzung ba'am bum pa dang bral ba ma gzung ngam zhes mngon sum gyis nges kyang med pa'i tha snyad la the tshom za ba na snang ba mi dmigs pas mngon sum gyis nges pa'i bum ba med pa'i tha snyad du byed pa yin gyi /
translated: When one is certain by direct perception that there is no pot, one uses the term “nonexistent.”

original: rang nyid kyis nges par byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rang nyid kyis nges par byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But one does not ascertain it oneself.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gal te 'di na snang du rung ba'i bum pa yod na shes pa gcig la 'dre pa nyid kyis sa phyogs 'ba' zhig mthong bar mi 'gyur ro zhes mthong ba'i 'du byed ma bor bar 'jug pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gal te 'di na snang du rung ba'i bum pa yod na shes pa gcig la 'dre pa nyid kyis sa phyogs 'ba' zhig mthong bar mi 'gyur ro zhes mthong ba'i 'du byed ma bor bar 'jug pa ni /
translated: For this reason, if a pot that is suitable to appear here exists, then one would not see only the place, because it would be mixed into the cognition.

original: mthong ba'i stobs kyis go bar bya ba'i dngos po med pa la tha snyad du byed pa yin no //
analyzed: mthong ba'i stobs kyis go bar bya ba'i dngos po med pa la tha snyad du byed pa yin no //
translated: Without abandoning the activity of seeing, one engages in the term “nonexistent” for a thing that is understood by the power of seeing.

original: gang gi phyir dmigs pa sgrub pa dang dgag pa mngon sum gyis nus pa yin pa de'i phyir dmigs pa dang mi dmigs pa'i dngos po sgrub pa dang dgag pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni tshad ma ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir dmigs pa sgrub pa dang dgag pa mngon sum gyis nus pa yin pa de'i phyir dmigs pa dang mi dmigs pa'i dngos po sgrub pa dang dgag pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni tshad ma ma yin no //
translated: Because the establishment and refutation of objects is possible through direct perception, therefore the conceptual thoughts that establish and refute the existence and nonexistence of objects are not valid cognitions.

original: dper na sgrub pa'i rnam par rtog pa dmigs pa nges pa'i rjes su 'brang bas rang rgyud pa'i tshad ma ma yin pa de bzhin du bum pa med do snyam pa'i dgag pa'i rnam par rtog pa yang mngon sum la rag las pa bltar rung ba dmigs pa
analyzed: dper na sgrub pa'i rnam par rtog pa dmigs pa nges pa'i rjes su 'brang bas rang rgyud pa'i tshad ma ma yin pa de bzhin du bum pa med do snyam pa'i dgag pa'i rnam par rtog pa yang mngon sum la rag las pa bltar rung ba dmigs pa
translated: For example, just as the conceptual thought that establishes, following after the ascertainment of the object, is not an autonomous valid cognition, in the same way, the conceptual thought that refutes, thinking “the pot does not exist,” is also dependent on direct perception.

original: med par nges pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yin pa'i phyir med pa la rang rgyud @93a * //
analyzed: med par nges pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yin pa'i phyir med pa la rang rgyud @93a * //
translated: The nonexistence of the object that is suitable to appear is ascertained following after the nonobservation of the object.

original: pa'i tshad ma ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir gnyi ga brjod do //
analyzed: pa'i tshad ma ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir gnyi ga brjod do //
translated: Therefore, it is taught that nonexistence is not an autonomous object of valid cognition.

original: de lta ma yin na dgag pa'i rnam par rtog pa nyid kyi skabs yin pa'i phyir sgrub pa'i rnam par rtog pa smos pa don med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na dgag pa'i rnam par rtog pa nyid kyi skabs yin pa'i phyir sgrub pa'i rnam par rtog pa smos pa don med par 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, because this is the context of the conceptual thought that refutes, it would be pointless to mention the conceptual thought that establishes.

original: de'i phyir bltar rung ba'i dngos po dag rang las khyad par can gyi shes pa las med pa rtogs par bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir bltar rung ba'i dngos po dag rang las khyad par can gyi shes pa las med pa rtogs par bshad pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is explained that one understands that things that can be seen do not exist apart from a cognition that is superior to them.

original: bltar mi rung ba dag la ci ltar med par rtogs she na /
analyzed: bltar mi rung ba dag la ci ltar med par rtogs she na /
translated: How is it that one understands that things that cannot be seen do not exist?

original: bshad pa / mi snang ba mi dmigs pas med par nges pa mi rung ba'i phyir /
analyzed: bshad pa / mi snang ba mi dmigs pas med par nges pa mi rung ba'i phyir /
translated: It is said: Because it is not possible to ascertain nonexistence by the non-apprehension of the non-appearing,

original: gzhan du rung mi snang ba mi dmigs par ni gzhag pa yod pa'i tha snyad 'gog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du rung mi snang ba mi dmigs par ni gzhag pa yod pa'i tha snyad 'gog par 'gyur ro //
translated: it is possible that the non-apprehension of the non-appearing is posited as the negation of the convention of existence.

original: nges par mi rung ba ci lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: nges par mi rung ba ci lta bu zhe na /
translated: How is it not possible to ascertain?

original: dper na gzhan gyi rgyud la yid kyis myong ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang / 'dod chags la sogs pa bltar mi rung ba'i phyir rtags med par mi nges pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na gzhan gyi rgyud la yid kyis myong ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang / 'dod chags la sogs pa bltar mi rung ba'i phyir rtags med par mi nges pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like the fact that the mental conceptions experienced in another's mind-stream and attachment, etc., are not ascertained as nonexistent because of the absence of evidence.

original: gang gi phyir 'bras bu nges pa med pa can yin pa de'i phyir gtan tshigs mi mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa sgrub par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'bras bu nges pa med pa can yin pa de'i phyir gtan tshigs mi mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa sgrub par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: Because the effect is not ascertained, therefore the reason is not able to prove the exclusion from the discordant class.

original: 'o na gang gis nus she na gtan tshigs la dang po snang ba mi dmigs pa dbang du byas pa yin no //
analyzed: 'o na gang gis nus she na gtan tshigs la dang po snang ba mi dmigs pa dbang du byas pa yin no //
translated: Well then, by what is it possible? The reason is that the first is from the perspective of the non-observation of appearance.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: nges pa'i tshul gsum gyis bsgrub bya sgrub pa'i phyir dang / nges pa'i sgrub pa yang dang po yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nges pa'i tshul gsum gyis bsgrub bya sgrub pa'i phyir dang / nges pa'i sgrub pa yang dang po yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the three modes of the reason establish the probandum, and because the establishment of the reason is the first.

original: ci ste snang ba mi dmigs pa 'di ltar sbyar bar bya zhe na /🔽bdag nyid kyi sbyor ba dag la de dgag pa'i sgo nas rang gi ngo bo sbyor ba'am /
analyzed: ci ste snang ba mi dmigs pa 'di ltar sbyar bar bya zhe na / bdag nyid kyi sbyor ba dag la de dgag pa'i sgo nas rang gi ngo bo sbyor ba'am /
translated: If one asks, “Why is this non-observation of appearance applied in this way?”🔽In one’s own application, the essence is applied by way of the negation of that.

original: gang gi tshe sgrub pa'i sgo nas sbyor ba na don la gnod byed ngo bo'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe sgrub pa'i sgo nas sbyor ba na don la gnod byed ngo bo'o //
translated: Or, when one applies by way of establishment, the essence is the object of harm.

original: ci ltar don gzhan gyis gnod par byed pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar don gzhan gyis gnod par byed pa yin zhe na /
translated: If one asks, “How is it that the object of harm is another object?”

original: de dag la 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag la 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is because they are contradictory.

original: 'gal ba gang las she na /
analyzed: 'gal ba gang las she na /
translated: If one asks, “From what contradiction?”

original: rgyu ma tshang ba med par 'byung bar yod pa na gzhan yod pa las med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: rgyu ma tshang ba med par 'byung bar yod pa na gzhan yod pa las med pa'i phyir te /
translated: It is because when something exists by arising from a complete cause, it does not exist from the existence of another.

original: gang yod pa gang yod na ldog pa de dag ni grang ba dang dro ba bzhin du 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: gang yod pa gang yod na ldog pa de dag ni grang ba dang dro ba bzhin du 'gal ba yin no //
translated: Whatever exists, if it exists, is incompatible with those that are reversed, like cold and heat.

original: 'di rnam par grol ba'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: 'di rnam par grol ba'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: In order to liberate from this, it is explained:

original: gang gi tshe med pa dang med pa'i tha snyad nges pa'i rgyu mi mthun pa'i phyogs gtan tshigs ldog pa sgrub pa der nyid med pa sgrub pa'i phyir rab tu sbyor ba de'i tshe rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis rab tu sbyor te /
analyzed: gang gi tshe med pa dang med pa'i tha snyad nges pa'i rgyu mi mthun pa'i phyogs gtan tshigs ldog pa sgrub pa der nyid med pa sgrub pa'i phyir rab tu sbyor ba de'i tshe rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis rab tu sbyor te /
translated: When the cause of the ascertainment of non-existence and the convention of non-existence is the opposite of the reason, the proof of the reversal, at that time, in order to prove non-existence, one applies by means of one's own nature.

original: rang bzhin mi dmigs pa dang / khyab byed mi dmigs pa dang / rgyu mi dmigs pa @93b dag tu mi dmigs zhes rang bzhin la sogs pa mi dmigs pa'i rang bzhin nyid nye bar sbyor ba'am /
analyzed: rang bzhin mi dmigs pa dang / khyab byed mi dmigs pa dang / rgyu mi dmigs pa @93b dag tu mi dmigs zhes rang bzhin la sogs pa mi dmigs pa'i rang bzhin nyid nye bar sbyor ba'am /
translated: The non-observation of nature, the non-observation of the pervader, and the non-observation of the cause are applied by the nature of non-observation of nature and so forth, or non-observation.

original: yang na dgag par bya ba grang ba'i reg pa la sogs pa la gnod par byed pa me la sogs pa'i ngo bo nye bar bkod pa'i sgo nas mi dmigs pa de nyid rab tu sbyor ro //
analyzed: yang na dgag par bya ba grang ba'i reg pa la sogs pa la gnod par byed pa me la sogs pa'i ngo bo nye bar bkod pa'i sgo nas mi dmigs pa de nyid rab tu sbyor ro //
translated: Or, in order to negate the object of negation, such as cold touch, one applies that very non-observation by means of positing the nature of fire, which is the harm-doer.

original: 'di ni grang ba'i reg pa med de me yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin 'gal ba dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ni grang ba'i reg pa med de me yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin 'gal ba dmigs pa ste /
translated: This is the observation of an incompatible nature, because fire exists.

original: de la sogs pa rgyas par sngar dper brjod zin to //
analyzed: de la sogs pa rgyas par sngar dper brjod zin to //
translated: This and so on have been extensively cited as examples above.

original: don la gnod par byed pa'i rgyu 'gal ba'i dbye ba bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: don la gnod par byed pa'i rgyu 'gal ba'i dbye ba bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: To indicate the classification of incompatible causes that undermine the object, it is explained:

original: gang gis na don don la gnod bar byed par 'gyur ba'i 'gal ba de yang ci ltar rtogs she na /
analyzed: gang gis na don don la gnod bar byed par 'gyur ba'i 'gal ba de yang ci ltar rtogs she na /
translated: How is that incompatibility understood by which the object would undermine the object?

original: 'ga' zhig tu rgyu ma tshang ba med pa gang la yod pa de rgyun du 'byung ba las gzhan nye ba med pa'i phyir bzlog par bya ba dang zlog par byed pa de gnyis yul gcig la gnas par 'gal bar rtogs te /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig tu rgyu ma tshang ba med pa gang la yod pa de rgyun du 'byung ba las gzhan nye ba med pa'i phyir bzlog par bya ba dang zlog par byed pa de gnyis yul gcig la gnas par 'gal bar rtogs te /
translated: In some cases, that which has an incomplete cause is interrupted, because there is no other proximity than continuous occurrence. The two, that which is to be interrupted and that which interrupts, are understood to be incompatible in one place,

original: grang ba dang dro ba'i reg pa dag bzhin no //
analyzed: grang ba dang dro ba'i reg pa dag bzhin no //
translated: like the sensation of cold and the sensation of heat.

original: 'gal ba 'di yang rgyas par bshad zin to //
analyzed: 'gal ba 'di yang rgyas par bshad zin to //
translated: This incompatibility has also been explained extensively.

original: de bzhin du 'gal ba gzhan ni ngo bo phan tshun tha dad par nges par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'gal ba gzhan ni ngo bo phan tshun tha dad par nges par 'gyur te /
translated: Similarly, other incompatibilities are ascertained to be different in nature.

original: dper na bstan pa'i dngos po yongs su spangs pas 'jig pa yin pa'i phyir de dag 'gal ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na bstan pa'i dngos po yongs su spangs pas 'jig pa yin pa'i phyir de dag 'gal ba bzhin no //
translated: For example, they are contradictory like the entities of teaching and destruction, because they completely abandon each other.

original: de nyid bshad pa ni phan tshun spangs te gnas pa'i ngo bos ni bdag nyid gcig tu 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: de nyid bshad pa ni phan tshun spangs te gnas pa'i ngo bos ni bdag nyid gcig tu 'gal ba yin no //
translated: That itself is explained: by the nature of mutually exclusive contradiction, they are contradictory in being one entity.

original: de lta yin dang lhan cig mi gnas pa'i 'gal ba ni 'dis bsdus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta yin dang lhan cig mi gnas pa'i 'gal ba ni 'dis bsdus pa ma yin te /
translated: If that were so, then the contradiction of not coexisting would not be included in this,

original: lhan cig mi gnas pa ni rang bzhin gnyis la gnas pa'i phyir dang / 'di ni gcig pa tsam med pa'i 'bras bu can yin pa'i phyir rtag pa dang mi rtag pa bzhin du tha dad par nye bar bkod do //
analyzed: lhan cig mi gnas pa ni rang bzhin gnyis la gnas pa'i phyir dang / 'di ni gcig pa tsam med pa'i 'bras bu can yin pa'i phyir rtag pa dang mi rtag pa bzhin du tha dad par nye bar bkod do //
translated: because not coexisting is based on two natures, and because this has the effect of mere non-one, it is posited as separate like permanent and impermanent.

original: tshad mas gnod pa'i phyir yang gnod par bya ba gzhan tshad ma'i rgyu'i rtags dang 'gal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: tshad mas gnod pa'i phyir yang gnod par bya ba gzhan tshad ma'i rgyu'i rtags dang 'gal bar 'gyur te /
translated: Also, because it is harmed by valid cognition, the other object of harm is contradictory with the reason of the cause of valid cognition,

original: ltos pa dang bcas ba dang nges pa'i dngos po bzhin no //
analyzed: ltos pa dang bcas ba dang nges pa'i dngos po bzhin no //
translated: like the thing that is dependent and the thing that is ascertained.

original: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: In order to teach that itself, it is explained:

original: gal te 'ga' zhig gi de nyid la tshad mas gnod par byed pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te 'ga' zhig gi de nyid la tshad mas gnod par byed pa yin na /
translated: If it is the case that some valid cognition contradicts reality,

original: de'i rtags dang yang gnod par bya ba 'gal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i rtags dang yang gnod par bya ba 'gal bar 'gyur te /
translated: then it would contradict the reason.

original: dper na nges pa'i dngos po nyid ltos pa dang bcas pa dang lhan cig 'gal ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na nges pa'i dngos po nyid ltos pa dang bcas pa dang lhan cig 'gal ba bzhin no //
translated: For example, it would be like the case of something definite being dependent.

original: tshad ma yang 'jig pa rgyu yod do zhes smra ba rnams kyi skye ba dang ldan @94a * //
analyzed: tshad ma yang 'jig pa rgyu yod do zhes smra ba rnams kyi skye ba dang ldan @94a * //
translated: Also, in regard to the argument that “destruction has a cause,” those who maintain that “destruction has a cause”🔽should not accept that “that which is produced definitely disintegrates.”

original: pa ni 'jig par nges par khas blang bar mi bya ste zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba ste /
analyzed: pa ni 'jig par nges par khas blang bar mi bya ste zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba ste /
translated: This is the conclusion.

original: 'jig pa'i ngo bor 'gyur ba rgyu gzhan la ltos par khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jig pa'i ngo bor 'gyur ba rgyu gzhan la ltos par khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is accepted that it would become the nature of destruction that depends on another cause.

original: rjes su 'gro ba ston pa ni gang zhig don gyi ngo bo gang du 'gyur ba rang gi rgyu las rgyu gzhan du ltos pa de ni der yang nges par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba ston pa ni gang zhig don gyi ngo bo gang du 'gyur ba rang gi rgyu las rgyu gzhan du ltos pa de ni der yang nges par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: The demonstration of the pervasion is this: That which becomes the nature of an object from its own cause, but depends on another cause for that, is not ascertained to be that.

original: dper na gos kyi tshon ltos pa dang bcas pas der nges pa ma yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na gos kyi tshon ltos pa dang bcas pas der nges pa ma yin pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like the case of the color of cloth that is dependent and not ascertained to be that.

original: de la 'dir ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid nges par 'gyur ba dang 'gal ba nges pa med pas khyab pa de ni de dang 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: de la 'dir ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid nges par 'gyur ba dang 'gal ba nges pa med pas khyab pa de ni de dang 'gal ba yin no //
translated: Here, the pervasion is that whatever is dependent is necessarily not ascertained, and that is contradictory to being ascertained.

original: 'khrul pa brjod pa ni 'jig pa'i rgyu rnams kyang ltos pa dang bcas pa'i dngos po der nges pa'i phyir ltos pa dang bcas pa'i dngos po nyid kyis nges par 'gyur ba med pa'i skyon med do zhe na /
analyzed: 'khrul pa brjod pa ni 'jig pa'i rgyu rnams kyang ltos pa dang bcas pa'i dngos po der nges pa'i phyir ltos pa dang bcas pa'i dngos po nyid kyis nges par 'gyur ba med pa'i skyon med do zhe na /
translated: As for the statement of error, since the causes of destruction are ascertained as that which is dependent, there is no fault of the absence of ascertainment due to the nature of being dependent.

original: de lta ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: rgyu rnams tshang par nges pa dang gegs byed pa med par nges pa gang yin pa de med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu rnams tshang par nges pa dang gegs byed pa med par nges pa gang yin pa de med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no ascertainment that the causes are complete and there is no ascertainment that there are no obstructions.

original: ci ltar nges pa med ce na /
analyzed: ci ltar nges pa med ce na /
translated: How is there no ascertainment?

original: gang gi phyir dngos po yod na rang gi rgyu'i tshogs pa la rag las pa don de la mngon sum du phyogs pa 'jig pa sgrub par byed pa gzhan dag kyang yod par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir dngos po yod na rang gi rgyu'i tshogs pa la rag las pa don de la mngon sum du phyogs pa 'jig pa sgrub par byed pa gzhan dag kyang yod par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
translated: Because when a thing exists, it is dependent on its own collection of causes, and other things that are directed toward that object and establish its destruction would also exist.

original: gtan tshigs bshad pa /
analyzed: gtan tshigs bshad pa /
translated: The explanation of the reason.

original: 'jig pa'i rgyu rnams de la rag ma las pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jig pa'i rgyu rnams de la rag ma las pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the causes of cessation do not depend on it.

original: 'on te 'jig par byed pa'i chos dag ni gzhig par bya ba la rag las pa yin gyi /
analyzed: 'on te 'jig par byed pa'i chos dag ni gzhig par bya ba la rag las pa yin gyi /
translated: But if you say that the phenomena that cause cessation depend on what is to be ceased,

original: rgyu gzhan la ltos pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: rgyu gzhan la ltos pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: and do not depend on other causes,

original: de'i chos yin na yang bdag nyid la rag las ba 'jig pa'i rgyu de nyid las don skad cig mar 'dod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i chos yin na yang bdag nyid la rag las ba 'jig pa'i rgyu de nyid las don skad cig mar 'dod par 'gyur ro //
translated: then even if it is the property of that, the cause of cessation itself depends on itself, and you accept that the object is momentary.

original: 'di ltar gal te 'jig pa'i rgyu gzhan la ltos pa dang bcas pa yin na ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar gal te 'jig pa'i rgyu gzhan la ltos pa dang bcas pa yin na ni /
translated: In this way, if it depends on another cause of cessation,

original: de'i tshe ma tshang ba dang gags byed pa srid pas ma nges pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i tshe ma tshang ba dang gags byed pa srid pas ma nges pa nyid do //
translated: then at that time, since incompleteness and obstruction are possible, it is not definite.

original: de tsam la ltos pa yin na ni grub pa'i don de nyid las skad cig gnyis pa la 'jig pa'i rgyu grub cing /
analyzed: de tsam la ltos pa yin na ni grub pa'i don de nyid las skad cig gnyis pa la 'jig pa'i rgyu grub cing /
translated: If it depends on just that, then the cause of cessation in the second moment is established from just that established object,

original: skad cig gsum pa la de nyid kyis dngos po bzlog pa yin no //
analyzed: skad cig gsum pa la de nyid kyis dngos po bzlog pa yin no //
translated: and in the third moment, it is ceased by that itself.

original: gal te de lta na skad cig gnyis gnas par 'gyur ba ma yin nam skad cig ma nyid ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de lta na skad cig gnyis gnas par 'gyur ba ma yin nam skad cig ma nyid ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If that is so, does it not last for two moments? It is not momentary.

original: skad cig smos pa ni dus cung zad mtshon pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: skad cig smos pa ni dus cung zad mtshon pa'i phyir te /
translated: The term “moment” is used to indicate a very short time.

original: re zhig zla ba dang po dang bskal par gnas pa bzlog pa yin no //
analyzed: re zhig zla ba dang po dang bskal par gnas pa bzlog pa yin no //
translated: For example, the first month and the first eon are used to indicate a very short time.

original: @94b yang na gzhig par bya ba ni rgyu nyid las 'jig par byed pa skye la de las ni skad cig gnyis pa la dngos po 'jig pa'i phyir skad cig ma kho na'o //
analyzed: @94b yang na gzhig par bya ba ni rgyu nyid las 'jig par byed pa skye la de las ni skad cig gnyis pa la dngos po 'jig pa'i phyir skad cig ma kho na'o //
translated: Or, the cause of destruction arises from the cause of the thing itself, and since the thing is destroyed in the second moment, it is momentary.

original: gzhig par bya ba tsam las 'jig par byed ba skye ba des na skad cig par ga la 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gzhig par bya ba tsam las 'jig par byed ba skye ba des na skad cig par ga la 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How can it be momentary if the cause of destruction arises from the mere thing?

original: brjod pa / dngos po de nyid la khyad par med pa'i phyir sngar med pa ni phyis kyang med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir de ma thag tu yin pa na skad cig nyid do //
analyzed: brjod pa / dngos po de nyid la khyad par med pa'i phyir sngar med pa ni phyis kyang med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir de ma thag tu yin pa na skad cig nyid do //
translated: We reply: Because it follows that the thing itself would not exist later, just as it did not exist previously, since there is no difference. Therefore, it is momentary, since it is not permanent.

original: gang gi tshe dngos po skyed par byed pa'i tshogs pa nyid las 'jig pa'i rgyu yin pa de'i tshe ni de nyid tshogs pa'i rang bzhin la brjod do //
analyzed: gang gi tshe dngos po skyed par byed pa'i tshogs pa nyid las 'jig pa'i rgyu yin pa de'i tshe ni de nyid tshogs pa'i rang bzhin la brjod do //
translated: When the cause of destruction is in the very assemblage that produces the thing, then it is said to be the nature of the assemblage itself.

original: phyi ma'i rgyun dag kyang de nyid du sbyar ro //
analyzed: phyi ma'i rgyun dag kyang de nyid du sbyar ro //
translated: and the continuum of the later one is connected to that.

original: 'di snyam du de lta na yang skad cig gnyis gnas par 'gyur la /
analyzed: 'di snyam du de lta na yang skad cig gnyis gnas par 'gyur la /
translated: But even so, it follows that the vase would endure for two moments.

original: skad cig tsam gnas kyang 'jig ba rgyu dang bcas pa mi 'dod par thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: skad cig tsam gnas kyang 'jig ba rgyu dang bcas pa mi 'dod par thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
