translated: And even if it endured for just one moment, it would be destroyed without cause.

original: de lta ma yin te gang gi phyir de ltar khyed mi 'dod pa brjod ba yin la /
analyzed: de lta ma yin te gang gi phyir de ltar khyed mi 'dod pa brjod ba yin la /
translated: That is not so, because we do not assert that.

original: rang gi phyogs ni de'am zhes bya ba la sogs pas gzhan brjod par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: rang gi phyogs ni de'am zhes bya ba la sogs pas gzhan brjod par bya ba yin no //
translated: But you should state your own position, such as “It is that.”

original: gang gi tshe bum pa nyid las 'jig par byed pa yin pa de'i tshe de zhes bya ba bum pa'am /🔽gang gi tshe de'i rgyu las skye ba de'i tshe ni bum pa de'i rgyu mi rtag pa nyid kyi rgyu nges par byed par 'dod pa yin na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe bum pa nyid las 'jig par byed pa yin pa de'i tshe de zhes bya ba bum pa'am / gang gi tshe de'i rgyu las skye ba de'i tshe ni bum pa de'i rgyu mi rtag pa nyid kyi rgyu nges par byed par 'dod pa yin na /
translated: If it is destroyed by the vase itself, then it is that vase.🔽If it arises from the cause of that, then it is asserted that the cause of that vase is the cause of impermanence.

original: bum pa de mi rtag pa'i rang bzhin dang / de'i rgyu mi rtag pa'i rang bzhin skyed par byed par yin par ci ste mi 'dod de /
analyzed: bum pa de mi rtag pa'i rang bzhin dang / de'i rgyu mi rtag pa'i rang bzhin skyed par byed par yin par ci ste mi 'dod de /
translated: Why do you not assert that the vase is the nature of impermanence and that its cause is the producer of the nature of impermanence?

original: bum pa'am de'i rgyu ni rang bzhin gyis 'jig pa'i rgyu de bum pa 'jig par nges pa'i nus pa can du skyed pa yin no //
analyzed: bum pa'am de'i rgyu ni rang bzhin gyis 'jig pa'i rgyu de bum pa 'jig par nges pa'i nus pa can du skyed pa yin no //
translated: The vase or its cause generates the cause of its own intrinsic cessation, which has the ability to definitely cause the vase to disintegrate.

original: de lta yin dang bum pa bdag nyid 'jig par byed pa nges par byed pa nyid rang bzhin gyis ldog pa'i chos yin la /
analyzed: de lta yin dang bum pa bdag nyid 'jig par byed pa nges par byed pa nyid rang bzhin gyis ldog pa'i chos yin la /
translated: If that were the case, the vase itself would definitely be the agent of its own disintegration, and it would be a phenomenon that naturally ceases.

original: rgyu yang bum pa 'jig par byed pa nges par byed pa nyid rang bzhin gyis ldog pa'i chos can gyi bum pa sgrub par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: rgyu yang bum pa 'jig par byed pa nges par byed pa nyid rang bzhin gyis ldog pa'i chos can gyi bum pa sgrub par byed pa yin no //
translated: And the cause would be the producer of the vase, which is the agent of the vase’s disintegration, and which is a phenomenon that naturally ceases.

original: de'i phyir bum pa'am de'i rgyu las ni 'jig par byed pa de las ni 'jig pa yin no zhes bya ba'i brgyud pas ci zhig bya /
analyzed: de'i phyir bum pa'am de'i rgyu las ni 'jig par byed pa de las ni 'jig pa yin no zhes bya ba'i brgyud pas ci zhig bya /
translated: Therefore, what is the point of saying that disintegration is from the vase or its cause?

original: 'di snyam du 'ga' zhig 'ga' zhig la ni dngos su nus pa yin la /
analyzed: 'di snyam du 'ga' zhig 'ga' zhig la ni dngos su nus pa yin la /
translated: If you think that some things have the ability to produce something directly,

original: 'ga' zhig la ni brgyud nas yin te /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig la ni brgyud nas yin te /
translated: and some things have the ability to produce something indirectly,

original: dper na rgyun gyis 'jug pa'i skad cig dang po gnyis pa skye ba la ni dngos su nus la /
analyzed: dper na rgyun gyis 'jug pa'i skad cig dang po gnyis pa skye ba la ni dngos su nus la /
translated: for example, the first moment of the continuum directly has the ability to produce the second moment,

original: gsum pa la sogs pa la ni brgyud @95a * //
analyzed: gsum pa la sogs pa la ni brgyud @95a * //
translated: but it indirectly has the ability to produce the third moment and so on.

original: bas nus pa de bzhin du 'dir yang bum pas ni dngos su bdag nyid ldog par mi nus pas zlog par byed pa gzhan byed cing de bzhin du bum pa'i rgyu yang dngos su ldog pa'i chos can gyi bum pa byed par mi nus la /
analyzed: bas nus pa de bzhin du 'dir yang bum pas ni dngos su bdag nyid ldog par mi nus pas zlog par byed pa gzhan byed cing de bzhin du bum pa'i rgyu yang dngos su ldog pa'i chos can gyi bum pa byed par mi nus la /
translated: Likewise, a pot’s cause cannot directly produce a pot that is a phenomenon that is stopped.🔽So, how could it be tenable that a pot stops itself?

original: byed pa po gzhan nyid byed pa yin no zhes dogs pa la bshad pa /🔽gang gi phyir ring du song ba yang mthar bum pa de'i rang bzhin nyid dam /
analyzed: byed pa po gzhan nyid byed pa yin no zhes dogs pa la bshad pa / gang gi phyir ring du song ba yang mthar bum pa de'i rang bzhin nyid dam /
translated: To respond to the qualm that the agent of stopping is different from the cause of stopping, the text says:🔽Because even when it has gone far, the end of the pot is the nature of the pot itself.

original: bum pa de'i rgyu'i rang bzhin ni 'jig pa dang ldan pa de'i ngo bo la nus pa yin te /
analyzed: bum pa de'i rgyu'i rang bzhin ni 'jig pa dang ldan pa de'i ngo bo la nus pa yin te /
translated: Or the cause of the pot is the nature of the pot itself.

original: de'i phyir brgyud pa ni don med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir brgyud pa ni don med do //
translated: Therefore the indirect cause is pointless.

original: gal te bum pa rang gi ngo bos ldog par nus pa yin pa de lta na bdag nyid kyis zlog par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: gal te bum pa rang gi ngo bos ldog par nus pa yin pa de lta na bdag nyid kyis zlog par byed pa yin te /
translated: If a pot is able to stop itself by its own nature, then it stops itself.

original: des na bum pa bdag nyid kyis zlog par byed pa nges par byed pa nyid bdag nyid ldog par nus pa yin no //
analyzed: des na bum pa bdag nyid kyis zlog par byed pa nges par byed pa nyid bdag nyid ldog par nus pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, a pot that stops itself is definitely able to stop itself.

original: de bzhin du gal te bum pa'i rgyu ldog pa'i chos can gyi bum pa byed pa de lta na de'i zlog par byed pa yin pa'i phyir 'jig par byed pa bum pa la nges par byed pa nyid ldog pa'i chos can gyi bum pa byed par nus pa
analyzed: de bzhin du gal te bum pa'i rgyu ldog pa'i chos can gyi bum pa byed pa de lta na de'i zlog par byed pa yin pa'i phyir 'jig par byed pa bum pa la nges par byed pa nyid ldog pa'i chos can gyi bum pa byed par nus pa
translated: So too, if a vase were to make a vase that is a phenomenon that ceases due to the cessation of its cause, then because it would be that which causes its cessation, it would be a vase that definitely causes the cessation of a vase that is a phenomenon that ceases.

original: yin no // de'i phyir bum pa rang nyid ldog par nus pa dang / de'i rgyu yang ldog pa'i chos can byed par nus pa yin no //
analyzed: yin no // de'i phyir bum pa rang nyid ldog par nus pa dang / de'i rgyu yang ldog pa'i chos can byed par nus pa yin no //
translated: Therefore a vase is able to cause its own cessation, and its cause is also able to cause a phenomenon that ceases.

original: gang zhig gang gi ngo bos gang byed par mi nus pa de ni de la brgyud pas nus pa yin no //
analyzed: gang zhig gang gi ngo bos gang byed par mi nus pa de ni de la brgyud pas nus pa yin no //
translated: That which is not able to cause something by its own nature is able to cause it indirectly.

original: bum ba ni rang gi ngo bo kho nas ldog par nus pa yin la bum pa'i rgyu yang rang gi ngo bo kho nas ldog pa'i chos can byed par nus pa'i phyir 'dir brgyud pas ni cung zad kyang byar med do //
analyzed: bum ba ni rang gi ngo bo kho nas ldog par nus pa yin la bum pa'i rgyu yang rang gi ngo bo kho nas ldog pa'i chos can byed par nus pa'i phyir 'dir brgyud pas ni cung zad kyang byar med do //
translated: A vase is able to cause its own cessation by its own nature alone, and the cause of a vase is able to cause a phenomenon that ceases by its own nature alone. Therefore in this case there is nothing at all that is done indirectly.

original: de'i phyir 'jig pa'i rgyu de la rag las ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'jig pa'i rgyu de la rag las ba ni ma yin te /
translated: Therefore it is not that it depends on that cause of cessation.

original: 'on kyang rgyu gzhan la reg las pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang rgyu gzhan la reg las pa ma yin te /
translated: But it is not dependent on another cause.

original: des na nges pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: des na nges pa med pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not certain.

original: ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid 'gal bas khyab pa yang nges par 'byung ba nyid dang / 'gal bar brjod pa 'dis ni res 'ga' ba'i ngo bo nyid ltos pa med pa dang 'gal ba yang bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid 'gal bas khyab pa yang nges par 'byung ba nyid dang / 'gal bar brjod pa 'dis ni res 'ga' ba'i ngo bo nyid ltos pa med pa dang 'gal ba yang bshad pa yin no //
translated: The pervasion by the contradiction of dependence is also stated by the contradiction of the escape, and by this, the contradiction of the nature of the occasional with the nondependent is also stated.

original: res 'ga' ba nyid kyang ltos pa dang bcas pas khyab pa'i phyir gnod pa'i tshad ma nye bar bsdus pa na ltos pa med pa dang 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: res 'ga' ba nyid kyang ltos pa dang bcas pas khyab pa'i phyir gnod pa'i tshad ma nye bar bsdus pa na ltos pa med pa dang 'gal ba yin no //
translated: Since the occasional is pervaded by dependence, when the invalidating valid cognition is subsumed, the contradiction of the nondependent is also stated.

original: de'i phyir sbyor ba yang 'di ltar yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir sbyor ba yang 'di ltar yin te /
translated: Therefore, the syllogism is as follows:

original: res 'ga' ba gang yin pa de ni ltos pa med pa ma yin te /
analyzed: res 'ga' ba gang yin pa de ni ltos pa med pa ma yin te /
translated: Whatever is occasional is not nondependent,

original: dper na gos la tshon bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na gos la tshon bzhin no //
translated: like, for example, the dye on cloth.

original: @95b 'di ltar res 'ga' la lar yod ba nyid ltos pa yin no //
analyzed: @95b 'di ltar res 'ga' la lar yod ba nyid ltos pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the existence of the occasional is dependent.

original: de bzhin du ltos pa med pa nyid ni nges par 'gyur bas khyab pa'i phyir de gnod par byed pa nye bar sdud pa na res 'ga' ba dang 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du ltos pa med pa nyid ni nges par 'gyur bas khyab pa'i phyir de gnod par byed pa nye bar sdud pa na res 'ga' ba dang 'gal ba yin no //
translated: Likewise, because of the pervasion that if there is no dependence, there is certainty, when one is engaged in refuting that, it is contradictory to be sometimes.

original: gang zhig gang gi ngo bor 'gyur ba la ltos pa med pa de ni de'i ngo bor nges pa yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig gang gi ngo bor 'gyur ba la ltos pa med pa de ni de'i ngo bor nges pa yin te /
translated: That which is not dependent on becoming the nature of something is certain to be that nature.

original: dper na rang gi 'bras bu skyed pa la rgyu tshogs pa tha ma bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na rang gi 'bras bu skyed pa la rgyu tshogs pa tha ma bzhin no //
translated: For example, the final collection of causes is dependent on producing its effect.

original: 'di ni mtshon pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ni mtshon pa ste /
translated: This is an illustration.

original: khyab par byed pa dang 'gal bas khyab pa'i spyor ba yang yod do //
analyzed: khyab par byed pa dang 'gal bas khyab pa'i spyor ba yang yod do //
translated: There is also the application of the pervasion by the contradictory of the pervader.

original: 'di na ba mo'i reg pa med de /
analyzed: 'di na ba mo'i reg pa med de /
translated: Here, there is no contact of cold,

original: lcags gong 'bar ba mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lcags gong 'bar ba mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because a burning iron ball is seen.

original: lcags gong 'bar ba'i reg pa tsha ba'i reg pas khyab pa yin la /
analyzed: lcags gong 'bar ba'i reg pa tsha ba'i reg pas khyab pa yin la /
translated: The contact of a burning iron ball is pervaded by the contact of heat.

original: de dang 'gal ba ni grang ba'i reg pa yin zhing des khyab pa ni ba mo'i reg pa yin no //
analyzed: de dang 'gal ba ni grang ba'i reg pa yin zhing des khyab pa ni ba mo'i reg pa yin no //
translated: The contradictory of that is the contact of cold, and the pervasion of that is the contact of cold.

original: 'di ni phyogs tsam dper brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni phyogs tsam dper brjod pa yin no //
translated: This is an illustration of just a portion.

original: gal te de lta na yang nges par 'gyur ba med pa dngos su 'gal ba dang phan tshun spangs te gnas pa kho nas 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: gal te de lta na yang nges par 'gyur ba med pa dngos su 'gal ba dang phan tshun spangs te gnas pa kho nas 'gal ba yin no //
translated: But even if that is so, it is contradictory for something to be both definitely and not definitely existent. They are contradictory in the sense that they are mutually exclusive and a direct contradiction.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid kyis nye bar gzhag pa nges pa med pas nges pa la gnod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid kyis nye bar gzhag pa nges pa med pas nges pa la gnod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the definite existence of something that is posited as dependent is undermined by its indefinite existence.

original: rtags la rag las pa'i tshad mas ni 'gal ba nye bar 'jog pa yin no //
analyzed: rtags la rag las pa'i tshad mas ni 'gal ba nye bar 'jog pa yin no //
translated: A valid cognition that depends on a reason posits a contradiction.

original: des na rtags rang nyid kyis ni 'gal ba ma yin te /
analyzed: des na rtags rang nyid kyis ni 'gal ba ma yin te /
translated: Therefore the reason itself is not a contradiction.

original: 'on kyang 'gal ba 'jog par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang 'gal ba 'jog par byed pa yin te /
translated: However, it posits a contradiction.

original: des na 'gal ba'i don nyid kyis gnod pa yin te /
analyzed: des na 'gal ba'i don nyid kyis gnod pa yin te /
translated: Therefore it is contradictory in the sense that it undermines the object of the valid cognition.

original: des na tshad mas gnod pa'i 'gal ba 'di ni 'gal ba snga ma dag las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir dbye ba mi 'thad do zhe na /
analyzed: des na tshad mas gnod pa'i 'gal ba 'di ni 'gal ba snga ma dag las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir dbye ba mi 'thad do zhe na /
translated: Therefore this contradiction that is undermined by valid knowledge is not different from the previous contradictions. Therefore it is not tenable to divide them.

original: bden te / 'on kyang 'gal ba ma yin yang 'gal bas khyab pa yang don du 'gal ba yin te /
analyzed: bden te / 'on kyang 'gal ba ma yin yang 'gal bas khyab pa yang don du 'gal ba yin te /
translated: That is true, but even though it is not a contradiction, it is contradictory in the sense that it is pervaded by a contradiction.

original: gang zhig khyab byed spangs pa de ni khyab par bya ba yang spangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang zhig khyab byed spangs pa de ni khyab par bya ba yang spangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because when the pervader is eliminated, the pervaded is also eliminated.

original: des na 'gal pas khyab pa de sgrub pas kyang dgag bya mi dmigs pa 'phen pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir de skad brjod do //
analyzed: des na 'gal pas khyab pa de sgrub pas kyang dgag bya mi dmigs pa 'phen pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir de skad brjod do //
translated: Therefore, even when the pervasion by contradiction is established, the non-apprehension of the object to be negated is implied. This is what is being said.

original: 'gal bas khyab pa dmigs pa'i dper brjod pa yang de nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'gal bas khyab pa dmigs pa'i dper brjod pa yang de nyid yin no //
translated: This is also an example of the perception of the pervasion by contradiction.

original: gang du nges pa med pa mngon sum du grub pa der ni nges par 'gyur ba bltar rung ba nyid du 'dong pa dgag par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: gang du nges pa med pa mngon sum du grub pa der ni nges par 'gyur ba bltar rung ba nyid du 'dong pa dgag par bya ba yin te /
translated: Where the absence of ascertainment is established by perception, there the possibility of seeing ascertainment is to be negated.

original: des na nges pa 'gog pa ni snang ba mi dmigs pa nyid do //🔽gang du nges pa med pa @96a * //
analyzed: des na nges pa 'gog pa ni snang ba mi dmigs pa nyid do // gang du nges pa med pa @96a * //
translated: Therefore, the negation of ascertainment is itself the non-apprehension of appearance.

original: rtags kyis grub pa der ni 'gal bas khyab pa dmigs pa las yin no //
analyzed: rtags kyis grub pa der ni 'gal bas khyab pa dmigs pa las yin no //
translated: Where the absence of ascertainment is established by evidence, there it is from the perception of the pervasion by contradiction.

original: des na snang ba dang mi snang ba mi dmigs pa'i nang du 'dus so //
analyzed: des na snang ba dang mi snang ba mi dmigs pa'i nang du 'dus so //
translated: Therefore, the non-apprehension of appearance and non-appearance are included within this.

original: gal te med pa'i tha snyad snang ba mi dmigs ba las yin zhing /
analyzed: gal te med pa'i tha snyad snang ba mi dmigs ba las yin zhing /
translated: If the convention of non-existence is from the non-apprehension of appearance,

original: gzhan las yod pa'i tha snyad 'gog pa yin na yod pa ma yin zhes bya ba mi dmigs pa de la /🔽ci ltar med pa'i tha snyad grub pa'am /
analyzed: gzhan las yod pa'i tha snyad 'gog pa yin na yod pa ma yin zhes bya ba mi dmigs pa de la / ci ltar med pa'i tha snyad grub pa'am /
translated: If you refute the conventional existence of something in dependence on another, then how could the nonobservation of that nonexistent thing🔽establish the convention of nonexistence?🔽

original: yod pa'i tha snyad 'gog par 'gyur te /
analyzed: yod pa'i tha snyad 'gog par 'gyur te /
translated: If the convention of existence is refuted in dependence on another, then how could the non-observation of “existence” establish the convention of non-existence?

original: 'gar yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gar yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: It could not!

original: gal te des na 'di la gnyis las mi dmigs pa gcig kyang mi 'thad pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa'i sbyor ba ni 'thad ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te des na 'di la gnyis las mi dmigs pa gcig kyang mi 'thad pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa'i sbyor ba ni 'thad ba ma yin no //
translated: If it were, then since neither of the two is tenable in this context, the application of non-observation is not tenable.

original: ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: gtso bo la sogs pa brjod par bya ba'i don de 'gog pa la dgag par bya ba'i chos can brjod pa'i tshig sbyor ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtso bo la sogs pa brjod par bya ba'i don de 'gog pa la dgag par bya ba'i chos can brjod pa'i tshig sbyor ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because in the refutation of the object of expression, such as prakriti, the words expressing the property-possessor to be refuted are not applied.

original: de ma sbyar na gzhi med pa'i dgag par mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ma sbyar na gzhi med pa'i dgag par mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If they are not applied, then it is not tenable that the negation is without a basis.

original: de sbyor ba med pa yin na dam bca' ba'i tshig sbyor ba mi 'thad pas gang la med pa'i tha snyad bsgrub pa'am yod pa'i tha snyad 'gog par 'gyur ba de med pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa de ci lta bu zhig tu 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de sbyor ba med pa yin na dam bca' ba'i tshig sbyor ba mi 'thad pas gang la med pa'i tha snyad bsgrub pa'am yod pa'i tha snyad 'gog par 'gyur ba de med pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa de ci lta bu zhig tu 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If it is not a proof, then it is not tenable to apply the words of a thesis, because it would be a proof of a non-existent convention or a refutation of an existent convention. Since that does not exist, what kind of non-observation is it?

original: skyon 'di ni med do //
analyzed: skyon 'di ni med do //
translated: This fault does not exist.

original: 'di ltar thog ma med pa'i bag chags las byung ba'i rnam par rtog bas bsgrub ba ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar thog ma med pa'i bag chags las byung ba'i rnam par rtog bas bsgrub ba ste /
translated: Thus, it is a proof that arises from the conception that occurs due to beginningless latent propensities.

original: de la gnas pa dngos po dang dngos po med pa gnyi ga la brten pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de la gnas pa dngos po dang dngos po med pa gnyi ga la brten pa'i phyir /
translated: Since it is based on both things and non-things,

original: sgra'i don gyi chos rnam ba gsum mo //
analyzed: sgra'i don gyi chos rnam ba gsum mo //
translated: it is a property of the object of expression.

original: sgra'i don de dngos po'i nye bar len pa can ma yin par bsgrub pa la sgra'i don de lta bur te /
analyzed: sgra'i don de dngos po'i nye bar len pa can ma yin par bsgrub pa la sgra'i don de lta bur te /
translated: In order to prove that the object of expression is not the appropriator of a thing, the object of expression is like that,

original: dngos po'i nye bar len pa can du mi dmigs pa'i chos gtan tshigs yin no //
analyzed: dngos po'i nye bar len pa can du mi dmigs pa'i chos gtan tshigs yin no //
translated: and the property of the subject, the non-observation of the object of expression as the appropriator of a thing, is the reason.

original: sgra'i don de nyid ni med par bsgrub pa yin te /
analyzed: sgra'i don de nyid ni med par bsgrub pa yin te /
translated: That very object of expression is what is to be proven as nonexistent,

original: de'i rgyu mtshan gyi sgra sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rgyu mtshan gyi sgra sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the word is applied as the reason for that.

original: 'grel pa bshad ba ni gal te rang gi mtshan nyid brjod par bya ba yin na ni /
analyzed: 'grel pa bshad ba ni gal te rang gi mtshan nyid brjod par bya ba yin na ni /
translated: The commentary explains: If intrinsic identity were the referent of a term,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid 'gog pa sgra'i don bkag pa'i phyir de brjod pa'i sgra'i sbyor bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid 'gog pa sgra'i don bkag pa'i phyir de brjod pa'i sgra'i sbyor bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na /
translated: then the term would not be used to refer to it, because the referent of the term would be negated by the negation of intrinsic identity.

original: sgra 'di dag rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can ni ma yin no //
analyzed: sgra 'di dag rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can ni ma yin no //
translated: But these terms do not have intrinsic identity as their referent.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What then is their referent?

original: thog ma med pa'i dus bag chags gang la yod pa de las byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa gang yin pa de la snang ba'i ngang tshul gang la yod pa'i don te /
analyzed: thog ma med pa'i dus bag chags gang la yod pa de las byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa gang yin pa de la snang ba'i ngang tshul gang la yod pa'i don te /
translated: It is the referent that appears to the conceptual cognition that arises from the habitual tendencies existing since beginningless time.

original: don de yul nyid du 'dzin to //
analyzed: don de yul nyid du 'dzin to //
translated: That referent is apprehended as the referent of the term.

original: gal te sgra'i @96b don rnam par brtags pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te sgra'i @96b don rnam par brtags pa yin na /
translated: If the referent of a term is a conceptual image,

original: skyes bus byas pa'i phyir thog ma dang bcas par 'gyur na /
analyzed: skyes bus byas pa'i phyir thog ma dang bcas par 'gyur na /
translated: then because it is created by a person, it would have a beginning.

original: sgra'i tha snyad ni thog ma med ba can yin no zhes bya ba spangs ba'i phyir rnam par rtog pa thog ma med pa'i bag chags las byung bar brjod de /
analyzed: sgra'i tha snyad ni thog ma med ba can yin no zhes bya ba spangs ba'i phyir rnam par rtog pa thog ma med pa'i bag chags las byung bar brjod de /
translated: In order to avoid the assertion that the convention of terms has a beginning, it is said that conceptual cognition arises from beginningless habitual tendencies.

original: gang gi phyir rnam par rtog pa thog ma med pa'i bag chags las byung ba de'i phyir sgra'i don thog ma med pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir rnam par rtog pa thog ma med pa'i bag chags las byung ba de'i phyir sgra'i don thog ma med pa yin no //
translated: Because conceptualization arises from beginningless latent impressions, therefore the meaning of a word is beginningless.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i don nyid brjod par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba gang las she na /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i don nyid brjod par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba gang las she na /
translated: From where is it known that the meaning of conceptualization is what is to be expressed?

original: bshad pa / 'chad pa po'i yod pa dang med pa dang gnyi ga la brten pa'i rnam par rtog pa la brten ba yin te /
analyzed: bshad pa / 'chad pa po'i yod pa dang med pa dang gnyi ga la brten pa'i rnam par rtog pa la brten ba yin te /
translated: It is said: It is based on the conceptualization of the expounder, which is based on existence, nonexistence, and both.

original: snang ba'i dngos po las ma 'das par bstan par 'dod pa gang yin pa de sbyar ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snang ba'i dngos po las ma 'das par bstan par 'dod pa gang yin pa de sbyar ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is desired to teach that it does not go beyond the appearing object, it is applied.

original: gang gi phyir sgra'i don dang ldan pa'i smra ba po la snang ba'i don bstan par 'dod pas sgra sbyor ba de'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir sgra'i don dang ldan pa'i smra ba po la snang ba'i don bstan par 'dod pas sgra sbyor ba de'i phyir /
translated: Because the expounder, who possesses the meaning of a word, applies the word, desiring to teach the appearing object,

original: rnam par rtog pa la snang ba'i don brjod par bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa la snang ba'i don brjod par bya ba nyid do //
translated: therefore the meaning that appears to conceptualization is what is to be expressed.

original: nyan pa po la yang sgra rnams kyis dngos po la brten pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa can gyi rnam par rtog pa skye ba'i rgyu'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyan pa po la yang sgra rnams kyis dngos po la brten pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa can gyi rnam par rtog pa skye ba'i rgyu'i phyir ro //
translated: Also, for the hearer, because the sounds are the cause for the arising of the conceptual thought that has the aspect of depending on the thing.

original: gang gi phyir sgras nyan pa po la yang brjod par bya ba'i don snang ba'i rnam par rtog pa skyed pa de'i phyir de dag gi brjod par bya ba ni brtags pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir sgras nyan pa po la yang brjod par bya ba'i don snang ba'i rnam par rtog pa skyed pa de'i phyir de dag gi brjod par bya ba ni brtags pa yin no //
translated: Because the sounds cause the hearer to generate a conceptual thought that appears as the object to be expressed, therefore, the object of expression is imagined.

original: 'di snyam du gal te de lta na yin du chug mod /
analyzed: 'di snyam du gal te de lta na yin du chug mod /
translated: If you think, “If that is so, let it be so.

original: de lta na yang rang gi mtshan nyid ci ltar yul ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: de lta na yang rang gi mtshan nyid ci ltar yul ma yin zhe na /
translated: Even so, how is the particular not the object?”

original: nye bar len pa dang zhes smos so //
analyzed: nye bar len pa dang zhes smos so //
translated: The phrase “and the appropriation” is stated.

original: sgra rnams kyi nye bar len pa dang / sgra'i 'bras bu'i shes pa de gnyis la snang ba ma yin pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni sgra de'i yul yin pa nyid du nges par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sgra rnams kyi nye bar len pa dang / sgra'i 'bras bu'i shes pa de gnyis la snang ba ma yin pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni sgra de'i yul yin pa nyid du nges par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: The nature that does not appear in both the appropriation of the sounds and the consciousness that is the result of the sounds cannot be ascertained as the object of those sounds.

original: 'di ltar nye bar len pa'i shes pa gang las de dag rab tu 'jug pa de la snang ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir sbyar ba dang / gang gi rnam pa can gyi shes pa skyed pa de'i don brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar nye bar len pa'i shes pa gang las de dag rab tu 'jug pa de la snang ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir sbyar ba dang / gang gi rnam pa can gyi shes pa skyed pa de'i don brjod pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the meaning of the object that appears in the consciousness that appropriates it is indicated by the term, and the meaning of that which generates a consciousness having its aspect is expressed.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid ni de la mi snang ste /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid ni de la mi snang ste /
translated: The specific characteristic does not appear in that consciousness,

original: de'i phyir brjod par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir brjod par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: and therefore it is not expressible.

original: 'on rnam par rtog pa la gnas pa'i don de rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa las tha mi dad pas gal te dngos po'i chos yin pa'i bla na /
analyzed: 'on rnam par rtog pa la gnas pa'i don de rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa las tha mi dad pas gal te dngos po'i chos yin pa'i bla na /
translated: But if the object that is the basis of conceptualization is not different from the conceptual consciousness, then if it is a quality of an existent,

original: dngos po med pa'i chos dang / gnyi ga'i chos go ji ltar yin /🔽ci ste yang de'i sgro btags kyi rang @97a * //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i chos dang / gnyi ga'i chos go ji ltar yin / ci ste yang de'i sgro btags kyi rang @97a * //
translated: how can it be a quality of a nonexistent or a quality of both?

original: bzhin gang yin pa de sgra'i don yin la /🔽de yang med pas dngos po med pa'i chos yin na /
analyzed: bzhin gang yin pa de sgra'i don yin la / de yang med pas dngos po med pa'i chos yin na /
translated: But if the nature that is superimposed is the meaning of the term,🔽and that does not exist, it is a quality of a nonexistent.

original: 'o na ni rnam pa gzhan med pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'o na ni rnam pa gzhan med pa nyid do //
translated: In that case, it has no other aspect.

original: ci ste sgro btags kyi rang bzhin de nyid shes pas dngos po lta bur bstan pa'i phyir de dngos po'i chos yin na /
analyzed: ci ste sgro btags kyi rang bzhin de nyid shes pas dngos po lta bur bstan pa'i phyir de dngos po'i chos yin na /
translated: But if the nature of the superimposition is taught as if it were a thing because of the cognition, then it is a property of a thing.

original: de lta na yang med pa'i chos dang / gnyi ga'i chos su mi 'gyur ro zhes dogs na /
analyzed: de lta na yang med pa'i chos dang / gnyi ga'i chos su mi 'gyur ro zhes dogs na /
translated: If that is so, then it is not a property of a non-existent nor a property of both.

original: rnam par rtog pa de ni zhes smos so //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa de ni zhes smos so //
translated: He says, “That conceptualization . . . .”

original: yod pa ni gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa'i don to //
analyzed: yod pa ni gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa'i don to //
translated: An existent is an object such as a form or a sound.

original: med pa ni nam mkha' la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: med pa ni nam mkha' la sogs pa'o //
translated: A non-existent is space, etc.

original: lus can nyid la sogs pa bkag pa ni dngos po dang dngos po med pa rnam par shes pa dang / nam mkha' la sogs pa gnyi ga'i chos yin no //
analyzed: lus can nyid la sogs pa bkag pa ni dngos po dang dngos po med pa rnam par shes pa dang / nam mkha' la sogs pa gnyi ga'i chos yin no //
translated: The negation of corporeality, etc., is a property of both a thing and a non-thing, a cognition and space, etc.

original: de'i nyams su myong ba'i shes pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa gang yin pa des bskyed pa rnam pa mtshungs pa can gyi shes pa skyed par nus pa'i bag chags gang yin pa de las byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: de'i nyams su myong ba'i shes pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa gang yin pa des bskyed pa rnam pa mtshungs pa can gyi shes pa skyed par nus pa'i bag chags gang yin pa de las byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: The conceptualization arises from the latent impressions that are capable of producing a cognition that is similar in aspect to the cognition that experiences that, and the cognition that conceptualizes that.

original: rnam par rtog pa ni 'dir rnam par rtog pa la gnas pa'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa ni 'dir rnam par rtog pa la gnas pa'i rnam pa'o //
translated: Conceptualization is the form of the conceptualization that is based on conceptualization.

original: phyir zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyir zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir ro //
translated: “ Because” means “for that reason.”

original: yod pa dang med pa gnyi ga'i shes pa de la snang ba'i rnam par zhen pa'o //
analyzed: yod pa dang med pa gnyi ga'i shes pa de la snang ba'i rnam par zhen pa'o //
translated: The cognition of both existence and nonexistence is the adherence to the form that appears in that cognition.

original: gang gi bag chags kyi dbang gis 'di rnam par rtog pa la gnas par 'gyur ba'i shes pa de'i don gyi rnam par rtog pa de yang zhen bar byed do //
analyzed: gang gi bag chags kyi dbang gis 'di rnam par rtog pa la gnas par 'gyur ba'i shes pa de'i don gyi rnam par rtog pa de yang zhen bar byed do //
translated: The conceptualization of the object of that cognition, by the power of whose habitual tendency the conceptualization is based on conceptualization, is also an adherence.

original: rnam par rtog pa la gnas pa'i don kyang yod pa dang med pa dang / gnyi ga'i ngo bor zhen pa'i dbang gis rnam pa gsum du brjod /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa la gnas pa'i don kyang yod pa dang med pa dang / gnyi ga'i ngo bor zhen pa'i dbang gis rnam pa gsum du brjod /
translated: The object of the conceptualization is also said to be threefold, because of the adherence to the nature of existence, nonexistence, and both.

original: sgra'i don ni zhen pa ci lta ba bzhin yin gyi //
analyzed: sgra'i don ni zhen pa ci lta ba bzhin yin gyi //
translated: The meaning of the word is as it is adhered to.

original: de kho na'i ci lta ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de kho na'i ci lta ba ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not as it is in reality.

original: 'di yang dngos po dang dngos po med pa dang / gnyi ga'i zhen pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di yang dngos po dang dngos po med pa dang / gnyi ga'i zhen pa yin te /
translated: This is also the adherence to existence, nonexistence, and both.

original: de'i phyir rnam pa gsum yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam pa gsum yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is threefold.

original: de'i phyir bag chags kyi rjes su 'brangs te rnam pa gsum du zhen pa de'i phyir rnam par gsum du gnas so //
analyzed: de'i phyir bag chags kyi rjes su 'brangs te rnam pa gsum du zhen pa de'i phyir rnam par gsum du gnas so //
translated: Therefore, because of the adherence to the three aspects in accordance with the latent impressions, the three aspects are established.

original: des na shes pa'i bdag nyid du yod pa'i phyir dngos po'i chos ma yin la /
analyzed: des na shes pa'i bdag nyid du yod pa'i phyir dngos po'i chos ma yin la /
translated: Thus, because of the existence in the nature of cognition, it is not a quality of an entity.

original: sgro btags kyis med pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i chos kyang ma yin no //
analyzed: sgro btags kyis med pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i chos kyang ma yin no //
translated: And because of the non-existence of superimposition, it is also not a quality of non-entity.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What then?

original: rnam pa gsum du zhen pa'i phyir chos rnam pa gsum yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa gsum du zhen pa'i phyir chos rnam pa gsum yin no //
translated: Because of the adherence to the three aspects, there are three aspects of the dharmin.

original: gang gi phyir sgra'i don de @97b lta bu yin pa de'i phyir sgra'i don gyi chos can de las gzhan pa yod pa nyid du gzung ba chos can ma spangs pa rnams gtso bo la sogs pa yod pa dang med pa nyid du sems par byed do //
analyzed: gang gi phyir sgra'i don de @97b lta bu yin pa de'i phyir sgra'i don gyi chos can de las gzhan pa yod pa nyid du gzung ba chos can ma spangs pa rnams gtso bo la sogs pa yod pa dang med pa nyid du sems par byed do //
translated: Because the meaning of the word is like that, therefore, the existence of that which is other than the dharmin, the meaning of the word, is apprehended without abandoning the dharmin. Those who think of the existence and non-existence of pradhāna and so on,

original: phyi rol gyi gtso bo la sogs pa yod pa dang med par sems pa na sgra'i don gyi chos can la gzhir byed pa ci ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi gtso bo la sogs pa yod pa dang med par sems pa na sgra'i don gyi chos can la gzhir byed pa ci ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How can they take the dharmin, the meaning of the word, as the basis when thinking of the existence and non-existence of external pradhāna and so on?

original: bshad pa / ci gtso bo la sogs pa'i sgra las blo la snang ba'i don 'di phyi rol gyi gtso bo'i rgyu mtshan can yin nam /
analyzed: bshad pa / ci gtso bo la sogs pa'i sgra las blo la snang ba'i don 'di phyi rol gyi gtso bo'i rgyu mtshan can yin nam /
translated: Nāgārjuna responds: Do you think that the object that appears to the mind from the sound of “primordial matter” and so on is a cause that is external primordial matter?

original: 'on te ma yin zhes sems par byed do //
analyzed: 'on te ma yin zhes sems par byed do //
translated: Or is it not?

original: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being said.

original: mi mthong ba'i don yod pa dang med par spyod pa ni 'di nyid yin te /
analyzed: mi mthong ba'i don yod pa dang med par spyod pa ni 'di nyid yin te /
translated: The existence or nonexistence of an object that is not seen is the very thing that is being analyzed.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: This is as follows.

original: sgra'i don de'i rgyu mtshan can nam de'i rgyu mtshan can ma yin par rnam par dpyod pa ste /
analyzed: sgra'i don de'i rgyu mtshan can nam de'i rgyu mtshan can ma yin par rnam par dpyod pa ste /
translated: It is the analysis of whether the meaning of the sound is a cause of that or is not a cause of that,

original: rnam pa gzhan mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because another mode is untenable.

original: de'i dngos po'i nye bar len pa can ma yin pa'i phyir chos bsgrub pa la de spangs par 'os pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i dngos po'i nye bar len pa can ma yin pa'i phyir chos bsgrub pa la de spangs par 'os pa ma yin no //
translated: Since it is not the appropriator of that entity, it is not suitable to abandon it in order to establish the Dharma.

original: gang gi chos bsgrub pa de ni spang bar 'os pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gi chos bsgrub pa de ni spang bar 'os pa ma yin te /
translated: That which is to be established as the Dharma is not suitable to be abandoned.

original: de spong na bsgrub bya'i chos kyi gzhi med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de spong na bsgrub bya'i chos kyi gzhi med pa'i phyir te /
translated: If it is abandoned, then the basis of the Dharma that is to be established would not exist,

original: dper na mi rtag par bsgrub pa la sgra bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na mi rtag par bsgrub pa la sgra bzhin no //
translated: just like sound in the proof of impermanence.

original: rang gi rig pa yin pa'i phyir yang spang bar 'os pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi rig pa yin pa'i phyir yang spang bar 'os pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not proper to reject it, because it is one’s own awareness.

original: so so rang gis rig pa zhes gang brjod pa ste /
analyzed: so so rang gis rig pa zhes gang brjod pa ste /
translated: It is called “individually realized”

original: de ni rang nyid du rig par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni rang nyid du rig par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is to be known by oneself.

original: de'i phyir sgra'i don ma spangs pa nyid kyis sems par byed pa lkog tu gyur pa'i don yod pa dang med pa dag la 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir sgra'i don ma spangs pa nyid kyis sems par byed pa lkog tu gyur pa'i don yod pa dang med pa dag la 'jug pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, because the meaning of the word is not rejected, the mind engages with existent and nonexistent hidden objects.

original: me nyid du zhen pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa'i gzung ba'i don de nyid rang gi mtshan nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: me nyid du zhen pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa'i gzung ba'i don de nyid rang gi mtshan nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Isn’t the object of the conception, which is the object of apprehension of the conception of fire, the intrinsic identity of fire?

original: de'i phyir sgra'i yul rang gi mtshan nyid yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir sgra'i yul rang gi mtshan nyid yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, the object of the word is the intrinsic identity.

original: bshad pa / sgra'i don de nyid rang gi mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //🔽shes pa'i bdag nyid kyis ni rang gi mtshan nyid yin no //
analyzed: bshad pa / sgra'i don de nyid rang gi mtshan nyid ni ma yin no // shes pa'i bdag nyid kyis ni rang gi mtshan nyid yin no //
translated: We reply: The object of the word is not the intrinsic identity.🔽It is the intrinsic identity by the nature of consciousness.

original: shes pa'i bdag nyid du ni zhen pha ma yin te /
analyzed: shes pa'i bdag nyid du ni zhen pha ma yin te /
translated: It is not conceived by the nature of consciousness.

original: 'o na yang mer zhen pa yin la /
analyzed: 'o na yang mer zhen pa yin la /
translated: However, it is conceived as fire.

original: zhen par byas pa'i ngo bos kyang sgra'i don yin no //
analyzed: zhen par byas pa'i ngo bos kyang sgra'i don yin no //
translated: The object of the word is also the nature of the object of adherence.

original: ci'i phyir zhen par byas pa'i rang bzhin brjod bya yin gyi /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhen par byas pa'i rang bzhin brjod bya yin gyi /
translated: Why is the nature of the object of adherence the object of expression,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: but not the own characteristic?

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is it so?

original: ma thob pa ma 'ongs pa dang 'gags pa 'das pa ste /
analyzed: ma thob pa ma 'ongs pa dang 'gags pa 'das pa ste /
translated: The non-acquisition of the future and the cessation of the past

original: @98a * // 'das pa dang ma 'ongs ba'i don de dag la yang rnam bar rtog pa'i don de mi ldog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: @98a * // 'das pa dang ma 'ongs ba'i don de dag la yang rnam bar rtog pa'i don de mi ldog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: are the objects of the past and future, but the object of the conception does not cease.

original: gang zhig rang gi mtshan nyid yod pa dang med pa'i rjes su byed pas de nyid du nges par byas pa'i shes pa'i rnam pa de ni rang gi mtshan nyid du brjod pa yin na /
analyzed: gang zhig rang gi mtshan nyid yod pa dang med pa'i rjes su byed pas de nyid du nges par byas pa'i shes pa'i rnam pa de ni rang gi mtshan nyid du brjod pa yin na /
translated: If the aspect of the cognition that is ascertained as just that, because it conforms with the existence and non-existence of the own characteristic, is called the own characteristic,

original: 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid la mi 'khrul pa ma yin pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid la mi 'khrul pa ma yin pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid ma yin no //
translated: then it is not the own characteristic, because it is not non-erroneous with regard to the own characteristic.

original: gzhan yang bum pa la sogs pa'i dngos po la phyin ci log gi rnam pa yan lag can dang / rdul phra rab dang / gcig dang du ma la sogs pa phan tshun 'gal ba der mngon par zhen pa mu stegs byed gzhan te /
analyzed: gzhan yang bum pa la sogs pa'i dngos po la phyin ci log gi rnam pa yan lag can dang / rdul phra rab dang / gcig dang du ma la sogs pa phan tshun 'gal ba der mngon par zhen pa mu stegs byed gzhan te /
translated: Moreover, the other tīrthikas are attached to the parts of a whole, atoms, and the mutual exclusiveness of one and many, etc., in regard to things such as pots.

original: grub mtha' tha dad pa dag la yod pa'i shes pa gang yin pa de la yang sgra'i don yod pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid ni sgra'i don ma yin no //
analyzed: grub mtha' tha dad pa dag la yod pa'i shes pa gang yin pa de la yang sgra'i don yod pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid ni sgra'i don ma yin no //
translated: Since the referent of the word exists in the cognition of those who have different philosophical positions, the intrinsic identity is not the referent of the word.

original: dngos po la ni phyin ci log gi rang bzhin mi srid do //
analyzed: dngos po la ni phyin ci log gi rang bzhin mi srid do //
translated: Since it is impossible for a thing to have a distorted intrinsic nature,

original: des na gal te sgra don dam pa'i yul can yin na /
analyzed: des na gal te sgra don dam pa'i yul can yin na /
translated: if the referent of the word is the ultimate,

original: dngos po la mi srid pa 'gal ba'i rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos po la mi srid pa 'gal ba'i rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: then it would not be a distorted conception that is impossible in a thing.

original: don de nyid bsdu ba'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: don de nyid bsdu ba'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: To summarize that point, it is said:

original: don dam pa ma brtags pa de la gcig tu 'jug pa ste phyogs pa gang yin pa dag go //
analyzed: don dam pa ma brtags pa de la gcig tu 'jug pa ste phyogs pa gang yin pa dag go //
translated: Those who engage in and are attached to the ultimate that is not analyzed.

original: de ltar yin na lta ba'i bye brag tha dad ba'i don rnams la ni sgra rnam dag don dam pa'i rgyu mtshan med par 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar yin na lta ba'i bye brag tha dad ba'i don rnams la ni sgra rnam dag don dam pa'i rgyu mtshan med par 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If that were so, then the word would not apply to the various specific things that are its referents, without a real ultimate reason.

original: de bzhin du 'das pa dang / ma skyes pa'i don la yang sgra mi 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'das pa dang / ma skyes pa'i don la yang sgra mi 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, the word would not apply to the referents of the past and the future.

original: de bzhin du tshig 'ga' zhig kyang log pa'i don can du mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshig 'ga' zhig kyang log pa'i don can du mi 'gyur te /
translated: In the same way, no word would have a false referent.

original: rgyu de'i phyir sgra 'di dag blo la yod pa'i don gyi yul can yin gyi /
analyzed: rgyu de'i phyir sgra 'di dag blo la yod pa'i don gyi yul can yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, these words have as their referent an object that exists in the mind.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid brjod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid brjod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: They do not express a real particular.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i don de la ci ltar 'dod pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de'i nye bar len pa can ma yin par bsgrub par bya ba la /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i don de la ci ltar 'dod pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de'i nye bar len pa can ma yin par bsgrub par bya ba la /
translated: In order to prove that the referent of a conceptual cognition is not the nature that is asserted,

original: de ltar zhes bya ba rnam pa de lta bu'i rang bzhin gyi nye bar len pa can du ma dmigs pas sgrub par byed pa rab tu grub pa'i chos yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba rnam pa de lta bu'i rang bzhin gyi nye bar len pa can du ma dmigs pas sgrub par byed pa rab tu grub pa'i chos yod pa ma yin no //
translated: the words “in that way” prove that the referent does not have the nature that is asserted, because the many that have that nature are not observed. The property that is to be proven is not established.

original: des na blo la gnas pa'i don ni chos can yin la /
analyzed: des na blo la gnas pa'i don ni chos can yin la /
translated: Therefore, the object that appears to the mind is the subject.

original: de gtso bo'i nye bar len pa can ma yin pa ni bsgrub par bya zhing /
analyzed: de gtso bo'i nye bar len pa can ma yin pa ni bsgrub par bya zhing /
translated: That it is not the primary appropriator is the proposition.

original: de'i nye bar len pa can du mi dmigs pa ni sgrub par byed ba'i chos yin no //
analyzed: de'i nye bar len pa can du mi dmigs pa ni sgrub par byed ba'i chos yin no //
translated: The non-observation of its appropriator is the logical reason that proves that.

original: 'dir sgras bskyed pa'i @98b pa'i rnam par rtog pa la snang ba'i don de nyid la bsnyon pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir sgras bskyed pa'i @98b pa'i rnam par rtog pa la snang ba'i don de nyid la bsnyon pa yang ma yin no //
translated: Here, the object that appears to the conception generated by the term is not denied.

original: ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: rnam par rtog pa la snang ba'i don de nyid nyan ba bo'i blo la gzhag pa'i don du sgra sbyor ba'i phyir dang / de med na sgra sbyor ba nyid mi rung ba'i phyir ro //🔽gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa la snang ba'i don de nyid nyan ba bo'i blo la gzhag pa'i don du sgra sbyor ba'i phyir dang / de med na sgra sbyor ba nyid mi rung ba'i phyir ro // gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni 'di skad ston te /
translated: The object that appears to the conception is posited in the mind of the listener as the meaning of the term because the term is applied to it, and because if it did not exist, the application of the term would be impossible.

original: rang rig pa'i don dang / sgra sbyor ba'i phyir rnam par rtog pa la gnas pa de dgag par mi 'thad pa 'ba' zhig tu ni ma zad kyi /
analyzed: rang rig pa'i don dang / sgra sbyor ba'i phyir rnam par rtog pa la gnas pa de dgag par mi 'thad pa 'ba' zhig tu ni ma zad kyi /
translated: Moreover, this shows that it is not only untenable to refute the object that appears to the conception,🔽but also that it is untenable to refute the object that is the basis of the conception.

original: sgrub ba dang dgag pa bsam pa'i skabs bsnyon du med pa'i phyir yang mi 'thad do zhes so //
analyzed: sgrub ba dang dgag pa bsam pa'i skabs bsnyon du med pa'i phyir yang mi 'thad do zhes so //
translated: It is also untenable because it is undeniable that there is a context for the thought of affirmation and negation.

original: skabs bsnyon du med pa de nyid ston pa ni sgra don bsnyon pa med pa don du gnyer par rtogs pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis yod med phyogs kyi bye brag gis te /
analyzed: skabs bsnyon du med pa de nyid ston pa ni sgra don bsnyon pa med pa don du gnyer par rtogs pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis yod med phyogs kyi bye brag gis te /
translated: To demonstrate that very undeniable context, it is said, “Those who seek the meaning of words without contradiction understand that it is by the distinction of the position of existence and nonexistence.”

original: yod pa nyid dam med pa nyid du dngos po nyid dpyad par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: yod pa nyid dam med pa nyid du dngos po nyid dpyad par bya ba yin no //
translated: Existence and nonexistence are to be analyzed in terms of the nature of things.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽de la zhes smos te /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na / de la zhes smos te /
translated: Why is that?

original: gang gi phyir 'bras bu 'byung ba ni de la rag las pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'bras bu 'byung ba ni de la rag las pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is said, “Because the arising of the effect depends on that.”

original: ci ltar de la 'bras bu 'byung ba rag las she na /
analyzed: ci ltar de la 'bras bu 'byung ba rag las she na /
translated: How does the arising of the effect depend on that?

original: bshad pa / gang gi phyir sgra'i don ni yod kyang skyes bu'i don cung zhig 'grub par mi byed la /
analyzed: bshad pa / gang gi phyir sgra'i don ni yod kyang skyes bu'i don cung zhig 'grub par mi byed la /
translated: It is said, “Because the meaning of the word exists, but it does not accomplish the slightest purpose of a person.

original: med kyang ldog par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: med kyang ldog par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: And because the meaning of the word does not exist, it does not stop.

original: skyes bu'i don ni de la rag las bar mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro//
analyzed: skyes bu'i don ni de la rag las bar mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro//
translated: Because it is untenable that the purpose of a person depends on that.

original: des na 'bras bu med pa yin no //
analyzed: des na 'bras bu med pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the effect does not exist.”

original: ci ltar cung zhig nyams pa'am 'grub pa ma yin pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: ci ltar cung zhig nyams pa'am 'grub pa ma yin pa zhes bya ste /
translated: How is it that it is not a little bit impaired or not established?

original: gang gi phyir shes pa'i snang ba shes pa las tha dad pa med pa ni shes pa'i 'bras bu dang ldan pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir shes pa'i snang ba shes pa las tha dad pa med pa ni shes pa'i 'bras bu dang ldan pa yin no zhe na /
translated: Because the appearance of consciousness is not different from consciousness, it is endowed with the result of consciousness.

original: ci ltar mngon par zhen pa bzhin du zhes smos so ;
analyzed: ci ltar mngon par zhen pa bzhin du zhes smos so ;
translated: “Just as it is conceived” is stated.

original: ji ltar mngon bar zhen cing ci ltar nges par byas pa ni shes pa'i snang ba la me'i rang bzhin yin na /
analyzed: ji ltar mngon bar zhen cing ci ltar nges par byas pa ni shes pa'i snang ba la me'i rang bzhin yin na /
translated: How is it conceived? How is it ascertained? If the nature of fire is the appearance of consciousness,

original: de ltar de kho na nyid yin pa'i phyir dang / shes pa'i bdag nyid kyis de kho na nyid ci lta ba bzhin yin pa de ltar zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar de kho na nyid yin pa'i phyir dang / shes pa'i bdag nyid kyis de kho na nyid ci lta ba bzhin yin pa de ltar zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: then it is not conceived in that way, because it is reality and because reality is just as it is in the nature of consciousness.

original: de la bsam pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de la bsam pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: The idea here is this:

original: gal te shes pa'i bdag nyid kyis snang ba de 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin yang /
analyzed: gal te shes pa'i bdag nyid kyis snang ba de 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin yang /
translated: Even if the appearance that is the nature of consciousness is endowed with a result,

original: de lta na yang sgra'i don skyes bu la nye bar mkho ba can du 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta na yang sgra'i don skyes bu la nye bar mkho ba can du 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
translated: in that case, the meaning of the word is not that it is needed by the person.

original: gang gi phyir sgro btags pa'i rang bzhin me la sogs pa'i ngo bo sgra'i don yin gyi /
analyzed: gang gi phyir sgro btags pa'i rang bzhin me la sogs pa'i ngo bo sgra'i don yin gyi /
translated: Because the nature of the superimposed object, such as fire, is the meaning of the word,

original: @99a * // shes pa'i rang bzhin gyi dngos po ni ma yin te /
analyzed: @99a * // shes pa'i rang bzhin gyi dngos po ni ma yin te /
translated: and not the nature of the cognition.

original: sgro btags pa'i rang bzhin sgra las nges pa'i phyir dang / zhen par byas pa yang brjod par byas pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgro btags pa'i rang bzhin sgra las nges pa'i phyir dang / zhen par byas pa yang brjod par byas pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the nature of the superimposed object is ascertained from the word, and because the object of adherence is also expressed.

original: des na sgra'i don ni skyes bu la nye bar mkho ba can ma yin no //
analyzed: des na sgra'i don ni skyes bu la nye bar mkho ba can ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the meaning of the word is not something useful for the person.

original: de'i phyir thams cad kyi tshe don bya ba don du gnyer ba'i rtogs pa dang ldan pa 'di yod pa dang med bar dpyod pa 'jug pa na /
analyzed: de'i phyir thams cad kyi tshe don bya ba don du gnyer ba'i rtogs pa dang ldan pa 'di yod pa dang med bar dpyod pa 'jug pa na /
translated: Therefore, when the investigation of existence and non-existence is engaged at all times by one who possesses the understanding that seeks the benefit of the object,

original: rnam par rtog pa'i rnam pa spangs te /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i rnam pa spangs te /
translated: having abandoned the aspect of conceptualization,

original: yod pa'i dngos po nyid yod pa dang med par dpyod pa'i gzhir byed pa yin no //
analyzed: yod pa'i dngos po nyid yod pa dang med par dpyod pa'i gzhir byed pa yin no //
translated: the existent thing itself is made the basis for the investigation of existence and non-existence.

original: dngos po de ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
analyzed: dngos po de ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
translated: What is that thing like?

original: bshad pa / dngos po gang la thams cad kyi mngon sum du rig pa'i skyes bu'i don 'di 'brel ba'o //
analyzed: bshad pa / dngos po gang la thams cad kyi mngon sum du rig pa'i skyes bu'i don 'di 'brel ba'o //
translated: It is explained: That thing in which this meaning of the person who knows everything is connected.

original: ci ltar grang ba sel ba la sogs pa la me bzhin no //
analyzed: ci ltar grang ba sel ba la sogs pa la me bzhin no //
translated: Just like fire, for example, in the removal of cold, etc.

original: sogs pa'i sgras ni gtso bo dang bsreg pa la sogs pa gzung ngo //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras ni gtso bo dang bsreg pa la sogs pa gzung ngo //
translated: The words “etc.” include the primary elements, burning, etc.

original: 'di snyam du 'di 'dra ba'i don ni sgra'i don gyis kyang 'grub pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di snyam du 'di 'dra ba'i don ni sgra'i don gyis kyang 'grub pa yin te /
translated: If you think that the meaning of a word is established by the meaning of a word,

original: gang gi phyir rgyu'i don de yang me nyid du nges pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rgyu'i don de yang me nyid du nges pa yin no zhe na /
translated: because the meaning of a cause is ascertained as fire,🔽then Nāgārjuna explains:

original: bshad pa / gang gi phyir gtso bo la sogs pa skyes bu'i don de la sgra'i don ni nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bshad pa / gang gi phyir gtso bo la sogs pa skyes bu'i don de la sgra'i don ni nus pa ma yin no //
translated: Because the meaning of a word is not capable of the meaning of a person, such as the primary elements, etc.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sgra'i don de nyams su myong bar 'gyur yang grang ba sel ba la sogs pa skyes bu'i don de med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra'i don de nyams su myong bar 'gyur yang grang ba sel ba la sogs pa skyes bu'i don de med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Even if the meaning of a word is experienced, the meaning of a person, such as the removal of cold, etc., does not exist.

original: don byed nus pa'i me nyams su myong bar 'gyur na ni /
analyzed: don byed nus pa'i me nyams su myong bar 'gyur na ni /
translated: If fire, which is capable of performing a function, is experienced,

original: grang ba sel ba la sogs pa 'thob kyi /
analyzed: grang ba sel ba la sogs pa 'thob kyi /
translated: then the removal of cold, etc., is obtained.

original: sgra'i don nye bar gyur kyang nyams su myong ba las bsgrub par bya ba'i don mi 'thob ba ste /
analyzed: sgra'i don nye bar gyur kyang nyams su myong ba las bsgrub par bya ba'i don mi 'thob ba ste /
translated: Even if the meaning of a word is present, the object to be established is not obtained from experience.

original: de'i phyir don med pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir don med pa yin no //
translated: Therefore it is meaningless.

original: sngar ma thob pa dang 'gags pa'i don dag la yang mi ldog pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bas ni rnam pa don gyi ma skyes par brjod pa yin la /
analyzed: sngar ma thob pa dang 'gags pa'i don dag la yang mi ldog pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bas ni rnam pa don gyi ma skyes par brjod pa yin la /
translated: Because it is impossible for the meaning of a word that has not been previously obtained and that has ceased to return.🔽This is the general statement.

original: da ltar ni rang nyid don med pa yin no zhes bya ba ni khyad par ro //
analyzed: da ltar ni rang nyid don med pa yin no zhes bya ba ni khyad par ro //
translated: The present is meaningless by itself is the distinction.

original: gang gi phyir sgra'i don don med pa can yin pa de'i phyir sreg pa la sogs pa don du gnyer ba 'di sreg par mi nus pa la ched du gnyer ba lhur byed pa ni rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir sgra'i don don med pa can yin pa de'i phyir sreg pa la sogs pa don du gnyer ba 'di sreg par mi nus pa la ched du gnyer ba lhur byed pa ni rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: Since the meaning of the word is meaningless, it is not reasonable for one who seeks to burn, etc. to strive for that which is incapable of burning, etc.

original: rtogs pa dang ldan pa ni bsgrub bya'i don la nye bar sbyor ba la yod pa la sogs par dpyod pa rtsom gyi nye bar sbyor ba med pa la ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rtogs pa dang ldan pa ni bsgrub bya'i don la nye bar sbyor ba la yod pa la sogs par dpyod pa rtsom gyi nye bar sbyor ba med pa la ni ma yin te /
translated: One who is intelligent begins the analysis of existence, etc. in order to apply himself to the object to be accomplished, but not when there is no application.

original: gang gi phyir 'dod pa dang ldan @99b pa skyes bu 'dod pa dang ldan pa ni nye bar dpyod par mi nus pa'i gzugs bzang ba dang ngan pa brtag pa la lhur gnyer ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'dod pa dang ldan @99b pa skyes bu 'dod pa dang ldan pa ni nye bar dpyod par mi nus pa'i gzugs bzang ba dang ngan pa brtag pa la lhur gnyer ba ni ma yin no //
translated: Because a person who has a desire does not strive to investigate a form that is good or bad and that is incapable of being investigated.

original: de'i phyir sgra'i don ni 'gog ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir sgra'i don ni 'gog ba ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, the meaning of the word is not a negation.

original: nus pa med pa ni yod pa la sogs par dpyod pa'i gzhi ma yin ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nus pa med pa ni yod pa la sogs par dpyod pa'i gzhi ma yin ba'i phyir ro //
translated: For that which is powerless is not a basis for analysis as existent and so on.

original: gal te khyod kyis phyi rol gyi nye bar len pa can du mi dmigs ba rtogs pa la gnas pa'i chos su brjod na /
analyzed: gal te khyod kyis phyi rol gyi nye bar len pa can du mi dmigs ba rtogs pa la gnas pa'i chos su brjod na /
translated: If you say that the expression “non-apprehended” refers to the external appropriator,

original: 'o na kun las btus ba las brtags pa'i chos zhes bya ba la sogs pa bshad pa gang yin pa de'i don ci yin /
analyzed: 'o na kun las btus ba las brtags pa'i chos zhes bya ba la sogs pa bshad pa gang yin pa de'i don ci yin /
translated: then what is the meaning of the statement in the Compendium of Abhidharma: “The so-called imagined phenomena are those that are imagined by the mind and do not exist.”

original: der ni mi dmigs pa ni gtso bo la sogs pa brtags pa'i chos yin no zhes rtogs so //
analyzed: der ni mi dmigs pa ni gtso bo la sogs pa brtags pa'i chos yin no zhes rtogs so //
translated: There, non-apprehended means that the imagined phenomena such as the principle do not exist.

original: 'gal ba med pa de'i da ltar rtog pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir sgra'i don la brtags par brjod do //
analyzed: 'gal ba med pa de'i da ltar rtog pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir sgra'i don la brtags par brjod do //
translated: There is no contradiction, because they are objects of thought, and therefore they are said to be imagined in the meaning of the word.

original: gang zhig brtag par bya ba de ni brtags pa yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig brtag par bya ba de ni brtags pa yin te /
translated: That which is imagined is imagined.

original: dper na gang blta bar bya ba der bltas pa yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na gang blta bar bya ba der bltas pa yin pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, that which is seen is seen.

original: rtog pa'i yul yang brtag par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: rtog pa'i yul yang brtag par bya ba yin no //
translated: And the object of thought is that which is imagined.

original: de'i phyir gtso bo'i sgra'i don rtogs pa la gnas pa ni brtags pa yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gtso bo'i sgra'i don rtogs pa la gnas pa ni brtags pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, the meaning of the word “chief” is to be understood as “to be imagined.”

original: phyi rol gyi dngos po'i rgyu mtshan du mi dmigs pa ni brtags pa de'i chos yin no zhes 'di'i don ni de yin no //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi dngos po'i rgyu mtshan du mi dmigs pa ni brtags pa de'i chos yin no zhes 'di'i don ni de yin no //
translated: The non-apprehension of external objects as the reason is the property of that imagination. This is the meaning here.

original: spros pa dang nye bar spros pa bshad nas skabs nyid nye bar bsdu ba'i phyir rang bzhin mi dmigs pa zhes smos so //
analyzed: spros pa dang nye bar spros pa bshad nas skabs nyid nye bar bsdu ba'i phyir rang bzhin mi dmigs pa zhes smos so //
translated: Having explained elaboration and detailed elaboration, in order to summarize the topic, he says, “the non-apprehension of intrinsic nature.”

original: skyon 'ga' zhig spang ba'i phyir sngar bshad pa dran par byed de /
analyzed: skyon 'ga' zhig spang ba'i phyir sngar bshad pa dran par byed de /
translated: In order to avoid some fault, he recalls what was previously explained.

original: gang du rang bzhin mi dmigs pa nang du 'du ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de yang bye brag la ltos pa'am /
analyzed: gang du rang bzhin mi dmigs pa nang du 'du ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de yang bye brag la ltos pa'am /
translated: Wherever the non-apprehension of intrinsic nature is included, that intrinsic nature also depends on distinctions,

original: bye brag med pa 'ba' zhig ste /
analyzed: bye brag med pa 'ba' zhig ste /
translated: or it is only without distinctions.

original: dper na 'jig pa las byas pa ni khyad par dang bcas pa yin la /
analyzed: dper na 'jig pa las byas pa ni khyad par dang bcas pa yin la /
translated: For example, destruction is with distinctions,

original: yod pa ni dag pa yin pa bzhin te /
analyzed: yod pa ni dag pa yin pa bzhin te /
translated: while existence is without distinctions.

original: de dag 'dra bar gzhan thams cad kyang bstan par bya ba yin no zhes le'u gnyis par brjod zin to //
analyzed: de dag 'dra bar gzhan thams cad kyang bstan par bya ba yin no zhes le'u gnyis par brjod zin to //
translated: As those are similar, all others should be taught in the same way. This has already been stated in Chapter Two.

original: de la ste don de lta yin par 'gyur ba la gal te yod pa 'ba' zhig gtan tshigs yin nam /🔽yod pa'i bdag nyid gtan tshigs yin na yod pa ci ltar bsgrub bya ma yin /
analyzed: de la ste don de lta yin par 'gyur ba la gal te yod pa 'ba' zhig gtan tshigs yin nam / yod pa'i bdag nyid gtan tshigs yin na yod pa ci ltar bsgrub bya ma yin /
translated: If that is so, then if existence alone is the reason,🔽how can existence be the probandum?

original: ci ste yod pa bsgrub par bya na /
analyzed: ci ste yod pa bsgrub par bya na /
translated: But if existence is the probandum,

original: khyad par bsgrub byar 'gyur na /
analyzed: khyad par bsgrub byar 'gyur na /
translated: then the reason would be the probandum.

original: de la yang rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i skyon du @100a * //
analyzed: de la yang rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i skyon du @100a * //
translated: And in that case, the error would be that the reason does not pervade the probandum.

original: 'gyur ba des na yod pa bsgrub bya ma yin na /
analyzed: 'gyur ba des na yod pa bsgrub bya ma yin na /
translated: Therefore, if existence is not the probandum,

original: 'o na ni gtan tshigs su yang mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'o na ni gtan tshigs su yang mi 'gyur te /
translated: then it cannot be the reason.

original: gang gi phyir khyad par rjes su 'gro ba med pa ni gtan tshigs dang bsgrub bya gnyi gar 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir khyad par rjes su 'gro ba med pa ni gtan tshigs dang bsgrub bya gnyi gar 'gal ba yin no //
translated: Because the reason does not pervade the probandum, it is contradictory for both the reason and the probandum to be the reason.

original: 'di nyid rnam par 'grel ba ni //🔽gal te zhes bya pa la sogs pa bshad pa yin no //🔽gzhan la zhes bya ba ni bsgrub bya ma nges par brjod pa'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid rnam par 'grel ba ni // gal te zhes bya pa la sogs pa bshad pa yin no // gzhan la zhes bya ba ni bsgrub bya ma nges par brjod pa'o //
translated: This is explained in the following:

original: gal te yod pa la lar gtan tshigs yin na bsgrub bar bya ba yang ci ste mi 'dod /
analyzed: gal te yod pa la lar gtan tshigs yin na bsgrub bar bya ba yang ci ste mi 'dod /
translated: If existence is the reason in some cases, why not accept it as the probandum?🔽The phrase “in other cases” refers to the probandum that is not ascertained.

original: yod pa de de ltar 'ba' zhig bsgrub par bya ba yin na khyad par can du 'gyur na /
analyzed: yod pa de de ltar 'ba' zhig bsgrub par bya ba yin na khyad par can du 'gyur na /
translated: If existence alone were the probandum, then the qualifier would be the probandum.

original: khyad par ni bsgrub par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: khyad par ni bsgrub par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: But the qualifier is not the probandum,🔽because there is no pervasion.

original: rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes grags te gzhan gyi 'dod pa brjod pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes grags te gzhan gyi 'dod pa brjod pa'o //
translated: This is the opponent’s opinion, which is well known.

original: ci skad du slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos tshad ma rjes su dpag pa'i yul spyi ste /
analyzed: ci skad du slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos tshad ma rjes su dpag pa'i yul spyi ste /
translated: As the master Dignāga says in the Proof of Other Minds, “The object of inference is a universal.

original: rgol ba rjes su dpag pa'i yul spyi yin par ma shes pa'i phyir khyad par sgrub par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: rgol ba rjes su dpag pa'i yul spyi yin par ma shes pa'i phyir khyad par sgrub par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: Because the opponent does not understand that the object of inference is a universal, he proves a qualifier.”

original: gal te yod pa bsgrub byar mi 'dod na khyad par de bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'gal ba ni ma zad de /
analyzed: gal te yod pa bsgrub byar mi 'dod na khyad par de bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'gal ba ni ma zad de /
translated: If you do not accept that existence is the probandum, not only is it contradictory that the qualifier is the probandum,

original: 'on kyang gtan tshigs su yang 'gal lo //
analyzed: 'on kyang gtan tshigs su yang 'gal lo //
translated: but also the reason is contradictory.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i skyon mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i skyon mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the fault of no pervasion is the same.

original: ci ltar rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i skyon mtshungs she na /
analyzed: ci ltar rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i skyon mtshungs she na /
translated: How is the fault of no pervasion the same?

original: gang gi phyir rjes su 'gro ba med pa ni sgrub pa'i yan lag ma yin no zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rjes su 'gro ba med pa ni sgrub pa'i yan lag ma yin no zhes bya ba la /
translated: Because the reason is not a part of the proof when there is no pervasion.

original: don ni 'di yin te /🔽dper na rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i bsgrub byas gtan tshigs la ma khyab pa'i phyir go byed ma yin pa de bzhin du gtan tshigs rjes su 'gro ba med pa can yang bsgrub byas ma khyab pa'i phyir go byed ma yin pa des na rjes su 'gro
analyzed: don ni 'di yin te / dper na rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i bsgrub byas gtan tshigs la ma khyab pa'i phyir go byed ma yin pa de bzhin du gtan tshigs rjes su 'gro ba med pa can yang bsgrub byas ma khyab pa'i phyir go byed ma yin pa des na rjes su 'gro
translated: The meaning is this:

original: ba med pa'i skyon mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: ba med pa'i skyon mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: For example, just as a probandum that lacks pervasion is not an inferential mark because it does not pervade the reason, in the same way, a reason that lacks pervasion is not an inferential mark because it does not pervade the probandum. Therefore, the fault of lacking pervasion is the same.

original: ci'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba med pa go byed ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba med pa go byed ma yin zhe na /
translated: Why is a reason that lacks pervasion not an inferential mark?

original: rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i gtan tshigs de las the tshom za ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i gtan tshigs de las the tshom za ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is doubt about that reason that lacks pervasion.

original: thun mong ma yin pa gang yin pa de thams cad ni the tshom gyi rgyu yin te /
analyzed: thun mong ma yin pa gang yin pa de thams cad ni the tshom gyi rgyu yin te /
translated: Everything that is not shared is a cause of doubt.

original: 'di ltar bsgrub bya'i chos can gyi mthar thug pa /
analyzed: 'di ltar bsgrub bya'i chos can gyi mthar thug pa /
translated: Thus, the ultimate of the property of the probandum🔽is not an inferential mark because it is not shared.

original: tshad ma gang gis bsgrub byas khyab par brjod pa de nyid kyis de grub pa'i phyir gtan @100b tshigs gzhan don med do //
analyzed: tshad ma gang gis bsgrub byas khyab par brjod pa de nyid kyis de grub pa'i phyir gtan @100b tshigs gzhan don med do //
translated: Because the pervasion of the probandum by the proof is stated by the same means by which the probandum is established, another syllogism is pointless.

original: ci ste gnod par byed pa ni bsgrub bya'i chos can 'ga' zhig gi yul ma yin te /
analyzed: ci ste gnod par byed pa ni bsgrub bya'i chos can 'ga' zhig gi yul ma yin te /
translated: But an objection is not the domain of any subject of a probandum.

original: 'on kyang chos can gzhan dang thun mong ma yin na /
analyzed: 'on kyang chos can gzhan dang thun mong ma yin na /
translated: But if it is not shared with another subject,

original: de lta na yang bsgrub bya'i chos can la brten pa ni gzhan du mi srid pa'i phyir gnod par byed pa des khyab pa ma brjod pas the tshom gyi rgyu nyid do //
analyzed: de lta na yang bsgrub bya'i chos can la brten pa ni gzhan du mi srid pa'i phyir gnod par byed pa des khyab pa ma brjod pas the tshom gyi rgyu nyid do //
translated: then, because it is impossible for it to be otherwise, the subject of the probandum is pervaded by that objection. Therefore, because it does not state a pervasion, it is a cause of doubt.

original: de'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir khyad par thams cad ni the tshom gyi rgyu yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir khyad par thams cad ni the tshom gyi rgyu yin no //
translated: Therefore, because there is no positive concomitance, all exceptions are a cause of doubt.

original: de'i phyir de ltar bsgrub bya bzhin du yod pa ni sgrub byed du yang mi 'thad bar nye bar bkod pa la /
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar bsgrub bya bzhin du yod pa ni sgrub byed du yang mi 'thad bar nye bar bkod pa la /
translated: Therefore, just as the probandum is not established, it is not tenable that the proof is stated.

original: lan gdab pa'i phyir skyon 'di ni med de zhes smos so //
analyzed: lan gdab pa'i phyir skyon 'di ni med de zhes smos so //
translated: In order to respond to that, he says, “This fault does not exist.”

original: ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: 'di ltar dngos po yod pa de'i khyad par te /
analyzed: 'di ltar dngos po yod pa de'i khyad par te /
translated: Thus, the thing that exists is the particular.🔽

original: bye brag gang la yod pa de tsam zhig go //
analyzed: bye brag gang la yod pa de tsam zhig go //
translated: Thus, the thing that exists is just that which has that particularity.🔽That is all.

original: de tsam nyid yin pa'i phyir spyi'i rang bzhin gyi chos can la sgrub na mngon par 'dod pa'i don 'ga' zhig kyang grub par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de tsam nyid yin pa'i phyir spyi'i rang bzhin gyi chos can la sgrub na mngon par 'dod pa'i don 'ga' zhig kyang grub par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Because it is just that, if one proves a subject that is a universal nature, then one does not establish any of the intended meanings.

original: gang gis bsgrub par 'gyur ba de lta bur gyur pa'i dngos po ni phyir rgol ba sus kyang bkag pa med do //
analyzed: gang gis bsgrub par 'gyur ba de lta bur gyur pa'i dngos po ni phyir rgol ba sus kyang bkag pa med do //
translated: No one can refute the existence of a thing that is such that it is established.

original: gal te de lta na khyad par bsgrub byar ci ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de lta na khyad par bsgrub byar ci ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If that is so, then how can a particularity be the probandum?

original: kho bo cag thams cad du spyi'i rnam pas yod pa bsgrub ba'i skabs su yang khyad par bsgrub bya nyid du bsgrub par 'gyur ro zhes ni mi smra'o //
analyzed: kho bo cag thams cad du spyi'i rnam pas yod pa bsgrub ba'i skabs su yang khyad par bsgrub bya nyid du bsgrub par 'gyur ro zhes ni mi smra'o //
translated: We do not say that in the context of proving existence by means of a universal, a particularity is the probandum.

original: de skad smras na ni yod pa tsam sgrub par byed pa yin pa la yang de bzhin du khyad par du yang gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de skad smras na ni yod pa tsam sgrub par byed pa yin pa la yang de bzhin du khyad par du yang gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
translated: If you say that, then in the proof of mere existence, a particularity would also be the logical reason.
