original: 'o na ci ltar khyad par bsgrub byar 'gyur ro zhes brjod ce na /
analyzed: 'o na ci ltar khyad par bsgrub byar 'gyur ro zhes brjod ce na /
translated: Well then, how can you establish a distinction?

original: tshig le'ur byas pa'i don dgrol ba'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: tshig le'ur byas pa'i don dgrol ba'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: In order to explain the meaning of the verses, he says:

original: dngos po tsam gyi khyad par can ni yod pa tsam gyi rang bzhin te /
analyzed: dngos po tsam gyi khyad par can ni yod pa tsam gyi rang bzhin te /
translated: The distinction of mere entity is the nature of mere existence.

original: 'ga' zhig yod de shes rab tu sgrub pa'i rgol ba'i'o //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig yod de shes rab tu sgrub pa'i rgol ba'i'o //
translated: There is some existence, the opponent’s establishment of wisdom.

original: 'dir zhes bya ba yod par sgrub par byed pa la yod pa 'grub pa'i rgyu 'gog pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir zhes bya ba yod par sgrub par byed pa la yod pa 'grub pa'i rgyu 'gog pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Here, he does not refute the cause of establishing existence in order to establish existence.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na ;
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na ;
translated: Why is that?

original: rang bzhin gyi khyad par ma bstan pa yod pa tsam ni rtogs pa po 'ga' la yang 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi khyad par ma bstan pa yod pa tsam ni rtogs pa po 'ga' la yang 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the mere existence that is not taught as a distinctive nature is not contradictory for any knower.

original: 'gal na ni 'ga' zhig cung zhig sgrub pa'am /
analyzed: 'gal na ni 'ga' zhig cung zhig sgrub pa'am /
translated: If it were contradictory, then it would be the establishment of some slight thing,

original: 'gog pa yin na 'di la ni 'gal ba med do //🔽'di snyam du gal te mi 'gog na 'o na ni yod pa @101a * //
analyzed: 'gog pa yin na 'di la ni 'gal ba med do // 'di snyam du gal te mi 'gog na 'o na ni yod pa @101a * //
translated: but there is no contradiction here.🔽If you think, “If it is not refuted, then existence is established without impediment,”

original: gegs med par grub po zhe na /
analyzed: gegs med par grub po zhe na /
translated: then what is the point of this?

original: gegs med pa ni bden na 'on kyang rtag pa nyid la sogs pa'i rnam pa dang mi ldan pa de ltar don 'ga' zhig yod do zhes bya bar /
analyzed: gegs med pa ni bden na 'on kyang rtag pa nyid la sogs pa'i rnam pa dang mi ldan pa de ltar don 'ga' zhig yod do zhes bya bar /
translated: It is true that there is no contradiction, but still, the meaning of the statement “It exists in that way, without the aspects of permanence, etc.”

original: dper na mig la sogs par gzhan gyi don yin no zhes bya ba lta bu skabs kyis stobs sam /
analyzed: dper na mig la sogs par gzhan gyi don yin no zhes bya ba lta bu skabs kyis stobs sam /
translated: is like the statement “The eye, etc. are for the sake of another,” where the meaning is understood from the context.🔽Or, it is like the statement “The permanent primal substance exists,” where the meaning is understood from the statement itself.

original: dper na gtso bo rtag pa yod do zhes bya ba lta bur sgras ma reg pa'i sgrub byed smras bas rang gi mngon par 'dod pa'i don ci zhig 'grub par 'gyur /
analyzed: dper na gtso bo rtag pa yod do zhes bya ba lta bur sgras ma reg pa'i sgrub byed smras bas rang gi mngon par 'dod pa'i don ci zhig 'grub par 'gyur /
translated: What is the point of stating a proof that the word does not touch?

original: de'i phyir rtag pa 'am gcig pu'i gtso bo yod do zhes gang la gzhan rtsod pa dang / bdag nyid 'dod pa khyad par gyis zin pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rtag pa 'am gcig pu'i gtso bo yod do zhes gang la gzhan rtsod pa dang / bdag nyid 'dod pa khyad par gyis zin pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, the point of the statement “The permanent, unitary primal substance exists” is to prove that the self is the special object of the desire of the opponent.

original: khyad par de bsgrub bya yin na yang chos can gzhan la rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir gtan tshigs rjes su 'gro ba med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khyad par de bsgrub bya yin na yang chos can gzhan la rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir gtan tshigs rjes su 'gro ba med par 'gyur ro //
translated: Even if that special quality is the object of proof, because it does not pervade other subjects, the reason is not concomitant with the subject.

original: de'i phyir rim pa 'dis khyad par bsgrub par bya ba nyid dang / skyon yang mthong nas kho bo cag yod pa bsgrub bya yin na khyad par bsgrub bya nyid du sgrub par 'gyur ro zhes brjod kyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir rim pa 'dis khyad par bsgrub par bya ba nyid dang / skyon yang mthong nas kho bo cag yod pa bsgrub bya yin na khyad par bsgrub bya nyid du sgrub par 'gyur ro zhes brjod kyi /
translated: Therefore, by this process, if the difference is to be established, and if the fault is seen, we say that if existence is the probandum, the difference would be established as the probandum.

original: rgyu mtshan med pa nyid du khyad par bsgrub byar 'gyur ba ni ma yin la /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan med pa nyid du khyad par bsgrub byar 'gyur ba ni ma yin la /
translated: But it is not that the difference would be the probandum without reason.

original: skyon med par khyad par la rtsod pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: skyon med par khyad par la rtsod pa yang ma yin no //
translated: And it is not that the difference is disputed without fault.

original: gang gi khyad par sgrub par byed par 'gyur ba dang ; gang la rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i skyon du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi khyad par sgrub par byed par 'gyur ba dang ; gang la rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i skyon du 'gyur ro //
translated: The difference would be established for someone, and the fault would be that there would be no pervasion.

original: spyi tsam sgrub par byed pa la ni de ltar mi nus pa cung zad kyang med de /
analyzed: spyi tsam sgrub par byed pa la ni de ltar mi nus pa cung zad kyang med de /
translated: But there is not the slightest inability to establish a mere generality.

original: don 'di la tshig le'ur byas pa bzlog nas 'chad pa ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: don 'di la tshig le'ur byas pa bzlog nas 'chad pa ni mi rigs te /
translated: It is not right to explain this point by reversing the metrical feet.

original: slob dpon gyis phyed 'og ma sngar 'don mi nus pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: slob dpon gyis phyed 'og ma sngar 'don mi nus pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not that the master cannot recite the latter half first.

original: ci ltar khyad par bsgrub par bya ba yin na rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i skyon du 'gyur te /
analyzed: ci ltar khyad par bsgrub par bya ba yin na rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i skyon du 'gyur te /
translated: If you are proving a specific property, then there is the fault that there is no pervasion.🔽Because the universal does not pervade.

original: gang gi phyir spyis rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir spyis rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Nāgārjuna responds:

original: bshad pa / gang gi phyir chos can gtso bo'i rang bzhin de rtsa ba'i rang bzhin dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir gcig pu dang / rjes su 'gro ba med par 'jig pa med pa'i phyir rtag pa dang / yon tan gsum gyi bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir bde ba dang sdug bsngal dang gti mug gi bdag nyid dam /
analyzed: bshad pa / gang gi phyir chos can gtso bo'i rang bzhin de rtsa ba'i rang bzhin dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir gcig pu dang / rjes su 'gro ba med par 'jig pa med pa'i phyir rtag pa dang / yon tan gsum gyi bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir bde ba dang sdug bsngal dang gti mug gi bdag nyid dam /
translated: Because the nature of the primary nature, the subject, is not different from the fundamental nature, it is one, and because it is not destroyed without pervasion, it is permanent, and because it is the nature of the three qualities, it is the nature of pleasure, pain, and delusion, or it is the object of enjoyment.

original: longs spyod par bya ba zhes bya ba de lta bu'o //
analyzed: longs spyod par bya ba zhes bya ba de lta bu'o //
translated: It is like that.

original: rnam pa ci zhig ltar yang rung zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gang yang rung bas @101b khyad par du byas pa khyad par can gyi ngo bo bsgrub bya nyid du bsgrub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam pa ci zhig ltar yang rung zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gang yang rung bas @101b khyad par du byas pa khyad par can gyi ngo bo bsgrub bya nyid du bsgrub par 'gyur ro //
translated: In any way at all means that whatever aspect is specified, the nature of the specific property is established as the object of affirmation.

original: mi 'dod pa spangs pa'i phyir chos can khyad par du yang gdon mi za bar bya dgos so //
analyzed: mi 'dod pa spangs pa'i phyir chos can khyad par du yang gdon mi za bar bya dgos so //
translated: In order to avoid the undesirable, one must certainly qualify the subject.

original: des na rjes su 'gro ba'i dus su yang spyi ma yin te /
analyzed: des na rjes su 'gro ba'i dus su yang spyi ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, even at the time of the positive concomitance, there is no universal.

original: 'dir 'dod pa'i bsgrub par bya ba nyid bstan par bya ba yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'dir 'dod pa'i bsgrub par bya ba nyid bstan par bya ba yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Here, the probandum itself is to be taught.

original: de ni khyad par du byas pa de ltar chos can gzhan la rjes su 'gro ba med do //
analyzed: de ni khyad par du byas pa de ltar chos can gzhan la rjes su 'gro ba med do //
translated: That is qualified in that way, but there is no positive concomitance with another subject.

original: gang yang yod pa tsam rjes su 'gro ba de grub mod /
analyzed: gang yang yod pa tsam rjes su 'gro ba de grub mod /
translated: If there were mere existence of the positive concomitance, that would be established.

original: rjes su 'gro ba can gyi yod pa de grub pas ni 'dod pa'i don cung zad kyang mi 'grub bo //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba can gyi yod pa de grub pas ni 'dod pa'i don cung zad kyang mi 'grub bo //
translated: But the existence of the positive concomitance does not establish the slightest bit of the intended meaning.

original: de'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i skyon yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i skyon yin no //
translated: Therefore, there is the fault of no positive concomitance.

original: da ni gzhan dag 'dod pa'i bsgrub bya la yang rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i skyon dang grub pa la sgrub pa nyid mtshungs par bstan pa'i phyir smras pa /
analyzed: da ni gzhan dag 'dod pa'i bsgrub bya la yang rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i skyon dang grub pa la sgrub pa nyid mtshungs par bstan pa'i phyir smras pa /
translated: Now, in order to show that the fault of no positive concomitance also applies to the probandum that others assert, and that the mere establishment is the same, it is said:

original: gal te de bzhin du mi la sogs pa bsgrub par bya ba la yang rjes su 'gro ba med pa dang / grub pa la sgrub par thal bar 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te de bzhin du mi la sogs pa bsgrub par bya ba la yang rjes su 'gro ba med pa dang / grub pa la sgrub par thal bar 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
translated: If it is so, then in the case of establishing fire, etc., there is no concomitance, and it follows that what is already established is established again.

original: ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: 'di ltar me la sogs pa bsgrub pa de la yang me yod pa la ni rtsod pa 'ga' yang med de me tsam ni grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar me la sogs pa bsgrub pa de la yang me yod pa la ni rtsod pa 'ga' yang med de me tsam ni grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Thus, in the case of establishing fire, etc., there is no dispute about the existence of fire, because mere fire is already established.

original: de grub pas ni cung zad byar yang med de /
analyzed: de grub pas ni cung zad byar yang med de /
translated: Since that is established, there is nothing to be done.

original: de ni 'jug pa'i yan lag ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni 'jug pa'i yan lag ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that is not a part of the engagement.

original: yul gyi khyad par can gyi me 'jug pa'i yan lag yin gyi /
analyzed: yul gyi khyad par can gyi me 'jug pa'i yan lag yin gyi /
translated: The fire that has the distinction of the object is a part of the engagement,

original: me tsam ni ma yin no //
analyzed: me tsam ni ma yin no //
translated: but not mere fire.

original: 'o na de nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na de nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhe na /
translated: Well, then, that itself is to be established.

original: smras pa / yul la sogs pa can gyi gzhi de nyid kyi khyad par gang la yod pa de ni rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir mi 'grub po ;
analyzed: smras pa / yul la sogs pa can gyi gzhi de nyid kyi khyad par gang la yod pa de ni rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir mi 'grub po ;
translated: We say: That which has the distinction of the very basis that has the object, etc., is not established because it does not have concomitance.

original: des ni spyi ni grub pa la sgrub pa yin la /
analyzed: des ni spyi ni grub pa la sgrub pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, the universal is the establishment of what is already established.

original: khyad par la ni rjes su 'gro ba med pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: khyad par la ni rjes su 'gro ba med pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But it does not follow that it is a particular.

original: ci ltar rjes su 'gro ba med /
analyzed: ci ltar rjes su 'gro ba med /
translated: How does it not follow?

original: 'di ltar gang gis rjes su 'gro ba med par 'gyur brten yin yang gzhi des med de khyad par gyi dngos pos khyad par du byed pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar gang gis rjes su 'gro ba med par 'gyur brten yin yang gzhi des med de khyad par gyi dngos pos khyad par du byed pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not that it is not a basis because it does not follow, but it is not a particular because it is distinguished by the nature of a particular.

original: mi ldan pa ldog pa'i rgyus na sa phyogs kyi me rnam par gcod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi ldan pa ldog pa'i rgyus na sa phyogs kyi me rnam par gcod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the cause of the exclusion of non-possession, it excludes fire in a place without fire.

original: don 'di ni lhan cig ma yin par bshad zin to //
analyzed: don 'di ni lhan cig ma yin par bshad zin to //
translated: This meaning has already been explained in the section on non-simultaneity.

original: gal te khyab pa'i dus su mi ldan pa rnam par bcad pa'i me ma grub pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te khyab pa'i dus su mi ldan pa rnam par bcad pa'i me ma grub pa ma yin nam /
translated: If it is not established that fire is excluded from non-possession at the time of pervasion,

original: de grub na yang rjes su 'gro ba @102a * //
analyzed: de grub na yang rjes su 'gro ba @102a * //
translated: even if it is established, it does not follow that it is a particular.

original: rjes su ci'i don du 'brang zhe na /
analyzed: rjes su ci'i don du 'brang zhe na /
translated: For what purpose does it follow?

original: de lta mod kyi 'on kyang gzhi med kyi me mi srid pa'i phyir spyir bsgrub par bya ba la yang phyogs dang mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rnam par dbye ba med pa'i phyir khyad par med par gzhi yang 'phen pa na mngon par 'dod pa'i yul yang 'phangs par
analyzed: de lta mod kyi 'on kyang gzhi med kyi me mi srid pa'i phyir spyir bsgrub par bya ba la yang phyogs dang mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rnam par dbye ba med pa'i phyir khyad par med par gzhi yang 'phen pa na mngon par 'dod pa'i yul yang 'phangs par
translated: But still, since a fire without a basis is impossible, in general, when the probandum is projected, the basis is also projected without distinction, because there is no division of the similar class.

original: 'gyur ro // de'i phyir yul de khyab pa'i dus su yang ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pas khyab pa yin par brjod kyi de ltar grub pa'i phyir ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'gyur ro // de'i phyir yul de khyab pa'i dus su yang ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pas khyab pa yin par brjod kyi de ltar grub pa'i phyir ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, even at the time of pervasion, it is said that the probandum is pervaded by the exclusion of non-connection, but not because it is established in that way.

original: gang gi phyir shugs kyi gzhi rnams khyad par med pas nang du 'dus pa'i phyir ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir shugs kyi gzhi rnams khyad par med pas nang du 'dus pa'i phyir ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pa de'i phyir /
translated: Because the bases are included without distinction by implication, the exclusion of non-connection is made.

original: gzhi nges pa med pa'i me'i spyi de nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: gzhi nges pa med pa'i me'i spyi de nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, that very generality of fire, which has no definite basis, is the probandum.

original: 'di snyam du 'o na ni spyi dang ldan pa'i yod pas kyang khyab pa'i dus su khyad par gtso bo'i mtshan nyid 'phen te /
analyzed: 'di snyam du 'o na ni spyi dang ldan pa'i yod pas kyang khyab pa'i dus su khyad par gtso bo'i mtshan nyid 'phen te /
translated: If one thinks, Then at the time of pervasion, the primary characteristic of the qualifier is projected by the existence that possesses the generality,

original: dper na mes yul de 'phen pa bzhin no ;
analyzed: dper na mes yul de 'phen pa bzhin no ;
translated: For example, fire is the impelling cause of a place.

original: des na 'dir yang ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pas khyad par grub pa yod do zhe na /
analyzed: des na 'dir yang ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pas khyad par grub pa yod do zhe na /
translated: Therefore, in this case, too, the qualifier is established by the exclusion of non-connection.🔽Nāgārjuna responds:

original: bshad pa / de bzhin du yod pa bsgrub par bya ba 'dir yang mngon par 'dod pa'i khyad par 'ga' zhig la yod pa sgrub pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bshad pa / de bzhin du yod pa bsgrub par bya ba 'dir yang mngon par 'dod pa'i khyad par 'ga' zhig la yod pa sgrub pa ni ma yin no //
translated: In this proof of existence, too, the existence of some particular thing that is desired is not established.

original: ci ltar gtso bo la sogs pa'i sgras brjod par bya ba'i don nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ci ltar gtso bo la sogs pa'i sgras brjod par bya ba'i don nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the object of expression by the words “primal substance” and so on does not exist.

original: rjes su 'gro ba'i dus dang / sgrub par byed pa'i byed pa rdzogs pa'i dus su gang zhig ma 'brel ba rnam par gcod pa dang ldan pa'i yod pa brtags par 'gyur ba rtag pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa ni 'ga' yang ma grub po //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba'i dus dang / sgrub par byed pa'i byed pa rdzogs pa'i dus su gang zhig ma 'brel ba rnam par gcod pa dang ldan pa'i yod pa brtags par 'gyur ba rtag pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa ni 'ga' yang ma grub po //
translated: At the time of the pervasion and at the time of the completion of the proof, the existence that is connected with the exclusion of non-connection and that is imagined to be connected with permanence and so on is not established at all.

original: sa phyogs dang sgra ni tshad ma gzhan gyis grub pas khyab pa'i dus su de dang ma 'brel pa rnam par bcad pa dang ldan pa bsgrub par bya ba'i chos yin pa dang / phyogs kyi chos sdud pa'i dus su de'i khyad par dang ldan pa grub pa rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: sa phyogs dang sgra ni tshad ma gzhan gyis grub pas khyab pa'i dus su de dang ma 'brel pa rnam par bcad pa dang ldan pa bsgrub par bya ba'i chos yin pa dang / phyogs kyi chos sdud pa'i dus su de'i khyad par dang ldan pa grub pa rigs pa yin no //
translated: Since the place and sound are established by other valid cognitions, it is the predicate to be proven that is “qualified by the exclusion of non-connection with that” at the time of the pervasion. And it is logical that at the time of the inclusion of the property of the subject, the particular of that is established.

original: des na khyab pa'i dus su khyad par 'ga' yang ma grub pa'i phyir de ni khyad par med pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: des na khyab pa'i dus su khyad par 'ga' yang ma grub pa'i phyir de ni khyad par med pa kho na yin no //
translated: Therefore, since no particular is established at the time of the pervasion, it is indeed without particular.

original: ci ltar med de /
analyzed: ci ltar med de /
translated: How is it nonexistent?

original: 'di ltar de yang ci zhig ltar shes par bya ba yin la /🔽shes nas sgras brjod par bya ba yin zhing /
analyzed: 'di ltar de yang ci zhig ltar shes par bya ba yin la / shes nas sgras brjod par bya ba yin zhing /
translated: In that case, how is that to be known?🔽Having known it, it is to be expressed by words.

original: brjod nas tshad mar nges par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: brjod nas tshad mar nges par bya ba yin te /
translated: Having expressed it, it is to be ascertained by valid cognition.

original: de'i phyir @102b de yang shes bya nyid la sogs par grub pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i phyir @102b de yang shes bya nyid la sogs par grub pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, that is established as being an object of knowledge and so on.

original: des na de dang ma 'brel pa rnam par bcad pa dang ldan pa'i yod pa grub po zhe na /
analyzed: des na de dang ma 'brel pa rnam par bcad pa dang ldan pa'i yod pa grub po zhe na /
translated: Therefore, existence qualified by the exclusion of non-connection with that is established.

original: ci da ni shes bya yod do zhes te /
analyzed: ci da ni shes bya yod do zhes te /
translated: Now, is it that “the object of knowledge exists”?

original: de tsam gyis gtso bo de grub par 'gyur ram /
analyzed: de tsam gyis gtso bo de grub par 'gyur ram /
translated: But is the primal substance established by that much?

original: gtso bo'i don ni shes bya la sogs pa'i don du 'gyur gyi lhag pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gtso bo'i don ni shes bya la sogs pa'i don du 'gyur gyi lhag pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The meaning of “primal substance” is the meaning of “knowable object,” and so on, but not the meaning of “remainder.”

original: re zhig de tsam du yang gtso bo grub pa yin te /
analyzed: re zhig de tsam du yang gtso bo grub pa yin te /
translated: Even by that much, the primal substance is established.

original: gtan med pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gtan med pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: It is not utterly nonexistent.🔽In response, Nāgārjuna explains:

original: bshad pa / de lta na yang shes bya la sogs pas ci ltar 'grub bar 'gyur /
analyzed: bshad pa / de lta na yang shes bya la sogs pas ci ltar 'grub bar 'gyur /
translated: Even so, how could it be established by the knowable object, and so on?

original: 'di ltar shes bya tsam kho nar 'grub par 'gyur na /
analyzed: 'di ltar shes bya tsam kho nar 'grub par 'gyur na /
translated: If it is established as merely the knowable object,

original: de tsam ni gtso bo yin par mi 'dod do //
analyzed: de tsam ni gtso bo yin par mi 'dod do //
translated: that much is not asserted to be the primal substance.

original: da ni khyad par can gyi yod pa gzhir bstan pa'i phyir smras pa /
analyzed: da ni khyad par can gyi yod pa gzhir bstan pa'i phyir smras pa /
translated: Now, in order to teach that the existence of the qualifier is the basis, he says:

original: gal te blos bskyed pa sgra'i don yin gyi phyi rol ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te blos bskyed pa sgra'i don yin gyi phyi rol ni ma yin no //
translated: If the object of the word is generated by the mind, it is not external.

original: de gang zhe na /
analyzed: de gang zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: rnam par rtog pa'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i rnam pa'o //
translated: It is the aspect of conception.

original: de ni rtag pa la sogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni rtag pa la sogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa ma yin te /
translated: It does not possess the qualities of permanence, and so on,

original: de ltar brtags pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar brtags pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is imagined to be that way.

original: des na gtso bo'i sgras brjod par bya ba med par ci ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: des na gtso bo'i sgras brjod par bya ba med par ci ltar 'gyur /
translated: Therefore, how could the referent of the word “primary nature” not exist?

original: rang gi ngo bos ni sgra'i don thams cad du grub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bos ni sgra'i don thams cad du grub pa'i phyir /
translated: Because all referents of words are established by their own nature.

original: phyi rol gyi nye bar len pa'i yod pa bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi nye bar len pa'i yod pa bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
translated: The existence of external appropriated aggregates is to be proven.

original: des na ci ltar khyad par can ma grub ce na /
analyzed: des na ci ltar khyad par can ma grub ce na /
translated: Therefore, how could the qualifier not be established?

original: de ltar na yang khyad par ma grub po zhes ston pa ni bsgrub par bya ba yin mod /
analyzed: de ltar na yang khyad par ma grub po zhes ston pa ni bsgrub par bya ba yin mod /
translated: Even so, the teacher shows that the qualifier is not established.

original: 'on kyang gang gi phyir gtso bo la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi khyad par rtag pa nyid la sogs pa'i rten ma yin te gzhi ma yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang gang gi phyir gtso bo la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi khyad par rtag pa nyid la sogs pa'i rten ma yin te gzhi ma yin no //
translated: However, because the qualifier, such as the nature of the primary nature, is not the basis or support of such qualities as permanence,

original: de bas na sgra'i don de yang khyad par med pa sgra'i don tsam du rnam par gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: de bas na sgra'i don de yang khyad par med pa sgra'i don tsam du rnam par gnas pa yin te /
translated: therefore, that referent of the word is established as a mere referent of the word without a qualifier.

original: sgra'i don gzhan las khyad par med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sgra'i don gzhan las khyad par med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The referent of the word is not distinguished from other referents of words.

original: de lta yin dang ci ltar sngar brjod pa bzhin du da ltar yang brjod par bya ba'i dngos po 'ga' zhig yod do zhes bsgrub par bya bar 'gyur ro//
analyzed: de lta yin dang ci ltar sngar brjod pa bzhin du da ltar yang brjod par bya ba'i dngos po 'ga' zhig yod do zhes bsgrub par bya bar 'gyur ro//
translated: If that were so, then as previously stated, it would be something to be established, as in “some existent thing is to be expressed now, just as it was expressed before.”

original: gal te gtso bo'i rang bzhin gyi rten yin na ni de nyid gtso bor grub par 'gyur gyi bsgrub par bya ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te gtso bo'i rang bzhin gyi rten yin na ni de nyid gtso bor grub par 'gyur gyi bsgrub par bya ba ni ma yin no //
translated: If it is the basis of the nature of pradhāna, then that itself would be established as pradhāna, but it is not to be established.

original: de'i rang bzhin med na ni sgra'i don gzhan dag las khyad par med pa'i phyir sgra'i don las phyi rol du gyur na /🔽phyi rol gyi nye bar len pa 'ga' zhig @103a * //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin med na ni sgra'i don gzhan dag las khyad par med pa'i phyir sgra'i don las phyi rol du gyur na / phyi rol gyi nye bar len pa 'ga' zhig @103a * //
translated: If it does not have that nature, then because it is not distinguished from other referents of words, it is external to the referent of the word.

original: yod do zhes bsgrub par bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yod do zhes bsgrub par bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is external, then it would be something to be established as an external appropriated object.

original: ci ltar rtag pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi rten ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar rtag pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi rten ma yin zhe na /
translated: How is it not the basis of the nature of permanence, etc.?

original: bshad pa / brtags pa yin pa'i phyir sgra'i don rang nyid ni rtag pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yon tan gyi khyad par 'ga' zhig la brten pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bshad pa / brtags pa yin pa'i phyir sgra'i don rang nyid ni rtag pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yon tan gyi khyad par 'ga' zhig la brten pa ma yin no //
translated: It is explained: The referent of the word is not the basis of some particular quality, such as permanence, because it is imagined.

original: 'o na ci ltar sgra'i don khyad par can du rtogs she na /
analyzed: 'o na ci ltar sgra'i don khyad par can du rtogs she na /
translated: Well then, how is the special meaning of the word understood?

original: nye bar len pa'i chos de dag la dogs pa yin te /
analyzed: nye bar len pa'i chos de dag la dogs pa yin te /
translated: It is suspected that those phenomena are appropriated.

original: nye bar len pa dang rnam par brtag par bya ba'i don dag gcig tu mngon par zhe na pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nye bar len pa dang rnam par brtag par bya ba'i don dag gcig tu mngon par zhe na pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the meaning of the word and the object of investigation are conceived of as one.

original: dper na bum pa'am byas pa dang tha mi dad par zhen pa'i phyir sgra'i don bum pa dang byas pa yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na bum pa'am byas pa dang tha mi dad par zhen pa'i phyir sgra'i don bum pa dang byas pa yin pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, because the meaning of the word is conceived of as not different from the pot or the produced, the meaning of the word is the pot or the produced.

original: gang gi phyir khyad par nye bar 'dod pa yin pa de'i phyir nye bar len pa ma grub pa dag la ni mi srid do //
analyzed: gang gi phyir khyad par nye bar 'dod pa yin pa de'i phyir nye bar len pa ma grub pa dag la ni mi srid do //
translated: Because the special is desired, therefore it is impossible for those that are not established to appropriate.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar yin pa des na sgra'i don 'di dag ni khyad par med pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar yin pa des na sgra'i don 'di dag ni khyad par med pa yin no //
translated: Because that is so, therefore these meanings of the word are not special.

original: des na de dag la don gyi nye bar len pa can nyid sgrub na ni yod pa tsam nyid sgrub pa yin gyi /
analyzed: des na de dag la don gyi nye bar len pa can nyid sgrub na ni yod pa tsam nyid sgrub pa yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, if the mere existence of the word is established, then the mere existence is established.

original: don gyi khyad par sgrub pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don gyi khyad par sgrub pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But the special meaning is not established.

original: de don gyi nye bar len pa can du sgrub pa ni don med do //
analyzed: de don gyi nye bar len pa can du sgrub pa ni don med do //
translated: It is meaningless to prove that the word is a name-as-bearer in the sense of the object.

original: de lta yin dang gang gi phyir nye bar btags pa'i khyad par can gyi sgra'i don la dngos po mi 'grub pa de'i phyir khyad par yod par sgrub pa la sgra'i don chos can ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta yin dang gang gi phyir nye bar btags pa'i khyad par can gyi sgra'i don la dngos po mi 'grub pa de'i phyir khyad par yod par sgrub pa la sgra'i don chos can ma yin no //
translated: If that were so, then since the meaning of a word that has a secondary-derived affix is not established as a real entity, the meaning of the word is not the subject when proving that the word has a secondary-derived affix.

original: khyad par dgag pa sgrub na ni chos can yin pa de nyid de /
analyzed: khyad par dgag pa sgrub na ni chos can yin pa de nyid de /
translated: But if the word is being proved to have a secondary-derived affix, then the meaning of the word is the subject.

original: nye bar btags pa ni rnam pa de lta bu'i nye bar len pa can du ma nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nye bar btags pa ni rnam pa de lta bu'i nye bar len pa can du ma nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the secondary-derived affix is not ascertained as a name-as-bearer in that way.

original: des na ci skad brjod pa'i yon tan can gtso bo la sogs pa med pa'i phyir sgra'i don chos can du rigs so //
analyzed: des na ci skad brjod pa'i yon tan can gtso bo la sogs pa med pa'i phyir sgra'i don chos can du rigs so //
translated: Therefore, it is correct that the meaning of the word is the subject when proving that the word has a secondary-derived affix, because there is no primary nature that has the qualities that are expressed by the word.

original: gal nye 'dir don tsam gyi nye bar len pa don med pa yin na /
analyzed: gal nye 'dir don tsam gyi nye bar len pa don med pa yin na /
translated: If the name-as-bearer in the sense of the object is meaningless here,

original: mngon par 'dod pa'i rjes su dpag pa gzhan du yang thun mong ba spyi tsam grub pa'i phyir bsgrub byar mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: mngon par 'dod pa'i rjes su dpag pa gzhan du yang thun mong ba spyi tsam grub pa'i phyir bsgrub byar mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: then since a mere general commonality is established in other inferences that are desired, the thesis would not be established.

original: bshad pa / gzhan du ni gzhi nges pa med pa'i me'i spyi grub pa de nyid yul der grub pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: bshad pa / gzhan du ni gzhi nges pa med pa'i me'i spyi grub pa de nyid yul der grub pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
translated: In the other case, the establishment of the mere fire that lacks a specified basis is the object of affirmation.

original: yod pa la ni ma grub pa cung zad kyang grub pa med do //
analyzed: yod pa la ni ma grub pa cung zad kyang grub pa med do //
translated: And there is nothing at all that is established for that which exists.

original: gal te de lta na der yang gzhi nges pa med pa'i me bsgrub par bya ba yin la /
analyzed: gal te de lta na der yang gzhi nges pa med pa'i me bsgrub par bya ba yin la /
translated: If that is so, then in that case, the mere fire that lacks a specified basis is the object of affirmation.

original: bsgrub bya gang yin pa @103b des ni khyab par bstan par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub bya gang yin pa @103b des ni khyab par bstan par bya ba yin no //
translated: And that which is the object of affirmation is what is to be indicated as the pervasion.

original: yul de dang mi ldan pa ma yin pa'i phyir mes khyab pa grub pa ni med do zhes de las cir 'gyur /
analyzed: yul de dang mi ldan pa ma yin pa'i phyir mes khyab pa grub pa ni med do zhes de las cir 'gyur /
translated: Since it is not the case that the mere fire that lacks a specified basis does not possess that place, there is no establishment of the pervasion by fire. What is the point of that?

original: gal te 'ga' zhig yul dang 'brel ba'i mes khyab par byed na de la rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i skyon 'dir 'gyur na phyogs dang 'brel ba'i me'i spyi de lta bus ni 'ga' la yang khyab par byed pa med do //
analyzed: gal te 'ga' zhig yul dang 'brel ba'i mes khyab par byed na de la rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i skyon 'dir 'gyur na phyogs dang 'brel ba'i me'i spyi de lta bus ni 'ga' la yang khyab par byed pa med do //
translated: If someone were to make the pervasion by fire that is related to a place, then this error of the absence of the forward pervasion would occur. But the mere fire that is related to a place does not pervade anything at all.

original: des na su la skyon 'dir 'gyur //
analyzed: des na su la skyon 'dir 'gyur //
translated: So to whom does this error occur?

original: ci ltar mi byed /
analyzed: ci ltar mi byed /
translated: Why does it not occur?

original: sgrub par 'dod pa'i don lta bu yin no zhe na /
analyzed: sgrub par 'dod pa'i don lta bu yin no zhe na /
translated: It is like the meaning of what one wishes to prove.🔽In response to this, Nāgārjuna explains:

original: bshad pa / gang gi phyir rgol ba gzhan la sgrub par byed pas ni gang du ba yod pa de na me yod do zhes du ba med na mi 'byung bar gzhi nges pa med pa'i mes khyab par bstan par bya ba yin la /
analyzed: bshad pa / gang gi phyir rgol ba gzhan la sgrub par byed pas ni gang du ba yod pa de na me yod do zhes du ba med na mi 'byung bar gzhi nges pa med pa'i mes khyab par bstan par bya ba yin la /
translated: Because the proponent of a proof to another party demonstrates that where there is smoke there is fire, he teaches that fire pervades smoke, which is ascertained as the basis of the nonobservation of what is incompatible.

original: de ltar gzhi nges pa med pa'i me tsam gyis khyab pa grub pa yin na /
analyzed: de ltar gzhi nges pa med pa'i me tsam gyis khyab pa grub pa yin na /
translated: If in this way the mere fire that is not ascertained as the basis is established as the pervasion,

original: des chos can gang du snang ba der me'i blo skyed par byed do //
analyzed: des chos can gang du snang ba der me'i blo skyed par byed do //
translated: then that generates the cognition of fire in relation to the subject where smoke appears.

original: sgron ma bzhin du rung ba nyid kyis ni du ba go bar byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sgron ma bzhin du rung ba nyid kyis ni du ba go bar byed pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not that smoke is understood by virtue of its being suitable to be a lamp.

original: 'on kyang med na mi 'byung bar des pas ma yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang med na mi 'byung bar des pas ma yin no //
translated: However, it is not by virtue of its being ascertained as the basis of the nonobservation of what is incompatible.

original: de'i phyir lkog tu gyur pa'i don rtogs pa ni mthong ba med na mi 'byung bar nges pa las yin gyi ngo bo las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir lkog tu gyur pa'i don rtogs pa ni mthong ba med na mi 'byung bar nges pa las yin gyi ngo bo las ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore the realization of a hidden object is from the ascertainment of the nonobservation of what is incompatible, not from the nature of the object.

original: lkog tu gyur pa rtogs pa thams cad la ni med na mi 'byung bar nges pa yan lag yin la /
analyzed: lkog tu gyur pa rtogs pa thams cad la ni med na mi 'byung bar nges pa yan lag yin la /
translated: In all cases of the realization of a hidden object, the ascertainment of the nonobservation of what is incompatible is a factor.

original: phyogs dang 'brel pa can ni nges pa ma yin no zhes bshad pa ni /
analyzed: phyogs dang 'brel pa can ni nges pa ma yin no zhes bshad pa ni /
translated: The statement “that which is related to a part is not ascertained” is explained as follows:

original: de la bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa ni ci yang mi dgos te /
analyzed: de la bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa ni ci yang mi dgos te /
translated: It is not necessary at all to indicate the probandum,

original: phyogs de la mthong ba dang 'brel pa bstan pa tsam gyis 'dod pa grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyogs de la mthong ba dang 'brel pa bstan pa tsam gyis 'dod pa grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the mere indication of the relation of seeing to the part establishes the thesis.

original: gal te bsgrub bya bstan par bya ba ma yin du chug kyang /
analyzed: gal te bsgrub bya bstan par bya ba ma yin du chug kyang /
translated: Even if it is not necessary to indicate the probandum,

original: rjes su 'gro ba ni des bstan par bya ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba ni des bstan par bya ba yin no zhe na /
translated: the pervasion must be indicated.

original: de ma bstan na yang zhes smos so //
analyzed: de ma bstan na yang zhes smos so //
translated: The response to that is, “Even if it is not indicated. . . . ”

original: gang gi tshe ma bstan kyang yul de'i khyad par can shugs nyid kyis rtogs pa de'i tshe shugs kyis go ba nges rjes su 'gro ba byed pa yang don med pa nyid do //
analyzed: gang gi tshe ma bstan kyang yul de'i khyad par can shugs nyid kyis rtogs pa de'i tshe shugs kyis go ba nges rjes su 'gro ba byed pa yang don med pa nyid do //
translated: When, even though it is not indicated, the qualifier of the object is understood by force of the statement itself, then it is pointless to indicate the pervasion by force of the statement.

original: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being said:

original: gal te de lta bu'i rjes su 'gro ba bstan pa med par de lta bu'i don mi 'grub na de dang rjes su 'gro ba bstan par bya bar 'gyur na /
analyzed: gal te de lta bu'i rjes su 'gro ba bstan pa med par de lta bu'i don mi 'grub na de dang rjes su 'gro ba bstan par bya bar 'gyur na /
translated: If the meaning is not established without the indication of such a pervasion, then the pervasion would have to be indicated.

original: 'dir ni de lta bu'i rjes su 'gro ba med kyang grub pa yod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dir ni de lta bu'i rjes su 'gro ba med kyang grub pa yod pa yin no //
translated: But here, even though there is no such concomitance, there is establishment.

original: yod pa grub @104a * //
analyzed: yod pa grub @104a * //
translated: The establishment of existence

original: pa la de lta bu'i khyad par ma grub pa'i phyir shugs kyis de dang 'brel pa rnam par bcad pas khyab pa grub pa med la /
analyzed: pa la de lta bu'i khyad par ma grub pa'i phyir shugs kyis de dang 'brel pa rnam par bcad pas khyab pa grub pa med la /
translated: is not established as such a distinction, so there is no establishment of pervasion by the exclusion of that connection by implication.

original: phyogs kyi chos nye bar sdud pa'i dus su grub pa yang med do //
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos nye bar sdud pa'i dus su grub pa yang med do //
translated: And there is no establishment at the time of the collection of the property of the subject.

original: gal te me tsam gyis khyab pa yin na ci ltar ma 'brel pa rnam par bcad pa bsgrub bya yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te me tsam gyis khyab pa yin na ci ltar ma 'brel pa rnam par bcad pa bsgrub bya yin zhe na /
translated: If it is pervaded by mere fire, how is the exclusion of non-connection established as the probandum?

original: bshad pa / gang gi phyir rim pa de lta yin pa de'i phyir du ba 'di me med na mi 'byung bar 'grub pa'i shugs nyid kyis phyogs de dang mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pa yin no //
analyzed: bshad pa / gang gi phyir rim pa de lta yin pa de'i phyir du ba 'di me med na mi 'byung bar 'grub pa'i shugs nyid kyis phyogs de dang mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pa yin no //
translated: It is said: Because the sequence is like that, therefore by the force of establishing that this smoke is not produced without fire, the property of the subject is established as the probandum.

original: de'i phyir spyi bsgrub byar brjod do //
analyzed: de'i phyir spyi bsgrub byar brjod do //
translated: Therefore the general is stated as the probandum.

original: gal te me med na du ba yod par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni shugs yin no //
analyzed: gal te me med na du ba yod par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni shugs yin no //
translated: If smoke existed without fire, it would not be smoke is the implication.

original: de ltar grub pa de ni skyes bu 'jug pa'i yan lag yin gyi yul ma nges pa'i me tsam ni ma yin pas des na bsgrub byar rigs so //
analyzed: de ltar grub pa de ni skyes bu 'jug pa'i yan lag yin gyi yul ma nges pa'i me tsam ni ma yin pas des na bsgrub byar rigs so //
translated: Thus, the establishment of the pervasion is a part of the engagement of the person, but it is not just the mere fire whose object is not ascertained. Therefore, it is suitable to be the probandum.

original: rjes su 'gro ba ni 'ba' zhig gis bstan par bya ba yin gyi spyis ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba ni 'ba' zhig gis bstan par bya ba yin gyi spyis ni ma yin te /
translated: The pervasion is to be stated by the mere example, but not by the general,🔽because it is not included in that, and because there is no purpose in teaching the pervasion by that.

original: de ma bsdus pa'i phyir dang ; des khyab pa bstan pa la dgos pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes gang bshad pa ni me 'di'i du ba la khyab pa ni de ltar te /
analyzed: de ma bsdus pa'i phyir dang ; des khyab pa bstan pa la dgos pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes gang bshad pa ni me 'di'i du ba la khyab pa ni de ltar te /
translated: The pervasion of this fire by that smoke is like that,

original: yul gyi khyad par can de ltar de nye bar bkod pa sngon du 'gro ba can ma yin no //
analyzed: yul gyi khyad par can de ltar de nye bar bkod pa sngon du 'gro ba can ma yin no //
translated: but it is not preceded by the statement of the particular object.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽bsgrub bya brjod pa khyab pa bstan par bya ba 'di la yan lag ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na / bsgrub bya brjod pa khyab pa bstan par bya ba 'di la yan lag ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Why is that?🔽Because the statement of the probandum is not a part of the teaching of the pervasion in this case.

original: rjes su 'gro ba bsgrub bya bstan pa de sngon du 'gro ba can yin na yang dam bca' ba'i ngag sgrub par byed pa'i ngag las sus kyang bzlog tu med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba bsgrub bya bstan pa de sngon du 'gro ba can yin na yang dam bca' ba'i ngag sgrub par byed pa'i ngag las sus kyang bzlog tu med par 'gyur ro //
translated: Even if the teaching of the pervasion is preceded by the teaching of the probandum, no one can refute the statement that establishes the thesis.

original: des na rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i skyon med de /
analyzed: des na rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i skyon med de /
translated: Therefore, there is no fault of non-pervasion.

original: don 'di slob dpon gyis kyang bshad do zhes ston pa ni de skad du yang zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: don 'di slob dpon gyis kyang bshad do zhes ston pa ni de skad du yang zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The master [Dignāga] also explained this point. To show this, [Dharmakīrti] says, “In that way . . .”

original: du ba la sogs pa'i rtags ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos dang mi 'khrul bar spyi'i chos can gzhan du bstan par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: du ba la sogs pa'i rtags ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos dang mi 'khrul bar spyi'i chos can gzhan du bstan par bya ba yin no //
translated: The reason such as smoke is taught to be a general property of the subject that is non-erroneous with regard to the property of the probandum.

original: de ltar shes pa 'khrul pa med pa'i rtags 'khrul pa med pa nyid du nges par bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can de la rab tu grub par gyur na /
analyzed: de ltar shes pa 'khrul pa med pa'i rtags 'khrul pa med pa nyid du nges par bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can de la rab tu grub par gyur na /
translated: In that way, when the reason that is ascertained to be non-erroneous with regard to the knowledge is well established with regard to the subject that is to be established,

original: khyab par byed pa'i chos de dang ldan par chos can rtogs par 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: khyab par byed pa'i chos de dang ldan par chos can rtogs par 'gyur ba yin /
translated: the subject is understood to possess the property that is pervaded.

original: de'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of that is as follows.

original: chos can spyi la spyi tsam gyis khyab pa grub na khyad par can gyis gtan tshigs mthong ba'i shugs las @104b khyad par grub par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: chos can spyi la spyi tsam gyis khyab pa grub na khyad par can gyis gtan tshigs mthong ba'i shugs las @104b khyad par grub par 'gyur gyi /
translated: If the pervasion of the general subject by the mere general [property] is established, then the particular [subject] is established by implication from seeing the reason.

original: khyad par gyis khyab pa bstan par bya ba ni ma yin la /
analyzed: khyad par gyis khyab pa bstan par bya ba ni ma yin la /
translated: The particular pervasion is not to be taught.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can 'ga' zhig la yod pa yang gtan tshigs ma yin te /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can 'ga' zhig la yod pa yang gtan tshigs ma yin te /
translated: Nor is the presence of something in a subject that is to be established a logical reason,

original: mnyan bya nyid la sogs pa la khyab pa bstan par mi nus pa'i phyir dang / khyab pa bstan na yang khyab pa grub par byed pa nyid kyis bsgrub bya grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mnyan bya nyid la sogs pa la khyab pa bstan par mi nus pa'i phyir dang / khyab pa bstan na yang khyab pa grub par byed pa nyid kyis bsgrub bya grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is impossible to demonstrate the pervasion of something that is to be heard and so on, and even if the pervasion were demonstrated, the probandum would be established by the demonstration of the pervasion itself.

original: gtan tshigs don med par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs don med par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It would follow, absurdly, that the logical reason would be pointless.

original: de ci ltar me sgrub pa la khyad par yongs su gzung ba'i phyir kha na mtho ba med pa bzhin du yod pa bsgrub par bya ba la ni de ltar kha na mtho ba med pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ci ltar me sgrub pa la khyad par yongs su gzung ba'i phyir kha na mtho ba med pa bzhin du yod pa bsgrub par bya ba la ni de ltar kha na mtho ba med pa ma yin te /
translated: Just as there is no fault in the establishment of fire because the distinction is understood, so there is no fault in the establishment of existence because the probandum is understood.

original: khyad par ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is not so, because the distinction is not established.

original: de'i phyir de ltar sgrub pa la bsgrub par thar pa'i phyir dang / rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir yod pa ni bsgrub bya ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar sgrub pa la bsgrub par thar pa'i phyir dang / rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir yod pa ni bsgrub bya ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, because it is not established in that way, because it is not a logical reason, and because it is not concomitant, existence is not the probandum.

original: yod pa tsam sgrub par byed pa yin pa la ni skyon yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: yod pa tsam sgrub par byed pa yin pa la ni skyon yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: In order to demonstrate that there is no fault in proving mere existence, he says:

original: dngos po de'i khyad par gzung ba med par te /
analyzed: dngos po de'i khyad par gzung ba med par te /
translated: Without apprehending the particular of the thing,

original: ma gzung bar dngos po tsam gang yin pas sgrub par byed pa yin pa de la rjes su 'gro ba nyams pa med do //
analyzed: ma gzung bar dngos po tsam gang yin pas sgrub par byed pa yin pa de la rjes su 'gro ba nyams pa med do //
translated: that which proves mere thing without apprehending it, that is not impaired by the pervasion.

original: gang gi zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi zhe na /
translated: What is it?

original: de tsam zhes bya ba yod pa khyab pa gang yin pa'i bsgrub bya de'i yin gyi /
analyzed: de tsam zhes bya ba yod pa khyab pa gang yin pa'i bsgrub bya de'i yin gyi /
translated: It is the probandum that is pervaded by mere existence.

original: gzhi bye brag gis khyad par can gyis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzhi bye brag gis khyad par can gyis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is not the particular of the basis.

original: 'di nyid rnam par 'grel pa bshad pa ni /
analyzed: 'di nyid rnam par 'grel pa bshad pa ni /
translated: In order to explain this very point, he says:

original: bum pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi khyad par yongs su ma bzung ba'i rgyus na dngos po tsam khyab pa dngos po'i chos bsgrub par bya ba'i yul la yod pa'i sgrub par byed pa nyid la ni bsgrub bya des sgrub par byed pa la rjes su 'gro
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi khyad par yongs su ma bzung ba'i rgyus na dngos po tsam khyab pa dngos po'i chos bsgrub par bya ba'i yul la yod pa'i sgrub par byed pa nyid la ni bsgrub bya des sgrub par byed pa la rjes su 'gro
translated: Since the particular nature of a thing such as a pot is not apprehended, the mere thing that pervades it is the proof that proves the property of the thing that exists in the locus.

original: ba nyams pa med do //
analyzed: ba nyams pa med do //
translated: There is no fault of the pervasion being unestablished.

original: dngos po'i khyad par la brten pa'i bsgrub byas dngos po tsam gyis sgrub par byed pa khyab pa ma yin pa des na dngos po tsam khyab pa zhes bya bas khyad par du byas so //
analyzed: dngos po'i khyad par la brten pa'i bsgrub byas dngos po tsam gyis sgrub par byed pa khyab pa ma yin pa des na dngos po tsam khyab pa zhes bya bas khyad par du byas so //
translated: The probandum is based on a particular entity, and the probative reason is established by mere entity. Since the pervasion is not the case, it is specified by “mere entity” in the pervasion.

original: ci'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba nyams pa med ce na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba nyams pa med ce na /
translated: Why is there no fault of the pervasion being unestablished?

original: gang gi phyir de la gdon mi za bar khyad par yongs su gzung bar bya ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de la gdon mi za bar khyad par yongs su gzung bar bya ba ni ma yin no //
translated: Because it is not necessarily the case that a particular must be taken as the probandum.

original: rjes su 'gro ba med pa ni khyad par las yin no //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba med pa ni khyad par las yin no //
translated: The absence of the pervasion is due to the particular.

original: ci ltar na yod pa bsgrub bya yin na gdon mi za bar khyad par yongs su 'dzin la /
analyzed: ci ltar na yod pa bsgrub bya yin na gdon mi za bar khyad par yongs su 'dzin la /
translated: How is it that when existence is the probandum, the particular must be taken as the probandum,

original: sgrub par byed pa ni gdon mi za bar mi 'dzin ce na /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa ni gdon mi za bar mi 'dzin ce na /
translated: but the probative reason does not necessarily take it as the probandum?

original: bshad pa / @105a * //
analyzed: bshad pa / @105a * //
translated: It is explained:

original: yod pa tsam yongs su gzung na yang sgrub par byed pa'i sgrub par bya ba 'grub pa la nus pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yod pa tsam yongs su gzung na yang sgrub par byed pa'i sgrub par bya ba 'grub pa la nus pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because when mere existence is taken, the probative reason has the ability to establish the probandum.

original: de'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of that is as follows.

original: gal te spyi'i rang bzhin gyis sgrub par mi nus pa yin na ni khyad par yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba yin na /
analyzed: gal te spyi'i rang bzhin gyis sgrub par mi nus pa yin na ni khyad par yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba yin na /
translated: If it were impossible to prove the general nature, then the specific nature would be apprehended.

original: yod pa tsam gyis nus pa de'i phyir gdon mi za bar khyad par yongs su gzung ba ma yin no //
analyzed: yod pa tsam gyis nus pa de'i phyir gdon mi za bar khyad par yongs su gzung ba ma yin no //
translated: But since it is possible by mere existence, therefore it is not necessarily the case that the specific nature is apprehended.

original: yod pa tsam bsgrub par bya ba ni byed mi nus te /
analyzed: yod pa tsam bsgrub par bya ba ni byed mi nus te /
translated: It is not possible to prove mere existence,

original: de bsgrub par bya ba yin na rtsod pa med pas sgrub par byed pa don med pa'i phyir dang / de bsgrub par mi 'dod pa'i yang phyir ro //
analyzed: de bsgrub par bya ba yin na rtsod pa med pas sgrub par byed pa don med pa'i phyir dang / de bsgrub par mi 'dod pa'i yang phyir ro //
translated: because if it were to be proven, then the proof would be pointless, since there would be no dispute, and because it is not desired to prove that.

original: de'i phyir yod pa tsam sgrub par byed pa la ni kha na ma tho ba med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir yod pa tsam sgrub par byed pa la ni kha na ma tho ba med do //
translated: Therefore, there is no fault in proving mere existence.

original: de ltar yod pa tsam bsgrub par bya ba yin pa spangs nas /
analyzed: de ltar yod pa tsam bsgrub par bya ba yin pa spangs nas /
translated: Having thus rejected the probandum as mere existence,

original: yod pa bsgrub pa la skyon gzhan yang bstan pa'i spyir gzhan yang zhes smos so //🔽dngos po de ma grub na ni yod chos te /
analyzed: yod pa bsgrub pa la skyon gzhan yang bstan pa'i spyir gzhan yang zhes smos so // dngos po de ma grub na ni yod chos te /
translated: another fault is shown in proving existence in general:🔽Moreover, if that thing is not established, then the property of existence

original: dngos po chos gang yin pa de ma grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos po chos gang yin pa de ma grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: would not be established.

original: dngos po dang dngos po med pa gnyi ga la brten pa gang yin pa de ni med pa la yang 'jug pas 'khrul pa ste ma nges pa yin no //
analyzed: dngos po dang dngos po med pa gnyi ga la brten pa gang yin pa de ni med pa la yang 'jug pas 'khrul pa ste ma nges pa yin no //
translated: That which is based on both an entity and a nonentity is also applied to a nonentity, and thus it is a mistake, that is, it is indefinite.🔽If a nonentity is the reason, then since it is not mistaken with regard to the opposite of existence, it is contradictory.

original: med pa'i chos gtan tshigs yin na ni yod pa dang 'gal ba la mi 'khrul pas 'gal ba yin pa'i phyir yod pa gang yin pa bsgrub pa la gtan tshigs su nye bar bkod pa de thams cad skyon gsum las mi 'da' bas na /
analyzed: med pa'i chos gtan tshigs yin na ni yod pa dang 'gal ba la mi 'khrul pas 'gal ba yin pa'i phyir yod pa gang yin pa bsgrub pa la gtan tshigs su nye bar bkod pa de thams cad skyon gsum las mi 'da' bas na /
translated: Therefore, since all reasons that are posited as reasons for existence do not go beyond these three faults,

original: yod pa de ci ltar skyes bus bsgrub par bya ba yin /
analyzed: yod pa de ci ltar skyes bus bsgrub par bya ba yin /
translated: how could that existence be established by a person?

original: de'i gtan tshigs ni yod ba'i gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: de'i gtan tshigs ni yod ba'i gtan tshigs so //
translated: Its reason is an existent reason.

original: gsum zhes bya ba ni skyon kyang rnam pa cha gsum mo //
analyzed: gsum zhes bya ba ni skyon kyang rnam pa cha gsum mo //
translated: The three are also three types of faults.

original: chos gsum po de la gal te dngos chos gtan tshigs yin na ni yod pa ma grub pa la ji ltar 'grub /
analyzed: chos gsum po de la gal te dngos chos gtan tshigs yin na ni yod pa ma grub pa la ji ltar 'grub /
translated: If that property of an entity is the reason, then how could it be established in the nonestablished existence?

original: 'di snyam du dngos po'i chos de la 'grub kyi yod pa ni ma yin no snyam na /
analyzed: 'di snyam du dngos po'i chos de la 'grub kyi yod pa ni ma yin no snyam na /
translated: If you think that it is established in that property of an entity but not in existence,🔽then how could it be established in that property of an entity?

original: bshad pa / gang zig dngos po'i chos gtan tshigs su grub par 'dod pa de ci ltar dngos po grub par mi 'dod /
analyzed: bshad pa / gang zig dngos po'i chos gtan tshigs su grub par 'dod pa de ci ltar dngos po grub par mi 'dod /
translated: Nāgārjuna responds: If you assert that a property of an entity is established as a reason, then why do you not assert that the entity is established?

original: ci ltar na dngos po'i chos grub na dngos po grub ce na /
analyzed: ci ltar na dngos po'i chos grub na dngos po grub ce na /
translated: How is it that if the property of an entity is established, the entity is established?

original: gang gi phyir rang gi ngo bo nyid chos zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir rang gi ngo bo nyid chos zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: Because it is taught that its own nature is a property.

original: gal te rang gi ngo bo nyid yin na ji ltar chos can las tha dad pa can du drug pas bstan pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te rang gi ngo bo nyid yin na ji ltar chos can las tha dad pa can du drug pas bstan pa yin zhe na /
translated: If it is its own nature, how is it taught to be different from the property possessor by the sixth case?

original: 'ga' zhig la ltos nas zhes @105b smos so //🔽gang gi tshe rang gi ngo bo de nyid chos gzhan de'i bdag nyid kyis 'brel bar mi rung bar brjod par 'dod pa de'i tshe tha dad pa can gyi drug pas tha snyad du byed do //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig la ltos nas zhes @105b smos so // gang gi tshe rang gi ngo bo de nyid chos gzhan de'i bdag nyid kyis 'brel bar mi rung bar brjod par 'dod pa de'i tshe tha dad pa can gyi drug pas tha snyad du byed do //
translated: It is said, “in dependence on some.”🔽When it is said that it is not tenable for that very nature to be related to another property by way of its own nature, then at that time it is designated by the sixth case, “having a difference.”

original: 'di'i byas pa nyid gal te bum pa de las bkol ba'i rang bzhin du brjod pa de lta na de'i chos gzhan dang 'brel par mi rung bar bstan par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di'i byas pa nyid gal te bum pa de las bkol ba'i rang bzhin du brjod pa de lta na de'i chos gzhan dang 'brel par mi rung bar bstan par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: If it is said that its being produced is the nature of that pot, then it would be taught that it is not tenable for it to be related to another property.

original: gang gi tshe 'di bum pa'o zhes brjod pa de'i tshe ni chos gzhan gyi bdag nyid yin par rung bar bstan par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'di bum pa'o zhes brjod pa de'i tshe ni chos gzhan gyi bdag nyid yin par rung bar bstan par 'gyur te /
translated: When it is said “This is a pot,” it is taught that it is suitable to be the nature of another phenomenon.

original: byas pa gang yin pa de ni mi rtag pa yang yin la /
analyzed: byas pa gang yin pa de ni mi rtag pa yang yin la /
translated: Whatever is produced is impermanent,

original: rna bas gzung ba yang yin no //
analyzed: rna bas gzung ba yang yin no //
translated: and it is also apprehended by the ear.

original: de'i phyir ma byas pa las ldog pa'i brjod par bya ba gcig nyid la /
analyzed: de'i phyir ma byas pa las ldog pa'i brjod par bya ba gcig nyid la /
translated: Therefore, in the case of a single object of expression that is the opposite of unproduced,

original: gang gi tshe chos gzhan gyi bdag nyid 'brel bar rung bas chos gzhan 'phangs par brjod pa'i tshe ngo bo de nyid chos can yin te /
analyzed: gang gi tshe chos gzhan gyi bdag nyid 'brel bar rung bas chos gzhan 'phangs par brjod pa'i tshe ngo bo de nyid chos can yin te /
translated: when it is said that another phenomenon is implied because it is suitable to be related to the nature of another phenomenon, that entity itself is the subject,

original: chos gzhan gyi yang rten yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos gzhan gyi yang rten yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the basis of another phenomenon.

original: gang gi tshe chos gzhan dang bdag nyid gcig pas 'brel par mi rung ba chos gzhan spangs par brjod pa de'i tshe chos gzhan gyi rten ma yin pa de'i phyir chos can ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gang gi tshe chos gzhan dang bdag nyid gcig pas 'brel par mi rung ba chos gzhan spangs par brjod pa de'i tshe chos gzhan gyi rten ma yin pa de'i phyir chos can ni ma yin gyi /
translated: When it is said that another phenomenon is excluded because it is unsuitable to be related to the nature of another phenomenon, at that time it is not the basis of another phenomenon, and therefore it is not the subject.

original: 'on kyang chos yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang chos yin te /
translated: However, it is a phenomenon.

original: gzhan gyi dbang du brjod pa'i phyir ro zhes ston par byed pa ni chos dang chos can brjod pa'i sgra dag la zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: gzhan gyi dbang du brjod pa'i phyir ro zhes ston par byed pa ni chos dang chos can brjod pa'i sgra dag la zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The response to this is “with regard to the terms that express the property and the subject.”

original: chos dang chos can brjod pa'i bya ba la ni khyad par 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: chos dang chos can brjod pa'i bya ba la ni khyad par 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: There is no difference in the activity of the terms that express the property and the subject,

original: ma byas pa las ldog pa gcig nyid yin par brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma byas pa las ldog pa gcig nyid yin par brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are said to be the same in the exclusion of non-product.

original: 'di ni tshang ma rnam 'grel du bsal zin to //
analyzed: 'di ni tshang ma rnam 'grel du bsal zin to //
translated: This has already been refuted in the Pramānﬁ avārtika.

original: de'i phyir dngos po ma grub pa'i phyir dngos po'i chos ma grub po ;
analyzed: de'i phyir dngos po ma grub pa'i phyir dngos po'i chos ma grub po ;
translated: Therefore, since the thing is not established, the property of the thing is not established.

original: ci ste dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i gnyi ga'i chos gtan tshigs su brjod do zhe na yang ngo //
analyzed: ci ste dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i gnyi ga'i chos gtan tshigs su brjod do zhe na yang ngo //
translated: But if you say that the property of both the thing and the non-thing is stated as the reason, then what?

original: ci ltar chos gcig dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i yin par 'gyur /
analyzed: ci ltar chos gcig dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i yin par 'gyur /
translated: How could one property be both a thing and a non-thing?

original: chos ni rang gi ngo bo yin la /
analyzed: chos ni rang gi ngo bo yin la /
translated: A property is an essence.

original: dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ma yin no zhes dogs na /
analyzed: dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ma yin no zhes dogs na /
translated: The essence of a thing is not the essence of a non-thing.

original: dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin bdag nyid med pa ni gnyi ga'i chos su bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin bdag nyid med pa ni gnyi ga'i chos su bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: The nature of non-entity, which is the absence of self, is taught as the attribute of both.

original: gang gis dngos po'i rang bzhin nyid du mi brten pa de'o //
analyzed: gang gis dngos po'i rang bzhin nyid du mi brten pa de'o //
translated: It is that by which one does not rely on the nature of entity.

original: gang gis dngos po la mi brten ce na /
analyzed: gang gis dngos po la mi brten ce na /
translated: By what does one not rely on entity?

original: ma yin pa ma yin na ni don gzhan brjod par 'gyur ro//
analyzed: ma yin pa ma yin na ni don gzhan brjod par 'gyur ro//
translated: If it were not not, then it would express a different object.

original: @106a * // med par dgag pas ni ldog pa 'ba' zhig brjod pa yin la /
analyzed: @106a * // med par dgag pas ni ldog pa 'ba' zhig brjod pa yin la /
translated: By negation, only the exclusion is expressed.

original: ldog pa tsam ni med pa la yang mi 'gal ba'i rgyu'i phyir ldog pa tsam gnyi ga'i chos yin no //
analyzed: ldog pa tsam ni med pa la yang mi 'gal ba'i rgyu'i phyir ldog pa tsam gnyi ga'i chos yin no //
translated: And the mere exclusion is not contradictory in the case of non-existence, so the mere exclusion is the attribute of both.

original: dper na lus can ma yin zhes bya ba'i lus med pa nyid ldog pa tsam ni dngos po rnam par shes pa dang / dngos po med pa nye bar brjod pa med pa la yang 'gyur ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na lus can ma yin zhes bya ba'i lus med pa nyid ldog pa tsam ni dngos po rnam par shes pa dang / dngos po med pa nye bar brjod pa med pa la yang 'gyur ba bzhin no //
translated: For example, the mere exclusion of the absence of body, which is expressed as “non-embodied,” is in the case of the entity consciousness and in the case of the non-entity inexpressible.

original: gzhan dag dgag pa smra ba ni nye bar brjod pa med pa ni dngos po med pa'i phyir dgag pa'i yul nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan dag dgag pa smra ba ni nye bar brjod pa med pa ni dngos po med pa'i phyir dgag pa'i yul nyid ma yin no //
translated: Others say that the inexpressible is not the object of negation because it is non-existent.

original: gang zhig gnas gzhi la sogs pa'i nus pa yod pa de 'ga' zhig gi yul yin na nye bar brjod pa med pa ni dngos po med pas nus pa thams cad dang bral pa'i phyir ci ltar yul yin /
analyzed: gang zhig gnas gzhi la sogs pa'i nus pa yod pa de 'ga' zhig gi yul yin na nye bar brjod pa med pa ni dngos po med pas nus pa thams cad dang bral pa'i phyir ci ltar yul yin /
translated: If something is an object of some potential such as the potential of a place, then since it is not a nonthing, it is devoid of all potential.

original: gang zhig tshad ma 'ga'i yul du gyur pa de ni dngos po dang dngos po med pa 'ga'i yul du gyur pa yin na /🔽dngos po med pa ni tshad ma'i yul yang ma yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig tshad ma 'ga'i yul du gyur pa de ni dngos po dang dngos po med pa 'ga'i yul du gyur pa yin na / dngos po med pa ni tshad ma'i yul yang ma yin te /
translated: If something is the object of some valid cognitions, then it is the object of some things and nonthings.

original: nus pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro zhe na /🔽dgag pa'i yul nyid 'gog na ci da ni nye bar brjod pa med pa bsgrub pa'i yul yin nam /
analyzed: nus pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro zhe na / dgag pa'i yul nyid 'gog na ci da ni nye bar brjod pa med pa bsgrub pa'i yul yin nam /
translated: But nonthings are not the objects of valid cognitions because they are devoid of potential.🔽If you refute the object of negation, then is it the object of nonassertion?🔽Or is it the object of the proof of nonexistence?🔽Whatever is the object of negation is also the object of nonassertion.

original: dngos po med pa bsgrub pa'i yul yin no zhes bya ba gang yin pa 'di ni dgag pa'i yul nyid de bas kyang sdig pa yin pa'i phyir de las spong bar byed pa ni dngos po med na ni sgrub pa'i yul yang ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: dngos po med pa bsgrub pa'i yul yin no zhes bya ba gang yin pa 'di ni dgag pa'i yul nyid de bas kyang sdig pa yin pa'i phyir de las spong bar byed pa ni dngos po med na ni sgrub pa'i yul yang ma yin no zhe na /
translated: But if you say that if nonthings are not the objects of valid cognitions, then they are not the objects of proof,

original: da ni ci ltar dgag pa'i yul du 'dod par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: da ni ci ltar dgag pa'i yul du 'dod par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Now, how can it not be the object of negation?

original: sgrub pa'i yul nyid bkag pa kho nas dgag pa'i yul yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: sgrub pa'i yul nyid bkag pa kho nas dgag pa'i yul yin pa nyid do //
translated: It is the object of negation just because it is the object of affirmation that is negated.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bshad pa / dgag pa ni sgrub pa log pa'i rang bzhin pa'i phyir ro//
analyzed: bshad pa / dgag pa ni sgrub pa log pa'i rang bzhin pa'i phyir ro//
translated: It is said: Because negation is the nature of the reversal of affirmation.

original: la lar 'ga' zhig sgrub pa bkag pa gang yin pa de nyid de dgag pa bsgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: la lar 'ga' zhig sgrub pa bkag pa gang yin pa de nyid de dgag pa bsgrub pa yin no //
translated: In some cases, that which is the negation of the affirmation of something is itself the affirmation of the negation.

original: de'i phyir nye bar brjod pa med pa la lus can gyis sgrub pa bkag na dgag pa brjod par 'gyur ba'i phyir ji ltar dgag pa'i yul ma yin /
analyzed: de'i phyir nye bar brjod pa med pa la lus can gyis sgrub pa bkag na dgag pa brjod par 'gyur ba'i phyir ji ltar dgag pa'i yul ma yin /
translated: Therefore, when the embodied being negates the affirmation in the absence of expression, it becomes the expression of negation. How can it not be the object of negation?

original: dngos po med na yang tshad ma'i yul ji ltar yin pa de ltar yang de ma thag pa nyid dang / phyis kyang bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med na yang tshad ma'i yul ji ltar yin pa de ltar yang de ma thag pa nyid dang / phyis kyang bstan par bya'o //
translated: Just as a non-entity is the object of valid cognition, that will be shown immediately and later as well.

original: de na de la gzhan med pa ma nges par nus pa nyid do //
analyzed: de na de la gzhan med pa ma nges par nus pa nyid do //
translated: Then, without ascertaining the absence of another there, it is not possible.

original: 'di snyam du rnam pa 'di lta bu'i rigs can gyi chos ni brjod par nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di snyam du rnam pa 'di lta bu'i rigs can gyi chos ni brjod par nus pa ma yin te /
translated: Thinking like this, a phenomenon of this kind cannot be expressed.

original: lus can ma yin pa nyid la sogs pa'i sgra bzang po ma @106b yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lus can ma yin pa nyid la sogs pa'i sgra bzang po ma @106b yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the words “nonembodiment” and so on are not good words.

original: gang gi phyir 'di dag ni yongs su 'chad pa yang glu mi len pa /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di dag ni yongs su 'chad pa yang glu mi len pa /
translated: Because these are not sung in a song,

original: shing zan mi za ba /
analyzed: shing zan mi za ba /
translated: not eaten in a meal,

original: tshva mi za ba /
analyzed: tshva mi za ba /
translated: not eaten in a soup,

original: gdong nyi mi mthong ba /
analyzed: gdong nyi mi mthong ba /
translated: not seen in the face of the sun,

original: ma ning ma yin pa /
analyzed: ma ning ma yin pa /
translated: not a neuter,

original: aad do zhes bya ba'i sgra 'di dag kho na la dgag pa gnas par mthong ngo //
analyzed: aad do zhes bya ba'i sgra 'di dag kho na la dgag pa gnas par mthong ngo //
translated: these words “ah! ah!” are seen to be the basis of negation.

original: des na rjes su ma ba grangs pa'i don dag las lus can ma yin pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi sgra'i mi 'jug go zhes dogs pa spangs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: des na rjes su ma ba grangs pa'i don dag las lus can ma yin pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi sgra'i mi 'jug go zhes dogs pa spangs pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, the meaning of the suffix is not applied to the nature of nonembodiment and so on.

original: kye ma zhes smos so //
analyzed: kye ma zhes smos so //
translated: To dispel that doubt, he says “Alas!”

original: nyon mongs zhes bya ba ni rjes su brtse ba'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs zhes bya ba ni rjes su brtse ba'o //
translated: “Afflicted” means “compassionate.”

original: ci ltar dkar bas 'tsho zhe na /🔽bshad pa / brda las byung ba'i sgra don nges pa'i 'dod pa de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ci ltar dkar bas 'tsho zhe na / bshad pa / brda las byung ba'i sgra don nges pa'i 'dod pa de'i phyir ro //
translated: How does one live by whiteness?🔽It is explained: “Because of the assertion that the meaning of a word is arisen from a sign.”

original: brda las byung ba ni don nges par nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: brda las byung ba ni don nges par nus pa ma yin te /
translated: That which is arisen from a sign is not able to ascertain the meaning.

original: 'dod pa tsam gyi rjes su byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod pa tsam gyi rjes su byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it follows after mere desire.

original: ci ltar ma nges te /
analyzed: ci ltar ma nges te /
translated: How is it not definite?

original: 'jig rten ni lan cig nges par byas pa'i don gyi rjes su 'jug pa yin no zhe na bshad pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten ni lan cig nges par byas pa'i don gyi rjes su 'jug pa yin no zhe na bshad pa /
translated: The world engages in the meaning of a statement once it has been ascertained.

original: nges par byed pa de'i bya ba'i khyad par brang brdungs shing cho nges btab kyang /
analyzed: nges par byed pa de'i bya ba'i khyad par brang brdungs shing cho nges btab kyang /
translated: Even though the speaker has made a definite statement,

original: brang brdungs shing cho nges 'debs pa khyad du bsad nas 'jig rten tha snyad kyi don du sgra'i tha snyad la 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brang brdungs shing cho nges 'debs pa khyad du bsad nas 'jig rten tha snyad kyi don du sgra'i tha snyad la 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the world engages in the conventions of words for the sake of worldly conventions, disregarding the speaker’s beating of his breast and crying out.

original: yang ci'i phyir 'gog par byed kyang 'jig rten 'ga' zhig la 'jug ce na /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir 'gog par byed kyang 'jig rten 'ga' zhig la 'jug ce na /
translated: Why does the world engage in some statements even though they are false?

original: brda ci lta ba bzhin du zhes smos so //
analyzed: brda ci lta ba bzhin du zhes smos so //
translated: The root text says, “in accordance with the conventions.”

original: brda las ma 'das par 'jig rten gyi sgra la don rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brda las ma 'das par 'jig rten gyi sgra la don rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The world understands the meaning of a word without exceeding the conventions.

original: 'jig rten ni 'bras bu don du gnyer bas 'jug pa yin la /
analyzed: 'jig rten ni 'bras bu don du gnyer bas 'jug pa yin la /
translated: The world engages in a statement because it seeks a result.

original: sgra sbyar ba'i dgos pa yang don rtogs pa yin zhing de yang yod pa'i phyir 'jig rten mi ldog go //
analyzed: sgra sbyar ba'i dgos pa yang don rtogs pa yin zhing de yang yod pa'i phyir 'jig rten mi ldog go //
translated: The purpose of applying a word is to understand the meaning, and that is present. Therefore, the world does not turn away from a statement.

original: chos zhes bya ba 'bras bu bzhin yang yod pa ma yin nam zhe na ;
analyzed: chos zhes bya ba 'bras bu bzhin yang yod pa ma yin nam zhe na ;
translated: But isn’t there a result called “the Dharma”?

original: bshad pa / 'bras bu ni don rtogs pa de tsam du zad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bshad pa / 'bras bu ni don rtogs pa de tsam du zad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Reply: Because the result is merely the understanding of the meaning.

original: sbyin pa dang tshangs par spyad pa la sogs pa dag la ni 'jig rten chos kyis don du 'jug gi sgra sbyor ba la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: sbyin pa dang tshangs par spyad pa la sogs pa dag la ni 'jig rten chos kyis don du 'jug gi sgra sbyor ba la ni ma yin no //
translated: People engage in giving, celibacy, and so on for the sake of the Dharma, not for the sake of the sound.

original: lus can ma yin pa la sogs pa dag las ni don rtogs pa med de /
analyzed: lus can ma yin pa la sogs pa dag las ni don rtogs pa med de /
translated: But the understanding of the meaning does not occur from nonembodiments and so on.

original: de dag gis sgra bzang po rjes su dpag pa'i rgyu mi bzang ba yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: de dag gis sgra bzang po rjes su dpag pa'i rgyu mi bzang ba yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because the sound of those is not a good reason for inferring a good meaning.

original: bshad pa / nyi ma mi mthong ba la sogs pa'i 'dod pa dang / lus can ma yin pa la sogs pa mi 'dod pa'i sgra rnams khyad par med pa'i phyir /
